items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.antientropy.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Anti-entropy curse works against the forces of the universe, pulling energy into the wearer and away from their surroundings. This briefly sets the wearer on fire, but freezes everything around them!
反熵%s: 反熵诅咒与宇宙法则背道而驰，会抽离周遭的热量并汇集到穿戴者身上。这会使穿戴者短暂地燃烧，并冻结周围的一切！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.bulk.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of bulk
反熵%s: 臃肿%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.bulk.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Armor of bulk looks larger and more imposing, but doesn't actually have enhanced defense. Even worse, the added size makes moving through doorways very difficult.
反熵%s: 臃肿诅咒的护甲看上去更加厚重，但实际上防御力并没有增强。硕大的体积反而让使用者难以穿过门口。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.corrosion.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of corrosion
反熵%s: 腐蚀%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.corrosion.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Armor of corrosion is capable of bursting with corrosive fluid, coating everything in the area with sticky acidic ooze.
反熵%s: 腐蚀诅咒的护甲会喷溅出腐蚀性液体，为区域内的所有东西盖上一层黏糊糊的酸性淤泥。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.displacement.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of displacement
反熵%s: 定相%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.displacement.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The curse of displacement attempts to move the wearer to safety when they are attacked. It is a bit too effective however, randomly teleporting the user around the level.
反熵%s: 定相诅咒会在穿戴者受到攻击时试图将其传送到安全地带。不过，过强的威力反倒会导致使用者被随机传送到层内各处。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.metabolism.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of metabolism
反熵%s: 代谢%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.metabolism.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The metabolism curse directly converts satiety into health when the wearer is injured, providing a boost of healing, but quickly causing starvation.
反熵%s: 代谢诅咒在穿戴者受伤时能直接将饱腹度转化为生命值，提供额外的治疗，但你会很快陷入饥饿之中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.multiplicity.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of multiplicity
反熵%s: 分身%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.multiplicity.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Armor cursed with multiplicity contains dangerous duplication magic. It will sometimes create a mirror image of the wearer, but is equally likely to duplicate the attacker!
反熵%s: 带有分身诅咒的防具含有一种危险的复制魔法。有时候它会复制出穿戴者的镜像，但也有同等几率复制攻击者！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.overgrowth.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of overgrowth
反熵%s: 丛生%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.overgrowth.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Armor of overgrowth is covered in various blooming plants. While this effect certainly looks interesting, it does nothing for defense, and these plants will randomly activate in combat!
反熵%s: 丛生诅咒的护甲上生长着各种植物。从美学的角度来讲颇为有趣，但这些花花草草对防御力没有任何贡献，只会在战斗中随机发动效果！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.stench.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of stench
反熵%s: 恶臭%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.curses.stench.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Armor cursed with stench will release clouds of noxious gas, which is hazardous to everything caught in the cloud.
反熵%s: 带有恶臭诅咒的防具会释放出团团毒雾，对一切来不及逃离的对象造成伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.affection.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of affection
反熵%s: 魅惑%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.affection.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This powerful glyph manipulates the mind of attackers, charming them temporarily.
反熵%s: 这个强力的刻印能够操控攻击者的心智，暂时地魅惑他们。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.antimagic.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of anti-magic
反熵%s: 敌法%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.antimagic.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This powerful glyph allows armor to defend its wearer against magical attacks as well as physical ones. This magical defence is not affected by the armor's tier.
反熵%s: 这个强力的刻印能使护甲在防御物理伤害的同时抵御魔法伤害。这种魔法防御不受护甲等阶影响。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.brimstone.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of brimstone
反熵%s: 狱火%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.brimstone.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This glyph shields the wearer and their belongings from fire, completely nullifying its damage and negative effects.
反熵%s: 这个刻印会保护穿戴者和其所有物免受火焰的伤害及其他影响。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.camouflage.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of camouflage
反熵%s: 迷彩%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.camouflage.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This glyph allows the wearer to blend into tall grass, granting them temporary invisibility.
反熵%s: 这个刻印能让使用者与高草融为一体，得到短暂的隐形效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.entanglement.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of entanglement
反熵%s: 缠绕%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.entanglement.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This glyph grows earthen armor around the wearer to absorb damage, but this armor will break if the wearer moves.
反熵%s: 这个刻印会在使用者周围生出能吸收伤害的地根护甲。这种地根护甲会在使用者移动后散落失效。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.flow.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of flow
反熵%s: 涌流%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.flow.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This glyph manipulates the flow of water around the wearer, making them much faster when moving through it.
反熵%s: 这个刻印能操控使用者周身的水流，让使用者在水中移动时速度大大加快。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.obfuscation.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of obfuscation
反熵%s: 晦暗%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.obfuscation.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This glyph obscures the wearer, making them more difficult to detect.
反熵%s: 这个刻印会掩盖使用者的气息，让使用者更难以被发现。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.potential.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of potential
反熵%s: 电势%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.potential.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This glyph builds energy when struck, granting charge to the wearer's wand when it activates.
反熵%s: 这个刻印在被击中时会积蓄能量，在生效时为使用者的法杖充能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.repulsion.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of repulsion
反熵%s: 反斥%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.repulsion.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This glyph rebounds force against attackers, sending them flying back.
反熵%s: 这个刻印会将敌人攻击的冲击力反弹回去，使攻击者飞至远处。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.stone.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of stone
反熵%s: 磐岩%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.stone.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This glyph surrounds the armor with heavy magical stone that makes dodging impossible, but blocks damage in proportion with evasion.
反熵%s: 这个刻印使用沉重的魔法石包裹了整个铠甲让使用者无法闪避，但会根据原有的闪避能力吸收伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.swiftness.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of swiftness
反熵%s: 迅捷%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.swiftness.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This glyph enhances the speed of the wearer whenever they aren't near to an enemy.
反熵%s: 这个刻印会在近范围内没有敌人时使提高使用者的移动速度。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.thorns.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of thorns
反熵%s: 荆棘%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.thorns.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This powerful glyph harms attackers, causing them to slowly bleed when they attack the wearer.
反熵%s: 这个强力的刻印会伤害那些攻击穿戴者的敌人，使它们缓慢流血。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.viscosity.name
%s of anti-entropy: %s of viscosity
反熵%s: 粘稠%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.viscosity.deferred
%s of anti-entropy: deferred %d
反熵%s: 延缓%d点伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.viscosity$defereddamage.name
%s of anti-entropy: deferred damage
反熵%s: 延缓伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.viscosity$defereddamage.ondeath
%s of anti-entropy: The deferred damage killed you...
反熵%s: 你死于延缓伤害...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.viscosity$defereddamage.rankings_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Killed by deferred damage
反熵%s: 死于延迟伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.viscosity$defereddamage.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Damage is being dealt slowly over time instead of immediately.\n\nDeferred damage remaining: %d.
反熵%s: 瞬时的伤害被延缓，随着时间慢慢释放。\n\n剩余的延迟伤害：%d

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.glyphs.viscosity.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This glyph is able to store damage dealt to the wearer, dealing it to them slowly rather than all at once.
反熵%s: 这个刻印可以储存对使用者造成的伤害，让使用者缓慢受伤而不是一下子受到重击。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.ac_detach
%s of anti-entropy: DETACH
反熵%s: 拆卸

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.detach_seal
%s of anti-entropy: You detach the seal from your armor.
反熵%s: 你将纹章从护甲上摘了下来。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.equip_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The armor constricts around you painfully.
反熵%s: 这件护甲生疼地勒住了你。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.identify
%s of anti-entropy: You are now familiar enough with your armor to identify it.
反熵%s: 你对你的护甲已经足够熟悉并且可以因此将其完全鉴定。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.hardening_gone
%s of anti-entropy: The hardening on this armor has worn off!
反熵%s: 这件护甲上的硬化效果已被损耗！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.incompatible
%s of anti-entropy: Interaction of different types of magic has erased the glyph on this armor!
反熵%s: 不同属性的魔法相冲突，消除了护甲上的刻印！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.curr_absorb
%s of anti-entropy: This _tier-%1$d_ armor blocks _%2$d-%3$d damage_ and requires _%4$d strength_ to use properly.
反熵%s: 这件_%1$d阶_护甲能抵挡_%2$d~%3$d点伤害_并且需要_%4$d点力量_来正常使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.avg_absorb
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this _tier-%1$d_ armor blocks _%2$d-%3$d damage_ and requires _%4$d strength_ to use properly.
反熵%s: 一般情况下这件_%1$d阶_护甲能抵挡_%2$d~%3$d点伤害_并且需要_%4$d点力量_来正常使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.too_heavy
%s of anti-entropy: Because of your inadequate strength wearing this armor will decrease your ability to move, evade, and defend.
反熵%s: 由于你的力量不足，使用这件护甲会降低你的移动、闪避以及防御能力。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.probably_too_heavy
%s of anti-entropy: Probably this armor is too heavy for you.
反熵%s: 这套护甲对你来说或许太重了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.excess_str
%s of anti-entropy: Because of your excess strength, you are _more evasive_ while wearing this armor.
反熵%s: 你的额外力量使你穿戴着这件护甲时_更易闪避_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.evasion
%s of anti-entropy: It is augmented to enhance _evasion._
反熵%s: 这件护甲强化了_闪避_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.defense
%s of anti-entropy: It is augmented to enhance _defense._
反熵%s: 这件护甲强化了_防御_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.inscribed
%s of anti-entropy: it is inscribed with a _%s._
反熵%s: 这件护甲刻有_%s_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.glyph_hardened
%s of anti-entropy: It has been _hardened._
反熵%s: 它被_硬化_了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.hardened_no_glyph
%s of anti-entropy: This armor has been _hardened,_ but is not currently inscribed with a glyph.
反熵%s: 这件护甲已被_硬化_，但目前没有携带刻印。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.cursed_worn
%s of anti-entropy: Because this armor is cursed, you are powerless to remove it.
反熵%s: 这套护甲被诅咒了，你无法卸下它。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: You can feel a malevolent magic lurking within this armor.
反熵%s: 你能感觉到这套护甲里潜伏着一股充满恶意的魔力。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.weak_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: Despite the curse, you are able to unequip this armor.
反熵%s: 虽然这件护甲有诅咒，但是你可以脱下它。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.not_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: This armor is free of malevolent magic.
反熵%s: 这件护甲没有被诅咒。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor.seal_attached
%s of anti-entropy: The Warrior's broken seal is attached to this armor, it is providing him up to _%d shielding_.
反熵%s: 战士的破损纹章被贴附于这件护甲上，它正为战士提供_%d点护盾_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor$glyph.glyph
%s of anti-entropy: glyph
反熵%s: 刻印

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor$glyph.killed
%s of anti-entropy: %s killed you...
反熵%s: %s杀死了你...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.armor$glyph.rankings_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Killed by a glyph
反熵%s: 死于刻印

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.classarmor.ac_ability
%s of anti-entropy: CHOOSE ABILITY
反熵%s: 选择技能

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.classarmor.ac_transfer
%s of anti-entropy: TRANSFER
反熵%s: 转移

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.classarmor.no_ability
%s of anti-entropy: Your armor currently has no ability, you should choose one!
反熵%s: 你的护甲当前没有技能，你应该选择一项！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.classarmor.not_equipped
%s of anti-entropy: You need to be wearing this armor to use its special power!
反熵%s: 你需要穿戴这套护甲才能使用它的特技！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.classarmor.low_charge
%s of anti-entropy: The armor does not have enough charge to use its special power!
反熵%s: 护甲没有足够的能量来释放技能！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.classarmor.charge_use
%s of anti-entropy: Using the ability right now will consume _%s_ charge.
反熵%s: 现在使用该能力将消耗_%s_的充能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.classarmor.transfer_title
%s of anti-entropy: Transfer Armor
反熵%s: 转移护甲

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.classarmor.transfer_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The magic of the dwarf king's crown can be transferred to another set of armor. Note that the original armor will be destroyed in the process.
反熵%s: 矮人王冠中蕴藏的魔法可以被转移到另一件护甲中去。注意，此过程中原先的护甲会被销毁。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.classarmor.transfer_prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select an Armor
反熵%s: 选择一件护甲

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.classarmor.transfer_cancel
%s of anti-entropy: Cancel
反熵%s: 取消

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.classarmor.transfer_complete
%s of anti-entropy: Your heroic armor's properties have been transferred!
反熵%s: 你的英雄铠甲的特殊技能已被转移！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.clericarmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: hero's vestments
反熵%s: 英雄祭服

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.clericarmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: While wearing this mixture of cloth and plate, the Cleric can perform a special ability.
反熵%s: 穿着这套内着重甲的祭服时，牧师能够施展一项特殊技能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.clotharmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: cloth armor
反熵%s: 布甲

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.clotharmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This lightweight armor offers basic protection.
反熵%s: 这件轻便的护甲能提供最基本的防御。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.duelistarmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: hero's breastplate
反熵%s: 英雄胸铠

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.duelistarmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: While wearing this plate armor and cape, the Duelist can perform a special ability.
反熵%s: 装备这套护胸甲与披风时，决斗家能够施展一项特殊技能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.huntressarmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: hero's cloak
反熵%s: 英雄披风

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.huntressarmor.no_enemies
%s of anti-entropy: No enemies in sight
反熵%s: 视野中未发现敌人。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.huntressarmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: While wearing this cloak, the Huntress can perform a special ability.
反熵%s: 披着这件朴实无华的披风，女猎手能够使出一个华丽的招式。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.leatherarmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: leather armor
反熵%s: 皮甲

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.leatherarmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Armor made from tanned monster hide. Not as light as cloth armor but provides better protection.
反熵%s: 用鞣制的兽皮制成的护甲。没有布甲轻，但提供更好的防御。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.magearmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: hero's robe
反熵%s: 英雄法袍

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.magearmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: While wearing this gorgeous robe, the Mage can perform a special ability.
反熵%s: 穿着这件华贵的法袍时，法师可以释放一项特殊的技能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.mailarmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: mail armor
反熵%s: 链甲

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.mailarmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Interlocking metal links make for a tough but flexible suit of armor.
反熵%s: 由金属链环环相扣制成的一套结实又不失灵活的护甲。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.platearmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: plate armor
反熵%s: 板甲

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.platearmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Enormous plates of metal are joined together into a suit that provides unmatched protection to any adventurer strong enough to bear its staggering weight.
反熵%s: 厚重的金属板拼接到一起，为能承受其骇人重量的冒险家提供无与伦比的防御。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.roguearmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: hero's garb
反熵%s: 英雄风衣

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.roguearmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: While wearing this dark garb, the Rogue can perform a special ability.
反熵%s: 裹着这身与黑暗融为一体的斗篷时，盗贼能够施展一项特殊技能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.scalearmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: scale armor
反熵%s: 鳞甲

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.scalearmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The metal scales sewn onto a leather vest create a flexible, yet protective armor.
反熵%s: 在厚实的皮背心中缝入金属鳞片，形成了灵活而高防御的护甲。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.warriorarmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: hero's platemail
反熵%s: 英雄板甲

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.armor.warriorarmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: While wearing this heavy plated armor, the Warrior can perform a special ability.
反熵%s: 装备这套重型板甲时，战士能够施展一项特殊技能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.name
%s of anti-entropy: alchemist's toolkit
反熵%s: 炼金工具箱

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.ac_brew
%s of anti-entropy: BREW
反熵%s: 酿造

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.ac_energize
%s of anti-entropy: ENERGIZE
反熵%s: 供能

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.not_ready
%s of anti-entropy: Your toolkit has not finished warming up.
反熵%s: 你的炼金工具箱还没有准备好。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: Your cursed toolkit prevents you from using alchemy!
反熵%s: 被诅咒的炼金箱正在阻止你炼金！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.need_energy
%s of anti-entropy: You need at least 6 energy for that.
反熵%s: 你需要至少6点能量才能那么做。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.energize_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Every 6 energy crystals will give the toolkit enough energy to gain a level, which increases the rate that the toolkit generates energy over time, and how quickly it warms up.\n\nHow much energy would you like to use?
反熵%s: 每6个能量晶体可供炼金工具箱进行一次升级，这能增加工具箱随时间自然产生的能量。并且更快地进行预热。\n\n你打算为本次炼金实验花费多少能量呢？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.energize_1
%s of anti-entropy: 6 energy: +1 level
反熵%s: 6能量：+1级

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.energize_all
%s of anti-entropy: %1$d energy: +%2$d levels

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This toolkit contains a number of reagents and herbs along with a small mixing vial, allowing for alchemy on-the-go. The vial contains what looks like alchemical energy crystals in liquid form.
反熵%s: 这套工具箱内存放着各式各样的试剂，草药和一个小混合瓶，让使用者能够随时随地进行炼金实验。这个混合瓶里貌似装载着液态的炼金能量晶体。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.desc_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The cursed toolkit has bound itself to your side, and refuses to let you use alchemy.
反熵%s: 被诅咒的工具箱将自己紧紧固定在你的身上，抑制你使用炼金工具的能力。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.desc_warming
%s of anti-entropy: The toolkit is currently warming up, and will be ready to use after a little while.
反熵%s: 工具箱正在预热中，过一会儿才能再次使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.alchemiststoolkit.desc_hint
%s of anti-entropy: The equipped toolkit is slowly generating alchemical energy as you gain experience. It looks like the mixture in the vial could be enhanced by adding energy crystals to it.
反熵%s: 手中的工具箱正随着你获得经验值缓慢生成炼金能量。混合瓶中的液体似乎能通过添加能量晶体来强化。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.artifact.cannot_wear_two
%s of anti-entropy: You cannot wear two of the same artifact.
反熵%s: 你不能装备两件相同的神器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.artifact.equip_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The artifact painfully binds itself to you.
反熵%s: 这件神器令人痛苦地缠住了你的灵魂。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.artifact.curse_known
%s of anti-entropy: You can feel a malevolent magic lurking within the artifact.
反熵%s: 你能感觉到在这个神器上潜伏着一股充满恶意的魔力。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.artifact.not_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: This artifact is free of malevolent magic.
反熵%s: 这件神器没有被诅咒。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.artifact.need_to_equip
%s of anti-entropy: You need to equip your artifact to do that.
反熵%s: 你需要装备神器才能进行该操作。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.capeofthorns.name
%s of anti-entropy: cape of thorns
反熵%s: 荆棘斗篷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.capeofthorns.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These collapsed sheets of metal from the DM-300 have formed together into a rigid cape. It seems to store a deep energy, perhaps it has some of the DM-300's power?
反熵%s: 这些从DM-300崩解而出的金属碎片构成了一件坚硬的斗篷。它似乎能储存很多能量，也许它还残留有少量DM-300的能力？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.capeofthorns.desc_inactive
%s of anti-entropy: The cape feels reassuringly heavy on your shoulders, it seems to be gaining energy from the damage you take.
反熵%s: 斗篷令人安心的沉重压在你的肩上，它似乎能从你受的伤里获得能量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.capeofthorns.desc_active
%s of anti-entropy: The cape seems to be releasing stored energy, it is radiating a protective power.
反熵%s: 斗篷似乎在释放其存储的能量，并将其辐射出一种防护力场。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.capeofthorns$thorns.inert
%s of anti-entropy: Your Cape becomes inert again.
反熵%s: 你的斗篷再次失效了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.capeofthorns$thorns.radiating
%s of anti-entropy: Your Cape begins radiating energy, you feel protected!
反熵%s: 你的斗篷正在释放存储的能量，你感到自己正在被保护着！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.capeofthorns$thorns.levelup
%s of anti-entropy: Your Cape grows stronger!
反熵%s: 你的斗篷变得更强大了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.capeofthorns$thorns.name
%s of anti-entropy: thorns
反熵%s: 荆棘

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.capeofthorns$thorns.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
Your cape is radiating energy, surrounding you in a field of deflective force!

All damage you receive is reduced while the thorns effect is active. Additionally, if the attacker is next to you, the reduced amount is deflected back at the attacker.

Turns of thorns remaining: %s.
反熵%s:
你的斗篷在你周围辐射能量，产生了一个偏斜力场！

该效果下你受到的所有伤害都会被减少。此外，如果攻击者就在你旁边，被减少的伤害会反弹给攻击者。

荆棘效果持续时间：%s回合

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.chaliceofblood.name
%s of anti-entropy: chalice of blood
反熵%s: 蓄血圣杯

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.chaliceofblood.ac_prick
%s of anti-entropy: PRICK
反熵%s: 血祭

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.chaliceofblood.yes
%s of anti-entropy: Yes, I know what I'm doing
反熵%s: 是的，我知道我在做什么

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.chaliceofblood.no
%s of anti-entropy: No, I changed my mind
反熵%s: 不，我改主意了

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.chaliceofblood.prick_warn
%s of anti-entropy: Each time you use the chalice it will drain more life energy, if you are not careful this can easily kill you.\n\nAre you sure you want to offer it more life energy?
反熵%s: 每次使用圣杯都会消耗更多的生命能量，要是不够小心，这种行为可以轻易地杀死你。\n\n你确定要给它更多的生命能量吗？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.chaliceofblood.onprick
%s of anti-entropy: You prick yourself, and your life essence drains into the chalice.
反熵%s: 你刺破了自己的手指，使你的生命精华流入了圣杯。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.chaliceofblood.ondeath
%s of anti-entropy: The Chalice sucks your life essence dry...
反熵%s: 圣杯将你的生命精华吸噬殆尽了...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.chaliceofblood.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This shining silver chalice is oddly adorned with sharp gems at the rim.
反熵%s: 这个闪闪发光的银质圣杯在边沿突兀地装饰着几颗造型尖锐的宝石。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.chaliceofblood.desc_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The cursed chalice has bound itself to your hand, and is inhibiting your ability to regenerate health.
反熵%s: 被诅咒的圣杯将自己固定在你手上，抑制着你回复生命的能力。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.chaliceofblood.desc_1
%s of anti-entropy: As you hold the chalice, you feel oddly compelled to prick yourself on the sharp gems.
反熵%s: 握住圣杯的那一刻，你涌起一股想在那些尖锐宝石上刺伤自己的奇特冲动。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.chaliceofblood.desc_2
%s of anti-entropy: Some of your blood is pooled into the chalice, you can subtly feel the chalice feeding life energy into you. You still want to cut yourself on the chalice, even though you know it will hurt.
反熵%s: 你的一些血液汇集到圣杯里，你可以隐约感受到杯子在为你送来生命能量。你还想用圣杯继续割伤自己，即便你知道那很疼。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.chaliceofblood.desc_3
%s of anti-entropy: The chalice is filled to the brim with your life essence. You can feel the chalice pouring life energy back into you.
反熵%s: 圣杯已经被你的生命精华填满。你可以感觉到圣杯正将生命能量倾泻般回馈给你。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.cloakofshadows.name
%s of anti-entropy: cloak of shadows
反熵%s: 暗影斗篷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.cloakofshadows.ac_stealth
%s of anti-entropy: STEALTH
反熵%s: 潜行

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.cloakofshadows.cooldown
%s of anti-entropy: Your cloak needs %d more rounds to re-energize.
反熵%s: 你的斗篷还需要%d回合来重新激活。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.cloakofshadows.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: You cannot use a cursed cloak.
反熵%s: 你不能使用被诅咒的斗篷。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.cloakofshadows.no_charge
%s of anti-entropy: Your cloak hasn't recharged enough to be usable yet.
反熵%s: 你的斗篷充能不足无法使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.cloakofshadows.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A priceless magical cloak, stolen from the royal armory many years ago by the Rogue. When worn, it can be used to turn completely invisible for a short time.\n\nThe more the cloak is used, the stronger it will become, allowing the Rogue to become invisible more frequently and for longer durations.
反熵%s: 这是盗贼多年前从皇家军械库窃取的一件无价的魔法斗篷。穿上时，能够使你在短时间内完全隐形。\n\n被使用得越频繁，斗篷就会变得越强，使盗贼更频繁地隐形，持续时间也更长。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.cloakofshadows$cloakstealth.no_charge
%s of anti-entropy: Your cloak has run out of energy.
反熵%s: 你的斗篷耗尽了能量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.cloakofshadows$cloakstealth.levelup
%s of anti-entropy: Your cloak grows stronger!
反熵%s: 你的斗篷变得更强大了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.cloakofshadows$cloakstealth.name
%s of anti-entropy: cloaked
反熵%s: 影遁

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.cloakofshadows$cloakstealth.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
Your cloak of shadows is granting you invisibility while you are shrouded by it. You will remain cloaked until it is cancelled or your cloak runs out of charge.

While you are invisible enemies are unable to attack or follow you. Physical attacks and magical effects (such as scrolls and wands) will immediately cancel invisibility.

Turns until charge use: %d.
反熵%s:
你身上的暗影斗篷正给予你隐形效果。你会一直拥有该状态，直到你自行取消或斗篷耗尽充能。

当你在隐形时敌人无法攻击或追踪你。大部分物理攻击和魔法(比如卷轴和法杖)会立即解除隐形效果。

距离下次消耗充能还有：%d回合

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.name
%s of anti-entropy: dried rose
反熵%s: 干枯玫瑰

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.ac_summon
%s of anti-entropy: SUMMON
反熵%s: 召唤

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.ac_direct
%s of anti-entropy: DIRECT
反熵%s: 指引

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.ac_outfit
%s of anti-entropy: OUTFIT
反熵%s: 配装

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.spawned
%s of anti-entropy: You have already summoned the ghost.
反熵%s: 你已经召唤出幽灵了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.no_charge
%s of anti-entropy: Your rose isn't fully charged yet.
反熵%s: 你的玫瑰尚未充能完毕。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: You cannot use a cursed rose.
反熵%s: 你不能使用被诅咒的玫瑰。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.no_space
%s of anti-entropy: There is no free space near you.
反熵%s: 你附近没有可用于召唤的空地。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.charged
%s of anti-entropy: Your rose is fully charged!
反熵%s: 你的玫瑰已经充能完毕！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Is this the rose that the ghost mentioned before disappearing? It seems to hold some spiritual power, perhaps it can be used to channel the energy of that lost warrior.
反熵%s: 这就是那朵在幽灵消失前被提及的玫瑰吗？它似乎拥有某种精神力量，也许能以此为媒介触及这位陨落战士的能量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.desc_no_quest
%s of anti-entropy: A dried aged rose that is somehow still holding together despite its age.\n\nIt seems to have some spiritual power, but you have no idea how to use it right now.
反熵%s: 一株因岁月而干枯却没有完全凋零的玫瑰。\n\n它上面看起来残留了一些精神力量，但你现在还不知道如何使用它。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.desc_hint
%s of anti-entropy: It seems to be missing some petals. Perhaps reattaching them will strengthen the rose.
反熵%s: 它似乎缺少了一些花瓣。也许把花瓣拼回来可以增强玫瑰。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.desc_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The cursed rose is bound to your hand, it feels eerily cold.
反熵%s: 被诅咒的玫瑰被绑在了你的手上，你感觉到它出奇的冷。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.desc_weapon
%s of anti-entropy: Ghost's weapon: %s
反熵%s: 幽灵的武器：%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.desc_armor
%s of anti-entropy: Ghost's armor: %s
反熵%s: 幽灵的盔甲：%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose.desc_strength
%s of anti-entropy: Ghost's strength: %s
反熵%s: 幽灵的力量：%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$petal.name
%s of anti-entropy: dried petal
反熵%s: 干枯花瓣

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$petal.no_rose
%s of anti-entropy: You have no rose to add this petal to.
反熵%s: 你没有玫瑰来添加这片花瓣。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$petal.no_room
%s of anti-entropy: There is no room left for this petal, so you discard it.
反熵%s: 你的玫瑰已经放不下这片花瓣了，所以你无视了它。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$petal.maxlevel
%s of anti-entropy: The rose is completed!
反熵%s: 玫瑰再一次完整了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$petal.levelup
%s of anti-entropy: You add the petal to the rose.
反熵%s: 你将花瓣放在了玫瑰上。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$petal.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A frail dried up petal, which has somehow survived this far into the dungeon.
反熵%s: 一片干枯脆弱的花瓣，它居然能够在这么深的地牢之中幸存下来。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$wndghosthero.title
%s of anti-entropy: Ghost's Equipment
反熵%s: 幽灵的装备

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$wndghosthero.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The ghost is weak on their own, but their form is solid enough to be equipped with a weapon and armor. They will be able to use these items just like you do.\n\nThe ghost can currently equip items requiring up to _%d strength._
反熵%s: 幽灵本身十分脆弱，但她的形体已经完整到足以装备一件武器和防具。她可以和你一样自如使用这些装备。\n\n幽灵目前最高可装备_力量需求为%d_的物品。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$wndghosthero.weapon_prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select a weapon
反熵%s: 选择一件武器

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$wndghosthero.armor_prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select an armor
反熵%s: 选择一件护甲

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$wndghosthero.cant_unique
%s of anti-entropy: The ghost can't use unique items.
反熵%s: 幽灵无法使用特殊装备。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$wndghosthero.cant_unidentified
%s of anti-entropy: You don't know enough about that item.
反熵%s: 你对于那个道具并不是十分了解。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$wndghosthero.cant_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: You can't give the ghost cursed equipment.
反熵%s: 你不能让幽灵使用有诅咒的物品。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$wndghosthero.cant_strength
%s of anti-entropy: The ghost is not strong enough to use that.
反熵%s: 幽灵的形体还不够强大，无法装备此物品。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.name
%s of anti-entropy: sad ghost
反熵%s: 悲伤幽灵

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.def_verb
%s of anti-entropy: evaded
反熵%s: 闪避

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.hello
%s of anti-entropy: Hello again %s.
反熵%s: 再次向你问好，%s。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.introduce
%s of anti-entropy:
My spirit is bound to this rose, it was very precious to me, a gift from my love whom I left on the surface.

I cannot return to him, but thanks to you I have a second chance to complete my journey. When I am able I will respond to your call and fight with you.

As long as you have the rose I can hear your voice, so you can use it to direct me from afar.

Hopefully you may succeed where I failed...
反熵%s:
我的灵魂与这朵玫瑰相连，它对我非常珍贵，是我在地面上相别的爱人送给我的礼物。

我无法回去见他了，但感谢你给我再一次完成旅程的机会。当我准备好后，我会回应你的呼唤与你并肩作战。

只要你拿着玫瑰我就可以听到你的声音，你可以在远处指引我前进。

希望你能在我倒下的地方继续走下去...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_sewers_1
%s of anti-entropy: These sewers used to be safe, people even lived here in the winter.
反熵%s: 下水道以前是安全的，人们甚至会住进来过冬。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_sewers_2
%s of anti-entropy: I wonder what happened to the guard patrols, did they give up?
反熵%s: 不知道这里的守卫怎么了，他们放弃这里的防务了吗？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_sewers_3
%s of anti-entropy: I had family on the surface, I hope they're safe.
反熵%s: 我在地牢外还有家人，希望他们一切安好。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_sewers_4
%s of anti-entropy: The guards couldn't defeat these monsters, but maybe we can.
反熵%s: 守卫没能解决这些怪物，但也许我们能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_sewers_5
%s of anti-entropy: If even the sewers are this dangerous, I wonder what's below...
反熵%s: 连下水道都这么危险，不知道更深处会有些什么...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_sewers_6
%s of anti-entropy: What could have caused these rats and crabs to grow so large?
反熵%s: 这些老鼠和螃蟹是怎么长这么大的？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_prison_1
%s of anti-entropy: I've heard stories about this place, nothing good.
反熵%s: 我听过不少关于这里的传闻，没有一个是好消息。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_prison_2
%s of anti-entropy: This place was always more of a dungeon than a prison.
反熵%s: 虽说这里是座监狱，但怎么看都更像个地牢。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_prison_3
%s of anti-entropy: I can't imagine what went on when this place was abandoned.
反熵%s: 我都不敢想象，这里被遗弃之后究竟发生过什么。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_prison_4
%s of anti-entropy: It seems both the prisoners and guards have been turned into monsters.
反熵%s: 看来这里的囚犯和狱卒都被变成怪物了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_prison_5
%s of anti-entropy: What could be responsible for all these skeletons?
反熵%s: 这么多骷髅都是怎么搞来的？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_prison_6
%s of anti-entropy: These people didn't have to end up like this...
反熵%s: 这些人其实没必要落得这种下场的...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_caves_1
%s of anti-entropy: No human or dwarf has been here for a very long time.
反熵%s: 看起来这里已经很久未被人类和矮人踏足了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_caves_2
%s of anti-entropy: What would cause the dwarves to abandon a gold mine?
反熵%s: 究竟是什么原因让矮人放弃这一整座黄金矿脉的？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_caves_3
%s of anti-entropy: It's a shame all the gold here is useless on the surface.
反熵%s: 这里的黄金在地表上没什么用，真是太可惜了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_caves_4
%s of anti-entropy: The creatures here are twisted, just like in the sewers.
反熵%s: 就像下水道里的一样，这些生物也都被扭曲了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_caves_5
%s of anti-entropy: Even the bats are bloodthirsty here.
反熵%s: 这里连蝙蝠都这么狂暴嗜血。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_caves_6
%s of anti-entropy: No sign of any mining equipment, did the dwarves reclaim it all?
反熵%s: 没有看到任何采矿设备，它们都被矮人回收了吗？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_city_1
%s of anti-entropy: The dwarves were industrious, but greedy.
反熵%s: 矮人一族勤奋，稳重且守信，但他们既贪婪又容易记仇。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_city_2
%s of anti-entropy: So the dwarven metropolis really has fallen.
反熵%s: 看来，矮人都城确实没落了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_city_3
%s of anti-entropy: I hope the surface never ends up like this place.
反熵%s: 我真心希望地表上永远不会变成这副样子。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_city_4
%s of anti-entropy: Dwarves aren't supposed to look so pale.
反熵%s: 矮人的皮肤不应该这么苍白的。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_city_5
%s of anti-entropy: I don't know what's worse, the dwarves, or their creations.
反熵%s: 矮人，还有他们的造物，说不好哪种更差劲。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_city_6
%s of anti-entropy: It seems the dwarves are mindless monsters now as well.
反熵%s: 看来矮人也成了没有思维的怪物。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_halls_1
%s of anti-entropy: What is this place?
反熵%s: 这是什么地方？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_halls_2
%s of anti-entropy: This place is terrifying...
反熵%s: 这里太可怕了...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_halls_3
%s of anti-entropy: What were the dwarves thinking, toying with power like this?
反熵%s: 矮人到底怎么想的，试图将这种力量玩弄于股掌？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_halls_4
%s of anti-entropy: The monsters here are otherworldly, where did they come from?
反熵%s: 这里的怪物太诡异了，它们究竟从何而来？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_halls_5
%s of anti-entropy: Can you feel it? It's like something is watching us.
反熵%s: 感觉到了吗？好像有什么东西在盯着我们。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_halls_6
%s of anti-entropy: Thank goodness there are torches, it's so dark here!
反熵%s: 还好有火把，这里太暗了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_ascension_1
%s of anti-entropy: Why is this happening, I thought we succeeded?
反熵%s: 为什么会发生这样的事情，我们不是成功了吗？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_ascension_2
%s of anti-entropy: How is that thing still able to influence this world?
反熵%s: 那个怪物...怎么还能继续影响这个世界？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_ascension_3
%s of anti-entropy: I hope you know what you're doing with that amulet.
反熵%s: 我希望你明白你正在用那个护符做什么。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_ascension_4
%s of anti-entropy: I suppose we're not done just yet.
反熵%s: 我想我们还没结束。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_ascension_5
%s of anti-entropy: We've come so far already, we can finish this!
反熵%s: 已经走了这么远，我们可以结束这一切了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.dialogue_ascension_6
%s of anti-entropy: Just a little further, we can make it out of here!
反熵%s: 再往前走一点，我们就可以离开这里了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_goo_1
%s of anti-entropy: Beware Goo!
反熵%s: 当心粘咕！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_goo_2
%s of anti-entropy: Many of my friends died to this thing, time for vengeance!
反熵%s: 有太多朋友死在这个家伙手上了，此仇必报！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_goo_3
%s of anti-entropy: Such an abomination cannot be allowed to live!
反熵%s: 绝不能让这个鬼东西活着！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_tengu_1
%s of anti-entropy: The one prisoner left is a deadly assassin. Of course...
反熵%s: 唯一剩下的囚犯是个危险的刺客。真应景...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_tengu_2
%s of anti-entropy: He's trapped us!
反熵%s: 我们被他困住了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_tengu_3
%s of anti-entropy: I've heard horror stories about that mask...
反熵%s: 我听过不少有关那个面具的鬼故事...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_dm300_1
%s of anti-entropy: Only dwarves would build a mining machine that kills intruders.
反熵%s: 让挖矿的机器追杀外来者这种事只有矮人才干得出来。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_dm300_2
%s of anti-entropy: That thing is huge...
反熵%s: 真是个大家伙...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_dm300_3
%s of anti-entropy: How has this thing stayed active for so long?
反熵%s: 这东西怎么弄的，能运作这么久？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_king_1
%s of anti-entropy: When people say power corrupts, this is what they mean.
反熵%s: “权力导致腐败”的说法指的就是这种情况。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_king_2
%s of anti-entropy: He's more of a lich than a king now.
反熵%s: 什么国王，根本就是个巫妖。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_king_3
%s of anti-entropy: Even in death the dwarves obey their master.
反熵%s: 就算死了，这些矮人仍听令于他们的旧主。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_yog_1
%s of anti-entropy: Oh, this doesn't look good.
反熵%s: 呃，这看起来不妙。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_yog_2
%s of anti-entropy: So that's what a god looks like?
反熵%s: 原来神是长这样的？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.seen_yog_3
%s of anti-entropy: This is going to hurt...
反熵%s: 这下子要吃苦了...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.defeated_by_enemy_1
%s of anti-entropy: Good luck...
反熵%s: 祝你接下来好运...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.defeated_by_enemy_2
%s of anti-entropy: Tired... for now...
反熵%s: 暂时有点...累了...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.defeated_by_enemy_3
%s of anti-entropy: I will return...
反熵%s: 我会回来的...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.defeated_by_boss_1
%s of anti-entropy: I'm sorry... good luck...
反熵%s: 抱歉...祝好...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.defeated_by_boss_2
%s of anti-entropy: Finish it off... without me...
反熵%s: 别管我...消灭它...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.defeated_by_boss_3
%s of anti-entropy: No... I can't...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.blessed_ankh_1
%s of anti-entropy: How did you survive that?
反熵%s: 刚才你怎么活下来的？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.blessed_ankh_2
%s of anti-entropy: I wish I had one of those...
反熵%s: 我当时要有个这东西该多好...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.blessed_ankh_3
%s of anti-entropy: Oh my! You're still alive!
反熵%s: 我的天！你还活着！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.player_killed_2
%s of anti-entropy: I couldn't help them...
反熵%s: 我没能帮上忙...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.player_killed_3
%s of anti-entropy: Not like this...
反熵%s: 怎么会这样...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.direct_prompt
%s of anti-entropy: What should I do?
反熵%s: 我应该怎么办？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_follow_1
%s of anti-entropy: Okay, I'll follow you.
反熵%s: 好，我会跟紧的。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_follow_2
%s of anti-entropy: I'll fall in behind you.
反熵%s: 我会跟在你后面。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_follow_3
%s of anti-entropy: Following you...
反熵%s: 跟着你...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_follow_4
%s of anti-entropy: Okay, let's go!
反熵%s: 好，走吧！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_follow_5
%s of anti-entropy: I've got your back.
反熵%s: 我掩护你背后。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_attack_1
%s of anti-entropy: Okay, I'll attack that one.
反熵%s: 好，我打过去。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_attack_2
%s of anti-entropy: I'll get that one.
反熵%s: 我去解决那只。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_attack_3
%s of anti-entropy: Engaging...
反熵%s: 正在接近...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_attack_4
%s of anti-entropy: Let's get them!
反熵%s: 一起上！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_attack_5
%s of anti-entropy: I've got that one.
反熵%s: 那只让我来。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_position_1
%s of anti-entropy: Okay, I'll hold that position.
反熵%s: 好，我守住那里。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_position_2
%s of anti-entropy: I'll go there and defend.
反熵%s: 我去那里防守。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_position_3
%s of anti-entropy: Repositioning...
反熵%s: 正在过去...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_position_4
%s of anti-entropy: On my way!
反熵%s: 在路上！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.directed_position_5
%s of anti-entropy: I'll head over there.
反熵%s: 那我就去那里。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.driedrose$ghosthero.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A frail looking ethereal figure with a humanoid shape. Their power seems tied to the rose you have.\n\nThis ghost may not be much, they seem to be your only true friend down here.
反熵%s: 看起来很脆弱的人型幻影，身形飘渺。它的力量似乎与你手上的玫瑰有关。\n\n这个幽灵并没有什么过人之处，但它应该是你在这里唯一的挚友了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.name
%s of anti-entropy: ethereal chains
反熵%s: 虚空锁链

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.ac_cast
%s of anti-entropy: CAST
反熵%s: 施放

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.rooted
%s of anti-entropy: Your chains cannot pull you while you are rooted.
反熵%s: 锁链无法拉动被缠绕的你。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.no_charge
%s of anti-entropy: Your chains do not have enough charge.
反熵%s: 你的锁链充能不足。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: You can't use cursed chains.
反熵%s: 你不能使用被诅咒的锁链。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.does_nothing
%s of anti-entropy: That won't do anything.
反熵%s: 这样并没有用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.cant_pull
%s of anti-entropy: Your chains cannot pull that target.
反熵%s: 你的锁链不能拉动那个目标。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.cant_reach
%s of anti-entropy: Your chains can't reach there.
反熵%s: 你的锁链无法触及那里。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.inside_wall
%s of anti-entropy: Your chains can only pull you through walls, not into them.
反熵%s: 你的锁链仅能带你穿过墙壁，而非穿入墙壁。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.nothing_to_grab
%s of anti-entropy: There is nothing to grab there.
反熵%s: 目标区域没有可供抓取的物件。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Choose a location to target.
反熵%s: 选择要瞄准的地方

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These large yet lightweight chains glow with spiritual energy. They can be used to pull you towards terrain, or pull enemies toward you. The ethereal nature of the chains even allows them to extend through walls!
反熵%s: 这些巨大但轻盈的锁链散发着灵魂能量。它们可以用来把你拉向一些地形，或将敌人拉向你。无实体的天然特质甚至可以允许其穿透墙壁！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.desc_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The cursed chains are locked to your side, constantly swinging around, trying to trip or bind you.
反熵%s: 被诅咒的锁链将自己锁在了你的身边，不断地在周围晃动，试图绊倒或绑住你。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains.desc_equipped
%s of anti-entropy: The chains rest around your side, slowly siphoning the spiritual energy of those you defeat. Each charge is a link in the chain, which will extend out exactly one tile.
反熵%s: 锁链围绕在你的身边，缓慢地收集被你击败者的精神能量。每一发充能都是锁链中的一环，每一个环节都能正好延长一格。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.etherealchains$chainsrecharge.levelup
%s of anti-entropy: Your chains grow stronger!
反熵%s: 你的锁链变得更强大了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.holytome.name
%s of anti-entropy: holy tome
反熵%s: 神圣法典

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.holytome.ac_cast
%s of anti-entropy: CAST
反熵%s: 施放

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.holytome.no_spell
%s of anti-entropy: You're not able to cast that spell right now.
反熵%s: 你现在不足以施放该法术。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.holytome.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: You cannot use a cursed tome.
反熵%s: 你不能使用被诅咒的圣典。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.holytome.levelup
%s of anti-entropy: Your tome grows stronger!
反熵%s: 你的圣典变得更强大了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.holytome.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A holy tome that acts as a focus for the Cleric's divine magic. Using the tome lets the Cleric cast a variety of magical spells.\n\nThe tome will steadily get more powerful as the Cleric uses it, giving the Cleric more maximum charges and slightly increasing the recharging speed.
反熵%s: 这本圣典能够帮助牧师引导、聚焦自身的神圣魔法，从而使牧师能够施放一系列的法术。\n\n圣典会随着牧师的使用逐步变强，给予牧师更高的最大充能数并略微提升充能速度。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.name
%s of anti-entropy: horn of plenty
反熵%s: 丰饶之角

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.ac_snack
%s of anti-entropy: SNACK
反熵%s: 小吃一口

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.ac_eat
%s of anti-entropy: EAT
反熵%s: 食用

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.ac_store
%s of anti-entropy: STORE
反熵%s: 贮存

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.eat
%s of anti-entropy: You eat from the horn.
反熵%s: 你享用了号角中的食物。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select some food
反熵%s: 选择一个食物

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.no_food
%s of anti-entropy: Your horn has no food in it to eat!
反熵%s: 你的号角里没有食物可供食用！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.full
%s of anti-entropy: Your horn is full of food!
反熵%s: 你的号角装满了食物！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.reject
%s of anti-entropy: Your horn rejects the uncooked blandfruit.
反熵%s: 你的号角并不接受未经烹煮的无味果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.maxlevel
%s of anti-entropy: Your horn has consumed all the food it can!
反熵%s: 你的号角已经吞噬了尽可能多的食物！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.levelup
%s of anti-entropy: The horn consumes your food offering and grows in strength!
反熵%s: 号角吞噬了你提供的食物，变得更加强大了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.feed
%s of anti-entropy: The horn consumes your food offering.
反熵%s: 号角吞噬了你提供的食物。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This horn can't be blown into, but instead seems to fill up with food as you adventure and gain experience. You can consume each charge individually as a snack, or eat until you're full.
反熵%s: 这个号角不能用于吹奏，不过会随着你深入地牢获得经验而逐渐填充食物。你可以一点点慢慢吃，也可以直接大快朵颐地吃到饱。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.desc_hint
%s of anti-entropy: Perhaps there is a way to increase the horn's power by giving it food energy.
反熵%s: 也许可以通过给予它食物的能量来增加号角的力量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.hornofplenty.desc_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The cursed horn has bound itself to your side, it seems to be eager to take food rather than produce it.
反熵%s: 被诅咒的号角把自己绑在了你的身边，它似乎在渴望得到食物而不是制造食物。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.name
%s of anti-entropy: lloyd's beacon
反熵%s: 时空道标

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.ac_zap
%s of anti-entropy: ZAP
反熵%s: 释放

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.ac_set
%s of anti-entropy: SET
反熵%s: 设置

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.ac_return
%s of anti-entropy: RETURN
反熵%s: 返回

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.no_charge
%s of anti-entropy: Your beacon does not have enough energy right now.
反熵%s: 你的信标现在并没有足够的能量支撑发射传送魔法。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.tele_fail
%s of anti-entropy: The teleportation magic fails.
反熵%s: 传送魔法失败了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Choose a location to zap.
反熵%s: 选择要释放魔法的位置

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.levelup
%s of anti-entropy: Your beacon grows stronger!
反熵%s: 你的信标变得更强大了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.preventing
%s of anti-entropy: Strong magic aura of this place prevents you from using the lloyd's beacon!
反熵%s: 这里强大的魔力流使你无法使用时空道标！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.creatures
%s of anti-entropy: Psychic aura of neighbouring creatures doesn't allow you to use the lloyd's beacon at this moment.
反熵%s: 邻近生物的心灵信号正在干扰你的时空道标并使其无法被使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.return
%s of anti-entropy: The lloyd's beacon is successfully set at your current location, now you can return here anytime.
反熵%s: 时空道标被成功设置在了你的当前位置，现在你可以随时返回这里。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Lloyd's beacon is an intricate magical device which grants the user control of teleportation magics. The beacon can be used to return to a set location, but can also expel bursts of random teleportation magic once it has charged from being equipped. This magic can be directed at a target or at the user themselves.
反熵%s: 时空道标是一个赋予使用者控制传送魔法能力的复杂魔法装置。该信标可以用来返回一个预定地点，但其在装备时的充能也可以用来对指定目标发射随机传送魔法。这个魔法可以针对某个目标或使用者自身。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.lloydsbeacon.desc_set
%s of anti-entropy: This beacon was set somewhere on the level %d of Pixel Dungeon.
反熵%s: 信标被设置在了像素地牢第%d层的某处。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.name
%s of anti-entropy: master thieves' armband
反熵%s: 神偷袖章

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.ac_steal
%s of anti-entropy: STEAL
反熵%s: 窃取

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.no_charge
%s of anti-entropy: Your armband does not have enough charge.
反熵%s: 你的袖章充能不足。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: You can't use a cursed armband.
反熵%s: 你不能使用被诅咒的袖章。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.full
%s of anti-entropy: Your armband is fully charged!
反熵%s: 你的袖章充满了能量！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Choose an enemy to target
反熵%s: 选择一个敌人作为目标

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.no_target
%s of anti-entropy: You must target an enemy that is adjacent to you
反熵%s: 你只能选择一个邻近你的目标！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.steal_shopkeeper
%s of anti-entropy: You can't steal from shopkeepers directly.
反熵%s: 你不能直接从店主那里窃取物品。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.no_steal
%s of anti-entropy: That enemy has nothing to steal.
反熵%s: 这个敌人身上没什么好偷的。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.stole_item
%s of anti-entropy: You stole an item: %s.
反熵%s: 你偷到了：%s。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.failed_steal
%s of anti-entropy: You didn't manage to steal anything.
反熵%s: 你什么也没偷到。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.level_up
%s of anti-entropy: Your armband grows stronger!
反熵%s: 你的袖章变得更强大了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This purple velvet armband bears the mark of a master thief. This doesn't belong to you, but it probably didn't belong to its last user either.
反熵%s: 这个紫色的天鹅绒袖标是盗贼大师的标志。它不属于你，但它也不属于你拿到这个袖标时击败的人。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.desc_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The cursed armband is bound to your wrist, and somehow your pouch of gold seems to be slowly getting lighter...
反熵%s: 被诅咒的袖章紧紧地束在你的手腕上，不知怎么你感觉自己的钱袋正在慢慢变轻...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.masterthievesarmband.desc_worn
%s of anti-entropy: You feel power building in the armband on your wrist as you gain experience. You can use this power to steal from shops, or to rob enemies!\n\nRobbing enemies happens instantly, briefly disorients them, and gives you a chance to get whatever loot they have! This power is more effective against unaware enemies. Robbing the same enemy multiple times does not give more chances at loot.
反熵%s: 每当获得经验值，你都感到手腕上的袖章中有一股力量在积蓄。你不仅可以运用这股力量在商店中行窃，还可以用来盗取敌人身上的财物！\n\n盗取敌人不耗时，能短暂剥夺其方向感，还有概率获得他们的所有物！这个力量对未察觉到你的敌人效果更强。对同一个敌人，只有首次劫取有概率抢到战利品。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.name
%s of anti-entropy: sandals of nature
反熵%s: 自然之履

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.name_1
%s of anti-entropy: shoes of nature
反熵%s: 自然之鞋

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.name_2
%s of anti-entropy: boots of nature
反熵%s: 自然之靴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.name_3
%s of anti-entropy: greaves of nature
反熵%s: 自然护腿

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.ac_feed
%s of anti-entropy: FEED
反熵%s: 喂食

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.ac_root
%s of anti-entropy: ROOT
反熵%s: 扎根

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select a seed
反熵%s: 选择一粒种子

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.levelup
%s of anti-entropy: Your footwear surges in size!
反熵%s: 你的鞋子尺寸变大了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.absorb_seed
%s of anti-entropy: The footwear absorbs the seed, they seem healthier.
反熵%s: 鞋子吸收了种子，看起来更健康了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.no_effect
%s of anti-entropy: You must feed a seed to your footwear first.
反熵%s: 你必须先给你的鞋子喂食一粒种子。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.low_charge
%s of anti-entropy: Your footwear don't have enough energy for that.
反熵%s: 你的鞋子还没有足够的能量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.prompt_target
%s of anti-entropy: Select a location
反熵%s: 选择一个位置

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.out_of_range
%s of anti-entropy: That location is out of range.
反熵%s: 那个位置超出了范围。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.desc_1
%s of anti-entropy: What initially seem like sandals made of twine are actually two plants! They seem very weak and pale, perhaps they need to be given nutrients?
反熵%s: 初看像是用麻绳编成的草履实际上是两株植物！它们看上去既虚弱又苍白，也许它们需要一点营养？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.desc_2
%s of anti-entropy: The footwear has grown and now more closely resemble two tailored shoes. Some colour has returned to them, perhaps they can still grow further?
反熵%s: 这双鞋子已经长大了，现在更像是一双量身定制的鞋子。它们已经没那么苍白了，也许还可以进一步成长？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.desc_3
%s of anti-entropy: The plants have grown again and now resembles a pair of solid boots made from bark. The plants seem to have regained their strength, but perhaps they can still grow further?
反熵%s: 这两株植物又长大了。像是一双树皮制成的厚靴子。植物似乎已经恢复了它们的力量，但也许仍能进一步成长？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.desc_4
%s of anti-entropy: The plants seem to have reached their maximum size, they resemble a pair of armored greaves. The greaves are a deep brown and resemble a very sturdy tree.
反熵%s: 植物们似乎已长到最大，就像是一对装甲护腿。这对深棕色护腿看上去仿如一棵非常坚毅的树。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.desc_hint
%s of anti-entropy: You feel more attuned with nature while wearing this artifact.
反熵%s: 穿上这件神器时你感到更加亲近自然了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.desc_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The cursed sandals are blocking any attunement with nature.
反熵%s: 被诅咒的草履切断了一切你与自然的联系。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.desc_ability
%s of anti-entropy: The footwear ripples with the color of the last seed you fed them. They can briefly root into the ground and produce that plant's effect anywhere in a 3 tile radius.\nSeed: _%s_\nCharge needed: _%d%%_
反熵%s: 鞋子泛起你喂给它们的最后一粒种子颜色的涟漪。它可以在地面上暂时扎根并在3格距离内的任意位置产生那种植物的效果。\n当前种子：_%s_\n需要充能：_%d%%_

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.sandalsofnature.desc_seeds
%s of anti-entropy: You have fed the footwear %d seeds.
反熵%s: 你已经给鞋子喂食了%d粒种子。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.talismanofforesight.name
%s of anti-entropy: talisman of foresight
反熵%s: 先见护符

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.talismanofforesight.ac_scry
%s of anti-entropy: SCRY
反熵%s: 探查

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.talismanofforesight.low_charge
%s of anti-entropy: The talisman requires at least 5% charge to scry.
反熵%s: 护符至少要充能5%才能探查。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.talismanofforesight.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Choose a location to scan.
反熵%s: 选择要探查的位置

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.talismanofforesight.levelup
%s of anti-entropy: Your Talisman grows stronger!
反熵%s: 你的护符变得更强大了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.talismanofforesight.full_charge
%s of anti-entropy: Your Talisman is fully charged!
反熵%s: 你的护符充满了能量！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.talismanofforesight.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A smooth stone with strange engravings on it. You feel like it's watching everything around you, keeping an eye out for anything hidden.
反熵%s: 一块雕着奇怪刻纹的光滑石头。它好像是在观察着你周围的一切，留意任何不寻常的东西。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.talismanofforesight.desc_worn
%s of anti-entropy: When you hold the talisman you feel like your senses are heightened. The talisman is slowly building charge as time passes and when you discover hidden doors or traps.\n\nThe talisman can expend its charge to 'scry' in a cone shape, which reveals all tiles and secrets in the scanned area, and will grant you vision of enemies and items for a short time.
反熵%s: 手里拿着护符时，你感到五感都更敏锐了。护符正随着时间慢慢积攒能量，当你发现被隐藏的门或陷阱时会获得额外能量。\n\n护符可以花费能量去“探查”一个扇形的区域，揭示范围内所有的地格与秘密，并且暂时赋予你对范围内敌人与道具的灵视。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.talismanofforesight.desc_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The cursed talisman is intently staring into you, dulling your senses.
反熵%s: 被诅咒的护符深刻地凝视着你，使你的感知钝化。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.talismanofforesight$foresight.name
%s of anti-entropy: foresight
反熵%s: 危险预知

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.talismanofforesight$foresight.uneasy
%s of anti-entropy: You feel uneasy.
反熵%s: 你感到很不安。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.talismanofforesight$foresight.desc
%s of anti-entropy: You feel very nervous, as if there is nearby unseen danger.
反熵%s: 你感到非常焦虑，仿佛周遭有未被发现的危险。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.name
%s of anti-entropy: timekeeper's hourglass
反熵%s: 时光沙漏

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.ac_activate
%s of anti-entropy: ACTIVATE
反熵%s: 激活

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.deactivate
%s of anti-entropy: You deactivate the time freeze.
反熵%s: 你取消了时间冻结。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.no_charge
%s of anti-entropy: Your hourglass hasn't recharged enough to be usable yet.
反熵%s: 你的沙漏充能还不足以用来激活。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: You cannot use a cursed hourglass.
反熵%s: 你不能使用被诅咒的沙漏。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.onstasis
%s of anti-entropy: The world seems to shift around you in an instant.
反熵%s: 你周遭的世界似乎就在这一瞬间变化了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.onfreeze
%s of anti-entropy: Everything around you suddenly freezes.
反熵%s: 你周围的一切突然都彻底静止下来。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.stasis
%s of anti-entropy: Put myself in stasis
反熵%s: 使我彻底停滞

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.freeze
%s of anti-entropy: Freeze time around me
反熵%s: 冻结周围时间

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.prompt
%s of anti-entropy:
How would you like to use the hourglass's magic?

While in stasis, time will move normally while you are frozen and completely invulnerable, consumes up to 2 charges at a time.

When time is frozen, you can move as if your actions take no time. This can be deactivated at any time by using the hourglass or attacking.
反熵%s:
你想要如何使用沙漏的魔法？

停滞你自己的时间，周遭的时间会继续正常流动，而你将身处冻结的时间中，动弹不得却也刀枪不入。每这样做一次，沙漏都会消耗两点能量。

冻结外界的时间，你的一举一动都将瞬间完成。这种冻结能够通过再次使用沙漏或进行攻击随时取消。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This large ornate hourglass looks fairly unassuming, but you feel a great power in its finely carved frame. As you rotate the hourglass and watch the sand pour you can feel its magic tugging at you, surely using this magic would give you some control over time.
反熵%s: 这只大型的华贵沙漏看起来却并不怎么起眼，但你仍觉得它精雕细刻的框架内蕴含着某种强大的力量。在翻转沙漏、在看着沙子流下的同时，你能感受到一种魔法正在拉扯着你，使用这种魔法肯定能给你一些控制时间的方法。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.desc_hint
%s of anti-entropy: The hourglass seems to have lost some sand, if only you could find some...
反熵%s: 沙漏似乎失去了一些沙子，如果你能再找到一些...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass.desc_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The cursed hourglass is locked to your side, you can feel it trying to manipulate your flow of time.
反熵%s: 被诅咒的沙漏把它自己锁在了你的身边，你可以感觉它试图操纵你的时间流动。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass$timefreeze.name
%s of anti-entropy: Time Freeze
反熵%s: 时间冻结

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass$timefreeze.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Time is frozen around you, allowing you to perform actions instantly. The effect will last until it is cancelled or your hourglass runs out of charge. Attacking or using magic will break this effect as well.\n\nTurns until charge use: %s.
反熵%s: 外界的时间已被冻结，现在你可以在一瞬间完成任何行动。该状态会一直持续下去，除非你主动取消了它，或者你的沙漏用尽了充能。实施攻击或使用魔法同样会取消该效果。\n\n距离下次消耗充能还有：%s回合

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass$sandbag.name
%s of anti-entropy: bag of magic sand
反熵%s: 一包魔力流沙

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass$sandbag.levelup
%s of anti-entropy: You add the sand to your hourglass.
反熵%s: 你将沙子填入到你的沙漏中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass$sandbag.maxlevel
%s of anti-entropy: Your hourglass is filled with magical sand!
反熵%s: 你的沙漏填满了魔法沙子！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass$sandbag.no_hourglass
%s of anti-entropy: You have no hourglass to place this sand into.
反熵%s: 你没有沙漏来存放这些沙子。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.timekeepershourglass$sandbag.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This small bag of fine sand should work perfectly with your hourglass.\n\nIt seems odd that the shopkeeper would have this specific item right when you need it...
反熵%s: 这一小包细沙应该能够在你的沙漏上完美使用。\n\n每次当你需要这种东西时，店主刚好都有摆上店面的存货，这相当奇怪...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.name
%s of anti-entropy: unstable spellbook
反熵%s: 无序魔典

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.ac_read
%s of anti-entropy: READ
反熵%s: 阅读

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.ac_add
%s of anti-entropy: ADD
反熵%s: 加入

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.blinded
%s of anti-entropy: You cannot read from the book while blinded.
反熵%s: 你不能在失明的时候阅读书籍。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.no_charge
%s of anti-entropy: Your spellbook is out of energy for now.
反熵%s: 你的咒语书耗尽了能量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: You cannot read from a cursed spellbook.
反熵%s: 被诅咒的魔典锁死了书页，你无法阅读它。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select a scroll
反熵%s: 选择一个卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.infuse_scroll
%s of anti-entropy: You infuse the scroll's energy into the book.
反熵%s: 你将卷轴的能量注入了书中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.unable_scroll
%s of anti-entropy: You are unable to add this scroll to the book.
反熵%s: 你无法将这个卷轴添加到书中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.unknown_scroll
%s of anti-entropy: You're not sure what type of scroll this is yet.
反熵%s: 你仍然不清楚这个卷轴的种类。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This Tome is in surprising good condition given its age. It fizzes and crackles as you move the pages, surging with unstable energy. If you read from this book, there's no telling what spell you might cast.
反熵%s: 这本魔典就其年岁而言被保养得异常好。当你翻动页面时它不断地噼啪作响并发出嘶嘶声，涌动着不稳定的能量。一旦诵读这本书，没人能笃定你会释放出什么咒语。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.desc_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The cursed book has bound itself to you, it is inhibiting your ability to use most scrolls.
反熵%s: 被诅咒的魔典将自己绑在了你身上，并在抑制你使用大部分卷轴的能力。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.desc_index
%s of anti-entropy: The book is incomplete. Its index is currently pointing to the following blank pages:
反熵%s: 这本魔典的目录并不完整，目录指向的白页上写着：

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.desc_empowered
%s of anti-entropy: The scrolls that you've added to the book are glowing with power. You will be able to choose the exotic version of these scroll's effects, but at the cost of an additional charge.
反熵%s: 被你放进书中的卷轴闪耀着魔力的微光。你能够利用魔典进一步激发卷轴能力，展现出秘卷效果，但这样也会消耗你额外的充能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.artifacts.unstablespellbook.read_empowered
%s of anti-entropy: The scroll you added to the spellbook surges with energy. You are able to channel either the regular, or exotic version of this scroll's effect.\n\nChoosing the exotic variant will cost 2 charges instead of 1.
反熵%s: 被你放入魔典的卷轴都充满了魔法能量。你可以自主选择导引出该卷轴的正常或秘卷能力。\n\n如果选择释放秘卷能力，则会消耗2点魔典充能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bags.bag.name
%s of anti-entropy: backpack
反熵%s: 背包

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bags.potionbandolier.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion bandolier
反熵%s: 药剂挎带

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bags.potionbandolier.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This thick bandolier fits around your chest like a sash, it has many insulated straps on it to hold potion vials, your waterskin, or liquid metal vials.\n\nWhile inside the bandolier, your potions should be protected from the cold.
反熵%s: 这副厚实的挎带能像肩带一样缠在身上，上面有许多用来放药剂、水袋和液金的隔热皮带。\n\n挎带应该能为存放其中的药剂抵御寒冷。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bags.scrollholder.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll holder
反熵%s: 卷轴筒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bags.scrollholder.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This tubular container looks like it would hold an astronomer's tools and charts, but your scrolls will fit just as well. There's even a few side compartments which would nicely fit spell crystals, arcane styli, and arcane resin.\n\nThe holder doesn't look very flammable, so your scrolls should be safe from fire inside it.
反熵%s: 这个管状的容器看起来可以装下一整份天文学家的手书，不过你的卷轴也刚好能放在里面。里面甚至有一些能用来放置法术结晶、奥术刻笔和奥术树脂的小隔间。\n\n这个容器看起来并不是很可燃，所以你的卷轴在里面一定很安全。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bags.velvetpouch.name
%s of anti-entropy: velvet pouch
反熵%s: 绒布袋

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bags.velvetpouch.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This small velvet pouch can store many small items in it, such as seeds, runestones, and some alchemy ingredients.
反熵%s: 这个丝绒制作的小袋子能装下很多像是种子、符石和炼金原料这样的小道具。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bags.magicalholster.name
%s of anti-entropy: magical holster
反熵%s: 魔法筒袋

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bags.magicalholster.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
This slim holster is made from some exotic animal hide, and possesses powerful magic which lets it store a massive amount of ranged weapons.

You can simply reach into the bag and will always grab the item you were looking for.

Due to the holster's magic, wands will charge slightly faster and thrown weapons will last slightly longer inside of it.
反熵%s:
这款细长的皮制筒袋由某种异域动物的毛皮制成。强大的附魔使其拥有能收纳大量远程类武器道具的能力。

只需伸手一探，想要的道具就会出现在你的手上。

筒袋中涌动的魔力流还能小幅强化其中法杖的充能及投掷武器的耐久度。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.arcanebomb.name
%s of anti-entropy: arcane bomb
反熵%s: 奥术炸弹

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.arcanebomb.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This bomb has been imbued with arcane properties. It will explode into a powerful blast similar to Goo's pumped up attack, dealing _%1$d-%2$d magical damage_ to anything within 2 tiles.
反熵%s: 这枚炸弹里灌注了奥术能量，当其爆炸时会释放出类似于粘咕蓄力攻击的强力冲击，在2格范围内对所有单位造成_%1$d~%2$d点魔法伤害_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.bomb.name
%s of anti-entropy: bomb
反熵%s: 炸弹

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.bomb.ac_lightthrow
%s of anti-entropy: LIGHT & THROW
反熵%s: 点燃并扔出

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.bomb.snuff_fuse
%s of anti-entropy: You quickly snuff the bomb's fuse.
反熵%s: 你迅速掐灭了炸弹引线。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.bomb.ondeath
%s of anti-entropy: The explosion kills you...
反熵%s: 爆炸杀死了你...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.bomb.rankings_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Killed by an explosion
反熵%s: 死于爆炸

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.bomb.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A fairly hefty black powder bomb. An explosion from this bomb deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ to anything adjacent to it, and will destroy some adjacent terrain or items.
反熵%s: 一枚颇大的黑火药炸弹。爆炸时，这枚炸弹会对所有临近单位造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并摧毁某些地形或物品。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.bomb.desc_fuse
%s of anti-entropy: It looks like the fuse will take a couple rounds to burn down once it is lit.
反熵%s: 看起来引信在点燃后还能烧几回合。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.bomb.desc_burning
%s of anti-entropy: The bomb's fuse is burning away, keep your distance or put it out!
反熵%s: 引信快烧完了，保持距离或者赶紧掐灭！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.bomb$doublebomb.name
%s of anti-entropy: two bombs
反熵%s: 一对炸弹

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.bomb$doublebomb.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A stack of two hefty black powder bombs, looks like you get one free!
反熵%s: 两枚装的黑火药重装炸弹，看起来多出来的那个是免费送你的！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.firebomb.name
%s of anti-entropy: firebomb
反熵%s: 燃烧弹

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.firebomb.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This bomb has been modified to explode in a larger area, dealing _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and spreading sustained flame within 2 tiles.
反熵%s: 这枚改造过的炸弹的爆炸范围更大，在2格范围内造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并释放出持续燃烧的烈火。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.flashbangbomb.name
%s of anti-entropy: flashbang
反熵%s: 闪光弹

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.flashbangbomb.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This customized bomb will erupt into a blast of light, sound, and electricity when it explodes. Anything within 2 tiles will take _%1$d-%2$d damage_ from the explosion, an additional 25%% damage from the electricity, and be stunned for 10 turns.
反熵%s: 这枚改造过的炸弹在爆炸时会爆发出一阵电闪雷鸣。在2格范围内的所有单位不仅会受到爆炸的_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_和电击的额外25%%伤害，还会被麻痹10回合。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.frostbomb.name
%s of anti-entropy: frost bomb
反熵%s: 冰霜炸弹

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.frostbomb.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This bomb has been modified to explode in a larger area, dealing _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and spreading a sustained gust of freezing air within 2 tiles.
反熵%s: 这枚改造过的炸弹的爆炸范围更大，在2格范围内造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并释放出持续冻结的冰霜。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.holybomb.name
%s of anti-entropy: holy bomb
反熵%s: 神圣炸弹

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.holybomb.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This bomb has been modified to flash holy light in a larger area when it explodes. Anything within 2 tiles will take _%1$d-%2$d damage_ from the explosion, and undead or demonic enemies will take an additional 50%% damage from the holy light.
反熵%s: 这枚改造过的炸弹会在爆炸时在大范围内闪耀出圣光。在2格范围内的所有单位会受到爆炸的_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，并且亡灵和恶魔敌人还会受到圣光的50%%额外伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.noisemaker.name
%s of anti-entropy: noisemaker
反熵%s: 噪音地雷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.noisemaker.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This customized bomb will repeatedly make noise when its fuse runs out. When something touches the bomb, it will explode and deal _%1$d-%2$d damage_ to anything within 2 tiles!
