反熵%s: 这枚改造过的炸弹会周而复始地发出噪音，直到其引信燃烧殆尽。当有什么东西碰到炸弹时，炸弹会爆炸并在2格范围内对所有单位造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.noisemaker.desc_burning
%s of anti-entropy: The noisemaker is ticking away, it'll explode when something gets near!
反熵%s: 噪音地雷引信已点燃，有东西接近就会爆炸！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.smokebomb.name
%s of anti-entropy: smoke bomb
反熵%s: 烟雾弹

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.smokebomb.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This bomb has been modified to spew a thick cloud of gas at the same time as exploding. It will deal _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and spread shrouding fog within 2 tiles.
反熵%s: 这枚改造过的炸弹会在爆炸时释放出一阵浓厚的气体烟云。炸弹会在2格范围内造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并释放暗夜迷雾。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.regrowthbomb.name
%s of anti-entropy: regrowth bomb
反熵%s: 再生炸弹

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.regrowthbomb.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This customized bomb will splash life-giving liquid everywhere within 3 tiles instead of exploding. The area caught in the blast will rapidly sprout grass and plants. Yourself and any allies caught in the blast will be healed as if they had drank a potion of healing.
反熵%s: 这枚改造过的炸弹不会爆炸，而会在3格范围内四处溅射再生药液。被药液影响的区域会迅速生长出草木与植物，而你自己和爆炸范围内的所有盟友都会受到如同饮用治疗药剂般的治疗效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.shrapnelbomb.name
%s of anti-entropy: shrapnel bomb
反熵%s: 破片炸弹

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.shrapnelbomb.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This bomb has been modified with scraps of DM-300's metal, which will fragment and fly everywhere when it explodes, dealing _%1$d-%2$d damage_ in a huge range around the bomb. You had better hide behind something when using it...
反熵%s: 这枚改造过的炸弹的外壳由DM-300的金属残骸制成，当其爆炸时外壳会碎裂为破片并向四周迸发，在炸弹周围的巨大范围内造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_。使用时你最好躲在某处掩体后面...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.woollybomb.name
%s of anti-entropy: woolly bomb
反熵%s: 绵绵炸弹

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.bombs.woollybomb.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This customized bomb will create a wide field of magical sheep after exploding. The explosion will deal _%1$d-%2$d damage_ to anything within 2 tiles. The sheep will block movement and persist for a very long time! The sheep will not last as long in the presence of powerful enemies though, and can be manually dispelled sooner by interacting with them.
反熵%s: 这枚改造过的炸弹会在爆炸后创造出魔法羊群。爆炸会对2格范围内的所有单位造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_。羊群会阻挡单位的移动，并会存在相当长一段时间！然而，羊群无法在强敌面前存在太久，而且羊群也可以通过与之互动被人为地提前消除。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.berry.name
%s of anti-entropy: dungeon berry
反熵%s: 地牢浆果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.berry.eat_msg
%s of anti-entropy: That berry was tasty!
反熵%s: 酸甜可口，真棒！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.berry.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This small berry was found by the Huntress among the dungeon's vegetation. It can be eaten quickly, restores a small amount of satiety, and might contain a usable seed!
反熵%s: 这颗小浆果是女猎手在地牢的植被里找到的，它可以被快速食用以获得少量饱腹感，还可能有实用的种子包含其中！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.name
%s of anti-entropy: blandfruit
反熵%s: 无味果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.cooked
%s of anti-entropy: cooked blandfruit
反熵%s: 熟无味果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.sunfruit
%s of anti-entropy: sunfruit
反熵%s: 阳光果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.rotfruit
%s of anti-entropy: rotfruit
反熵%s: 腐朽果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.earthfruit
%s of anti-entropy: earthfruit
反熵%s: 地缚果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.blindfruit
%s of anti-entropy: blindfruit
反熵%s: 目盲果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.firefruit
%s of anti-entropy: firefruit
反熵%s: 火焰果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.icefruit
%s of anti-entropy: icefruit
反熵%s: 冰霜果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.fadefruit
%s of anti-entropy: fadefruit
反熵%s: 渐隐果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.sorrowfruit
%s of anti-entropy: sorrowfruit
反熵%s: 忧伤果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.stormfruit
%s of anti-entropy: stormfruit
反熵%s: 暴风果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.dreamfruit
%s of anti-entropy: magefruit
反熵%s: 法皇果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.starfruit
%s of anti-entropy: starfruit
反熵%s: 星陨果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.swiftfruit
%s of anti-entropy: swiftfruit
反熵%s: 速行果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.raw
%s of anti-entropy: You can't bear to eat it raw.
反熵%s: 你没法忍受生吃这玩意儿。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.desc
%s of anti-entropy: So dry and insubstantial, perhaps stewing it with another ingredient would improve it.
反熵%s: 干燥且脆弱，或许加点其他材料再煮能够增强它的效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.desc_cooked
%s of anti-entropy: The fruit has plumped up from its time soaking in the pot and has even absorbed the properties of the seed it was cooked with. It will have the effect of whatever potion the seed corresponded to.
反熵%s: 这个果实已经因为吸收锅中的汤而鼓胀，并且吸收了其中种子的属性。它具有这粒种子对应的药剂效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.desc_eat
%s of anti-entropy: It looks ready to be eaten!
反熵%s: 看起来已经可以吃了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit.desc_throw
%s of anti-entropy: It seems pretty volatile, it might be best to throw it.
反熵%s: 它似乎性质很不稳定，最好作为武器丢出去。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit$chunks.name
%s of anti-entropy: blandfruit chunks
反熵%s: 无味果块

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.blandfruit$chunks.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The blandfruit has exploded on impact, leaving inert chunks behind.\n\nDespite a bit of dirt, these large chunks of cooked blandfruit seem perfectly edible.
反熵%s: 无味果触地爆炸，碎成了一地的普通果块。\n\n尽管上面沾上了尘土，这些大块的熟制无味果应该可以安全食用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.chargrilledmeat.name
%s of anti-entropy: chargrilled meat
反熵%s: 烤肉

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.chargrilledmeat.desc
%s of anti-entropy: It looks like a decent steak.
反熵%s: 看起来像块好肉排。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.food.name
%s of anti-entropy: ration of food
反熵%s: 口粮

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.food.ac_eat
%s of anti-entropy: EAT
反熵%s: 食用

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.food.eat_msg
%s of anti-entropy: That food tasted delicious!
反熵%s: 吃起来不错！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.food.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Nothing fancy here: dried meat, some biscuits - things like that.
反熵%s: 里面都是些寻常玩意：一片肉干，几块饼干——诸如此类。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.frozencarpaccio.name
%s of anti-entropy: frozen carpaccio
反熵%s: 冷冻生肉片

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.frozencarpaccio.invis
%s of anti-entropy: You see your hands turn invisible!
反熵%s: 你看到自己的手隐形了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.frozencarpaccio.hard
%s of anti-entropy: You feel your skin harden!
反熵%s: 你感到皮肤变硬了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.frozencarpaccio.refresh
%s of anti-entropy: Refreshing!
反熵%s: 神清气爽！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.frozencarpaccio.better
%s of anti-entropy: You feel better!
反熵%s: 你感觉好多了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.frozencarpaccio.desc
%s of anti-entropy: It's a piece of frozen raw meat. The only way to eat it is by cutting thin slices of it. And this way it's surprisingly good.
反熵%s: 这是份速冻生肉，只能切成薄片取食，而且意外的好吃。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.meatpie.name
%s of anti-entropy: meat pie
反熵%s: 全肉大饼

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.meatpie.eat_msg
%s of anti-entropy: That food was incredible!
反熵%s: 这食物味道真棒！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.meatpie.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A delicious pie filled with savoury meat. This will satiate you far more than any other meal.
反熵%s: 一份填满了美味肉馅的诱人大饼。吃下它后你会获得远高于其他食物的饱足感。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.mysterymeat.name
%s of anti-entropy: mystery meat
反熵%s: 神秘的肉

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.mysterymeat.eat_msg
%s of anti-entropy: That food tasted... strange.
反熵%s: 这玩意儿吃起来很...奇怪。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.mysterymeat.hot
%s of anti-entropy: Oh it's hot!
反熵%s: 嗷！好烫！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.mysterymeat.legs
%s of anti-entropy: You can't feel your legs!
反熵%s: 你的腿没有知觉了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.mysterymeat.not_well
%s of anti-entropy: You are not feeling well.
反熵%s: 你感觉...不太好。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.mysterymeat.stuffed
%s of anti-entropy: You are stuffed.
反熵%s: 你吃撑了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.mysterymeat.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Eat at your own risk!
反熵%s: 想吃可以，后果自腹！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.mysterymeat$placeholder.name
%s of anti-entropy: meat
反熵%s: 肉

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.phantommeat.name
%s of anti-entropy: phantom meat
反熵%s: 幻影鱼肉

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.phantommeat.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A large glistening translucent steak, cut from a phantom piranha. This magical meat doesn't need to be cooked and grants a number of defensive benefits in addition to fully satiating you. When eaten it will grant invisibility, barkskin, some healing, and cures many harmful effects.
反熵%s: 这块从幻影食人鱼身上切下的大块鱼肉呈半透明状，闪烁着奇光。这块充满魔力的肉无须烹饪即可食用，不但能完全填饱你的肚子，而且能赋予多种防御性增益。食用后，它会为你提供隐形、树肤和少量治疗，并净化大部分有害效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.name
%s of anti-entropy: pasty
反熵%s: 馅饼

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.fish_name
%s of anti-entropy: steamed fish
反熵%s: 清蒸荷叶鱼

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.amulet_name
%s of anti-entropy: amulet of yendor?
反熵%s: Yendor护符？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.egg_name
%s of anti-entropy: easter egg
反熵%s: 复活节彩蛋

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.rainbow_name
%s of anti-entropy: rainbow potion
反熵%s: 虹色药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.shattered_name
%s of anti-entropy: green cake
反熵%s: 绿色蛋糕

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.pie_name
%s of anti-entropy: pumpkin pie
反熵%s: 南瓜派

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.vanilla_name
%s of anti-entropy: blue cake
反熵%s: 蓝色蛋糕

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.cane_name
%s of anti-entropy: candy cane
反熵%s: 拐杖糖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.sparkling_name
%s of anti-entropy: sparkling potion
反熵%s: 气泡药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.desc
%s of anti-entropy: An authentic Cornish pasty with a traditional filling of beef and potato. Delicious!
反熵%s: 这是份正宗康郡肉馅饼，内含牛肉加土豆的传统馅料。美味十足！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.fish_desc
%s of anti-entropy: A whole steamed fish, magically preserved on a bed of greens. It's tradition to save some fish for later around this time of year, so you'll keep some leftovers instead of eating it all at once.\n\nHappy Lunar New Year!
反熵%s: 被荷叶包裹，以法术贮藏的清蒸鲈鱼。逢此年月，有将鱼剩下的习俗，取年年有余之意，于是你也决定不将这条蒸鱼一次吃完。\n\n新年快乐！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.amulet_desc
%s of anti-entropy: You've finally found it, the magical amulet of - wait a minute, this is just a foil-wrapped chocolate made to look like the amulet! It won't grant you limitless power, but at least it'll fill you up and give you a little artifact charge.\n\nApril Fools!
反熵%s: 你终于找到它了，神奇的护...噢不，这只是一块以箔纸包装的巧克力而已，它只是看起来像护符！它带不来无限的力量，但却能让你完全吃饱，还能提供短暂的神器充能效果。\n\n愚人节快乐！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.egg_desc
%s of anti-entropy: A great big chocolate egg, wrapped in colorful yellow foil. There's easily enough chocolate here to fill you up, and the sugar might give your artifacts a tiny bit of extra charge.\n\nHappy Easter!
反熵%s: 一个硕大的巧克力蛋，被五彩斑斓的箔纸包装着。这种体量的巧克力可以轻松将你填饱，其中的糖分还能为神器提供短暂的额外充能效果。\n\n复活节快乐！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.rainbow_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This colorful potion is a kind of liquid food. In addition to satisfying your hunger, it has a little magic in it which will calm an adjacent non-boss enemy, making them temporarily hesitant to fight you.\n\nHappy Pride!
反熵%s: 这瓶多彩的药剂是一种液态食物。它不仅可以充饥，其中还蕴含着能魅惑一名相邻非boss敌人的小型法术，能令其暂时不愿与你交战。\n\n节日快乐！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.shattered_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This large slice of vanilla cake has colorful sprinkles and green frosting. The cake was made to celebrate years of experience, and will grant a small amount of that experience to you when eaten.\n\nShattered Pixel Dungeon was first released on August 5th 2014. Happy birthday Shattered Pixel Dungeon!
反熵%s: 这一大块香草蛋糕上裹上了一层绿色糖霜，其上洒满各色糖碎。这样的蛋糕被用于庆祝某人事物积累若干年履历的时刻，而这份履历也会在你吃下时作为经验分得一部分。\n\n破碎的像素地牢于2014年8月5日问世。祝破碎地牢生日快乐！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.pie_desc
%s of anti-entropy: A great big slice of pumpkin pie. Its sweet and spicy flavor will fill you up and give you a tiny bit of healing.\n\nHappy Halloween!
反熵%s: 好大的一块南瓜派！甘甜又微辣，它会填饱你的肚子并让你恢复少量生命。\n\n万圣节快乐！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.vanilla_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This large slice of vanilla cake has colorful sprinkles and blue frosting. The cake was made to celebrate years of experience, and will grant a small amount of that experience to you when eaten.\n\nThe original Pixel Dungeon was first released on December 4th 2012. Happy birthday Pixel Dungeon!
反熵%s: 这一大块香草蛋糕上裹上了一层蓝色糖霜，其上洒满各色糖碎。这样的蛋糕被用于庆祝某人事物积累若干年履历的时刻，而这份履历也会在你吃下时作为经验分得一部分。\n\n原版像素地牢于2012年12月4日问世。祝像素地牢生日快乐！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.cane_desc
%s of anti-entropy: A huge sugary sweet candy cane. It's big enough to fill you up, and the sugar might give your wands a tiny bit of extra charge too.\n\nHappy Holidays!
反熵%s: 甜度爆表的巨型拐杖糖！大到够你一次吃饱，其中的糖分或许还能让你的法杖获得少量额外充能。\n\n假日快乐！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty.sparkling_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This sparkling potion is a kind of liquid food. It satisfies hunger and simulates sparkling wine, but isn't actually alcoholic. The warm feeling in your belly will grant a little bit of shielding.\n\nHappy New Year!
反熵%s: 这瓶起泡的药剂是一种液态食物。这种果腹之物尝起来和气泡酒别无二致，但实际上并不含酒精。这股流经腹部的暖流能为你提供少量护盾。\n\n元旦快乐！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty$fishleftover.name
%s of anti-entropy: fish leftovers
反熵%s: 余鱼

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty$fishleftover.eat_msg
%s of anti-entropy: That food tasted ok.
反熵%s: 吃起来还行。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.pasty$fishleftover.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Some surplus fish from your previous meal. You can eat it any time you like to restore a little hunger.
反熵%s: 你上一顿吃剩的鱼。你可以随时把它吃完，这能恢复你少量的饱食度。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.smallration.name
%s of anti-entropy: small food ration
反熵%s: 小包口粮

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.smallration.eat_msg
%s of anti-entropy: That food tasted ok.
反熵%s: 吃起来还行。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.smallration.desc
%s of anti-entropy: It looks exactly like a standard ration of food but smaller.
反熵%s: 它看起来和普通口粮一样，就是小了点。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.stewedmeat.name
%s of anti-entropy: stewed meat
反熵%s: 炖肉

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.stewedmeat.eat_msg
%s of anti-entropy: That food tasted ok.
反熵%s: 吃起来还行。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.stewedmeat.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Stewing the meat has cleansed it of any disease or parasites. It should be safe to eat.
反熵%s: 烹煮的过程中杀死了肉上面可能携带的任何病菌或是寄生虫。现在应该可以安全的食用它了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.supplyration.name
%s of anti-entropy: supply ration
反熵%s: 备用口粮

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.food.supplyration.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ration was left in the dungeon by and for members of the thieves guild. It's specifically designed to be eaten on the go, and aid with general skullduggery.\n\nWhile it doesn't fill you up as much as a regular ration, it can be eaten quickly, provides a little direct healing, and will restore a charge to the Rogue's cloak of shadows.
反熵%s: 这是一包由盗贼公会存放，供其成员取用的口粮。这包口粮专门被设计成可快速食用的样式，并且能为成员的隐秘行动提供诸多帮助。\n\n尽管不能像正常口粮一样填饱你，它却能被快速食用，恢复少量生命，并且回复盗贼的暗影斗篷一点神器充能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.documentpage.name
%s of anti-entropy: torn page
反熵%s: 被撕下的书页

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.documentpage.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A lone page, probably torn from a book of some sort. You'll need to pick it up to read it.
反熵%s: 一张被遗弃的书页，似乎是从一本书上撕下来的。你需要捡起它才能阅读上面的内容。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.alchemypage.name
%s of anti-entropy: torn alchemy book page
反熵%s: 被撕下的炼金指南书页

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.alchemypage.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
A torn page from a guidebook on alchemy.

Most of the text is too small to read at a distance, but you can make out the title of the page:

_"%s"_
反熵%s:
从一本炼金指南书上撕下来的一页。

在远处你只能看到一行行密密麻麻的小字，不过你仍然可以看清书页上的标题

_"%s"_

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.guidebook.name
%s of anti-entropy: tome of dungeon mastery
反熵%s: 地牢探索指南

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.guidebook.hint_mobile
%s of anti-entropy: Your guidebook has advice for you! Tap the blinking journal button to read it.
反熵%s: 你的指南有新的建议要告诉你！点击闪烁的日志按钮进行阅读。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.guidebook.hint_desktop
%s of anti-entropy: Your guidebook has advice for you! Select the blinking journal button (%s) to read it.
反熵%s: 你的指南有新的建议要告诉你！选择闪烁的日志按钮(%s)进行阅读。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.guidebook.hint_status
%s of anti-entropy: Guidebook
反熵%s: 指南

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.guidebook.desc
%s of anti-entropy: An adventurer's guidebook, left here by someone who decided adventuring wasn't for them! This particular book is magical, and can prompt adventurers to read a page at the right moment.\n\nDespite that functionality, the book is most popular because of the big words "Don't Panic!" written in large friendly letters on the cover.
反熵%s:
一本静静躺在地上的地牢探索指南，不知被谁遗弃在此。看来冒险不是很适合它的旧主人！

这本精致而独特的书附有魔法，会在需要的时候主动提醒冒险家去翻阅它。

除去强大的功能，这本书走红的原因还有一点：它的封面上用友好而亲切的大字写着“不 要 恐 慌 ！”

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.guidepage.name
%s of anti-entropy: torn guidebook page
反熵%s: 被撕下的指南书页

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.guidepage.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
A torn page from an adventuring guidebook.

Most of the text is too small to read at a distance, but you can make out the title of the page:

_"%s"_
反熵%s:
从一本冒险指南书上撕下来的一页。

在远处你只能看见一行行密密麻麻的小字，不过你可以看清书页上的标题：

_"%s"_

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.regionlorepage$sewers.name
%s of anti-entropy: worn letter
反熵%s: 磨旧的信笺

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.regionlorepage$sewers.desc
%s of anti-entropy: What looks to be a letter, written on a dirt-stained piece of paper. You'll need to pick it up to be able to make out what's written on it.
反熵%s: 看起来像是一封信，写在一张沾满灰尘的纸上。你需要把它捡起来才能看清上面写着什么。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.regionlorepage$prison.name
%s of anti-entropy: worn journal entry
反熵%s: 磨损的日志条目

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.regionlorepage$prison.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A journal entry, or some other kind of record, written on an old piece of paper. It seems to have fared better than the letters you found in the sewers, but you'll still need to pick it up to read it.
反熵%s: 写在老旧纸张上的日记条目或其他记录。这似乎比你在下水道里找到的信看起来好一些，但你仍然需要捡起它才能阅读上面的内容。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.regionlorepage$caves.name
%s of anti-entropy: old log entry
反熵%s: 老旧的日志条目

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.regionlorepage$caves.desc
%s of anti-entropy: What looks to be an entry in an explorer's logbook, preserved surprisingly well despite how old it must be. Pick it up to read it.
反熵%s: 看起来是探险家日志中的一个条目，尽管它肯定很旧，但保存得出奇得好。捡起它来阅读上面的内容。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.regionlorepage$city.name
%s of anti-entropy: rusted tablet
反熵%s: 锈蚀的便签

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.regionlorepage$city.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A small rusted metal tablet with a message magically etched into it. The letters are still clear despite the tablet's age, but you'll have to pick it up to read it.
反熵%s: 一块生锈的小金属板，上面神奇地刻着一条信息。尽管它年代久远，可字母仍然清晰，但你必须捡起它才能阅读上面的内容。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.regionlorepage$halls.name
%s of anti-entropy: glowing tablet
反熵%s: 发光的便签

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.journal.regionlorepage$halls.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A small black tablet with glowing green letters etched into it. The glowing letters blur together into a haze at a distance, you'll have to pick it up to read it.
反熵%s: 一块黑色的小板，上面刻有发光的绿色字母。发光的字母在远处模糊成一团薄雾，你必须捡起它才能阅读上面的内容。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.keys.goldenkey.name
%s of anti-entropy: golden key
反熵%s: 金钥匙

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.keys.goldenkey.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The notches on this golden key are tiny and intricate. Perhaps it will open a locked chest?
反熵%s: 这把黄金钥匙的齿纹精妙而复杂。或许可以用它来打开某个上锁的宝箱？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.keys.crystalkey.name
%s of anti-entropy: Crystal key
反熵%s: 水晶钥匙

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.keys.crystalkey.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The cut surfaces of this crystalline key shimmer in the darkness. Perhaps it will open something made of crystal?
反熵%s: 这把水晶钥匙在黑暗中反射着光芒。或许可以用它来打开某样水晶制品？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.keys.ironkey.name
%s of anti-entropy: iron key
反熵%s: 铁钥匙

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.keys.ironkey.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The notches on this ancient iron key are well worn; its leather lanyard is battered by age. What door might it open?
反熵%s: 这个铁钥匙的匙齿已经严重磨损；皮制系带也久经年岁摧残。它对应的是哪扇门呢?

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.keys.skeletonkey.name
%s of anti-entropy: skeleton key
反熵%s: 骷髅钥匙

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.keys.skeletonkey.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This key looks serious: its head is shaped like a skull. Probably it can open some serious door.
反熵%s: 这个钥匙看起来不能等闲视之：其顶端被制成头骨的形状。或许它能打开什么不得了的大门。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.ac_drink
%s of anti-entropy: DRINK
反熵%s: 饮用

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.turquoise
%s of anti-entropy: turquoise potion
反熵%s: 青绿药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.crimson
%s of anti-entropy: crimson potion
反熵%s: 猩红药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.azure
%s of anti-entropy: azure potion
反熵%s: 湛蓝药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.jade
%s of anti-entropy: jade potion
反熵%s: 碧绿药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.golden
%s of anti-entropy: golden potion
反熵%s: 金黄药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.magenta
%s of anti-entropy: magenta potion
反熵%s: 品红药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.charcoal
%s of anti-entropy: charcoal potion
反熵%s: 煤黑药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.ivory
%s of anti-entropy: ivory potion
反熵%s: 乳白药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.amber
%s of anti-entropy: amber potion
反熵%s: 琥珀药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.bistre
%s of anti-entropy: bistre potion
反熵%s: 深褐药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.indigo
%s of anti-entropy: indigo potion
反熵%s: 靛紫药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.silver
%s of anti-entropy: silver potion
反熵%s: 银灰药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.unknown_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This flask contains a swirling colorful liquid. Who knows what it will do when drunk or thrown?
反熵%s: 瓶子里装着些不断打旋的彩色液体。谁知道饮用或投掷它时会有什么效果呢？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.harmful
%s of anti-entropy: Harmful potion!
反熵%s: 有害药剂！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.beneficial
%s of anti-entropy: Beneficial potion
反熵%s: 有益药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.yes
%s of anti-entropy: Yes, I know what I'm doing
反熵%s: 是的，我知道我在做什么

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.no
%s of anti-entropy: No, I changed my mind
反熵%s: 不，我改变主意了

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.sure_drink
%s of anti-entropy: Are you sure you want to drink it? In most cases you should throw such potions at your enemies.
反熵%s: 你确定要饮用它吗？大多数情况下你该把它扔向敌人的。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.sure_throw
%s of anti-entropy: Are you sure you want to throw it? In most cases it makes sense to drink it.
反熵%s: 你确定要投掷它吗？大多数情况下把它喝下去会更有用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion.shatter
%s of anti-entropy: The flask shatters and the liquid splashes harmlessly.
反熵%s: 药瓶碎裂开，溅出了无害的液体。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion$placeholder.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion
反熵%s: 药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potion$seedtopotion.name
%s of anti-entropy: Random Potion
反熵%s: 随机药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofexperience.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of experience
反熵%s: 经验药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofexperience.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The storied experiences of multitudes of battles reduced to liquid form, this draught will instantly raise your experience level.
反熵%s: 众多战斗积累而来的经验被浓缩为液态，这种药剂能够瞬间提升你的等级。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionoffrost.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of frost
反熵%s: 冰霜药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionoffrost.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The chemical contained in this potion will evaporate into a freezing cloud upon exposure to open air.
反熵%s: 一旦暴露在空气里，这种化学药剂会挥发成为一片冰冷的气雾。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofhaste.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of haste
反熵%s: 极速药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofhaste.energetic
%s of anti-entropy: You feel energetic!
反熵%s: 你感觉充满了活力！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofhaste.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Drinking this oddly sweet liquid will imbue you with tremendous energy for a short time, allowing you to run at high speeds.
反熵%s: 喝下这甜到掉牙的奇怪液体后，体内会爆发一股巨大的能量，让你可以短时间内飞速奔跑。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofhealing.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of healing
反熵%s: 治疗药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofhealing.heal
%s of anti-entropy: Your wounds begin to close.
反熵%s: 你的伤口开始愈合。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofhealing.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This elixir will rapidly restore your health and instantly cure many ailments.
反熵%s: 一支让你快速回满生命值并清除毒素的万能药剂。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofinvisibility.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of invisibility
反熵%s: 隐形药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofinvisibility.invisible
%s of anti-entropy: You see your hands turn invisible!
反熵%s: 你看到你的手隐形了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofinvisibility.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Drinking this potion will render you temporarily invisible. While invisible, enemies will be unable to see you. Physical attacks and magical effects (such as scrolls and wands) will immediately cancel invisibility.
反熵%s: 饮用这种药剂会使你暂时隐形。隐形期间，敌人将无法看见你。使用物理攻击或魔法效果(例如使用卷轴或法杖)，会立即解除隐形效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionoflevitation.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of levitation
反熵%s: 浮空药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionoflevitation.float
%s of anti-entropy: You float into the air!
反熵%s: 你漂浮到了空中！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionoflevitation.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Drinking this curious liquid will cause you to hover in the air, able to drift effortlessly over traps and pits. Throwing this potion will create a cloud of unrefined gas, disorienting anything caught in it.
反熵%s: 饮用这种古怪的药剂能让你漂浮到空中，从而轻易地越过陷阱和深渊。扔出它会产生一片未被提纯的气体云雾，让其中的所有生物迷失方向。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofliquidflame.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of liquid flame
反熵%s: 液火药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofliquidflame.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This flask contains an unstable compound which will burst violently into flame upon exposure to open air.
反熵%s: 该药瓶里装着一种不稳定的化合物，一旦暴露在空气中就会猛烈地燃烧起来。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofmindvision.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of mind vision
反熵%s: 灵视药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofmindvision.see_mobs
%s of anti-entropy: You can somehow feel the presence of other creatures' minds!
反熵%s: 你可以感受到其他生物的存在！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofmindvision.see_none
%s of anti-entropy: You can somehow tell that you are alone on this level at the moment.
反熵%s: 你能判定现在本层内就只有你一个人。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofmindvision.desc
%s of anti-entropy: After drinking this, your mind will become attuned to the psychic signature of distant creatures, enabling you to sense biological presences through walls. Also this potion will permit you to see through nearby walls and doors.
反熵%s: 喝下这个，你的心智将与大范围内的生物精神同调，让你能感受到围墙背后的生体所在。该药剂还能够让你的视野无视身边门墙的阻挡。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofparalyticgas.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of paralytic gas
反熵%s: 麻痹药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofparalyticgas.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Upon exposure to open air, the liquid in this flask will vaporize into a numbing yellow haze. Anyone who inhales the cloud will be paralyzed instantly, unable to move for some time after the cloud dissipates. This item can be thrown at distant enemies to catch them within the effect of the gas.
反熵%s: 暴露于空气时，烧瓶里的液体会气化成一片令人失去知觉的黄色云雾。任何吸入气体的生物都可能立即麻痹，直到气体消散后一段时间才能行动。可以把该物件扔到远处的敌群中，让气体覆盖影响它们。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofpurity.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of purity
反熵%s: 净化药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofpurity.freshness
%s of anti-entropy: You feel uncommon freshness in the air.
反熵%s: 你闻到了空气中不寻常的清新气息。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofpurity.protected
%s of anti-entropy: A protective film envelops you!
反熵%s: 你被一层薄薄的魔法屏障包裹住了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofpurity.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This magical reagent will quickly neutralize all harmful area-bound effects in a large area. Drinking it will give you temporary immunity to such effects.
反熵%s: 这种魔法试剂能迅速中和掉大范围内的各种有害环境。饮用它将使你暂时免疫这种环境。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofstrength.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of strength
反熵%s: 力量药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofstrength.msg
%s of anti-entropy: Newfound strength surges through your body, you now have %d strength!
反熵%s: 新生的力量在你体内喷薄而出，你现在拥有%d点力量！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionofstrength.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This powerful liquid will course through your muscles, permanently increasing your strength by one point.
反熵%s: 这种强力的液体会洗刷你的肌肉，永久性增加1点力量值。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionoftoxicgas.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of toxic gas
反熵%s: 毒气药剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.potionoftoxicgas.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Uncorking or shattering this pressurized glass will cause its contents to explode into a deadly cloud of toxic green gas. You might choose to fling this potion at distant enemies instead of uncorking it by hand.
反熵%s: 打开或摔碎这个密封的药瓶将导致内容物爆发成一团剧毒的绿色云雾。你应该选择从远处将这瓶药剂扔向敌人，而不是手动开封。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.brews.aquabrew.name
%s of anti-entropy: aqua brew
反熵%s: 水爆魔药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.brews.aquabrew.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When shattered, this brew will release a burst of pressurized water at its location. It's only forceful enough to damage fiery enemies, but it also spreads water to nearby terrain, douses fires, and knocks back characters near the burst.
反熵%s: 当瓶子破裂时，这瓶魔药会在目标处迸射出大量的水流。水流并没有那么强劲，只能对火属性敌人造成伤害，但是魔药的水流会散布至周遭，熄灭火焰并击退水源附近的角色。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.brews.blizzardbrew.name
%s of anti-entropy: blizzard brew
反熵%s: 冰暴魔药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.brews.blizzardbrew.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When shattered, this brew will unleash a swirling blizzard which quickly spreads like a gas.
反熵%s: 当瓶子破裂时，这瓶魔药会释放出一阵像气体一样扩散的旋流冰暴。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.brews.causticbrew.name
%s of anti-entropy: caustic brew
反熵%s: 淤泥魔药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.brews.causticbrew.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This brew will spread corrosive ooze in a wide area around the location it shatters in. Anything caught by the ooze will slowly melt if it can't wash it off in water.
反熵%s: 这瓶魔药在打碎时会大范围地溅出腐蚀淤泥。被腐蚀淤泥影响的单位将会缓慢融化，除非他们能及时在水中冲洗掉淤泥。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.brews.infernalbrew.name
%s of anti-entropy: infernal brew
反熵%s: 炼狱魔药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.brews.infernalbrew.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When shattered, this brew will unleash a raging inferno which quickly spreads like a gas.
反熵%s: 当瓶子破裂时，这瓶魔药会释放出一阵像气体一样扩散的狂暴炼狱。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.brews.shockingbrew.name
%s of anti-entropy: shocking brew
反熵%s: 雷鸣魔药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.brews.shockingbrew.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When shattered, this brew will unleash an electrical storm in a wide area around the location it breaks at.
反熵%s: 当瓶子破裂时，这瓶魔药会向周围释放一阵闪电风暴。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.brews.unstablebrew.name
%s of anti-entropy: unstable brew
反熵%s: 紊乱魔药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.brews.unstablebrew.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This magical brew glows with shifting colors of the rainbow.\n\nWhen drank or thrown it will trigger the effect of a random potion. The potion effect will always be beneficial if it is drank, and will always be harmful if it is thrown.
反熵%s: 这瓶充满魔力的魔药闪耀着霓虹般的流光溢彩。\n\n饮用这瓶魔药会使你随机获得一个有益药剂效果;而将其投掷出去则会随机释放一个有害药剂效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofarcanearmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: elixir of arcane armor
反熵%s: 抗魔秘药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofarcanearmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This elixir will grant the drinker a long lasting resistance to magical damage.
反熵%s: 这瓶秘药会赋予饮用者持续时间很长的魔法抗性。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofaquaticrejuvenation.name
%s of anti-entropy: elixir of aquatic rejuvenation
反熵%s: 水灵秘药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofaquaticrejuvenation.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This elixir contains the remains of Goo enhanced with a healing potion. While it will not provide immediate healing, it will steadily restore a greater amount of health while you are standing in water.
反熵%s: 这瓶秘药中包含着被粘咕力量强化的治疗液体。它不会为你提供立即的治疗效果，而会当你站在水中时逐渐为你恢复总量更大的生命值。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofaquaticrejuvenation$aquahealing.name
%s of anti-entropy: aquatic healing
反熵%s: 水灵治疗

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofaquaticrejuvenation$aquahealing.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
You have temporarily gained restorative properties similar to that of Goo.

While standing in water, you will recover a small amount of health per turn. The effect is paused when you are at full health or are out of water.

Healing left: %d.
反熵%s:
你暂时获得了如同粘咕一样的恢复能力。

当站在水面上时，你每回合都能够恢复少量生命值。生命值全满或离开水面时会暂停该效果。

剩余的恢复量：%d

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofdragonsblood.name
%s of anti-entropy: elixir of dragon's blood
反熵%s: 龙血秘药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofdragonsblood.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When consumed, this elixir will send fiery power coursing through the drinker's veins. This effect will make the drinker immune to fire, and allow them to set enemies aflame with physical attacks.
反熵%s: 饮用后，这瓶秘药会使饮用者的血管里充斥着烈焰的力量。这个效果能让引用者对火焰完全免疫，并且还能通过物理攻击点燃敌人。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixiroffeatherfall.name
%s of anti-entropy: elixir of feather fall
反熵%s: 羽落秘药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixiroffeatherfall.light
%s of anti-entropy: You feel light as a feather!
反熵%s: 你觉得自己身轻如燕！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixiroffeatherfall.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This elixir offers a weaker but more controlled levitation effect, allowing the drinker to fall great distances without harm for a little while.
反熵%s: 这瓶秘药可为你提供更弱但更可控的悬浮效果，在短时间内使你身轻如燕，即便跳下悬崖深渊也能毫发无损。饮用这瓶秘药可以为你提供短时间内免除坠落伤害的效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixiroffeatherfall$featherbuff.name
%s of anti-entropy: feather fall
反熵%s: 羽落

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixiroffeatherfall$featherbuff.desc
%s of anti-entropy: You are under the effects of a feather fall elixir, allowing you to fall into chasms without taking damage!\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
反熵%s: 你正处于羽落秘药的作用效果之下，可以跳进深渊并坠落至下一层而不受到任何伤害！\n\n效果剩余时长：%s回合

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofhoneyedhealing.name
%s of anti-entropy: elixir of honeyed healing
反熵%s: 圣愈蜜药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofhoneyedhealing.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This elixir combines healing with the sweetness of honey. When drank, it will apply the same effect as a potion of healing and satisfy a small amount of hunger, but it can also be thrown to heal an ally.\n\nCreatures with an affinity for honey might be pacified if this item is used on them.
反熵%s: 这瓶秘药不仅有着治愈效果，还混杂了蜂蜜的甜香。饮用后，它会触发与治疗药剂一样的效果并回复少量饥饿，它也能被丢出去用来治疗盟友。\n\n对喜爱蜂蜜的生物使用此物也可能安抚住它们。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixiroficytouch.name
%s of anti-entropy: elixir of icy touch
反熵%s: 晶触秘药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixiroficytouch.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When consumed, this elixir will allow the drinker to sap the heat from enemies they attack. This effect will make the drinker immune to the cold, and allow them to chill enemies with physical attacks.
反熵%s: 饮用后，这瓶秘药会使饮用者获得从敌人身上抽取热量的能力。这样的效果让使用者能够在药效持续期间免疫冻伤，同时他的物理攻击也能对敌人造成冻伤效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofmight.name
%s of anti-entropy: elixir of might
反熵%s: 根骨秘药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofmight.msg
%s of anti-entropy: Newfound strength surges through your body, you now have %d strength!
反熵%s: 新生的力量在你体内喷薄而出，你现在拥有%d点力量！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofmight.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This powerful liquid will course through your muscles, permanently increasing your strength by one point and temporarily increasing maximum health by %d points. The health boost scales with your maximum health, but will slowly wear off as you gain levels.
反熵%s: 这种强力的液体会冲刷你的根骨，永久性增加1点力量值并在一段时间内增加%d点生命上限。增强的生命上限值取决于你当前的最大生命值，不过增强值会随着等级提升而逐渐消失。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofmight$htboost.name
%s of anti-entropy: max health boost
反熵%s: 生命强化

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixirofmight$htboost.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
Your body feels unnaturally strong and healthy.

Your maximum health is boosted for an extended period of time. As you gain levels, the boost will steadily fade.

Current boost amount: %d.
Levels remaining: %d.
反熵%s:
你觉得自己不同寻常的强壮与健康。

你的最大生命在一段时间内会有所提升。生命提升会随着你的升级缓慢而稳定地消失。

当前生命提升量：%d
剩余生效等级：%d

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixiroftoxicessence.name
%s of anti-entropy: elixir of toxic essence
反熵%s: 毒粹秘药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.elixirs.elixiroftoxicessence.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When consumed, this elixir will imbue the drinker with toxic energy. The drinker will continuously spread toxic gas as they move, and will be immune to toxic gas and poison for slightly longer than the duration of the effect.
反熵%s: 这瓶秘药能够向使用者注入强大的毒素之力，饮用者在持续时间内将会在周身不断释放出致命的毒雾，此外还会在更长的一段时间内免疫毒气和毒素。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.turquoise
%s of anti-entropy: exotic turquoise potion
反熵%s: 青绿合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.crimson
%s of anti-entropy: exotic crimson potion
反熵%s: 猩红合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.azure
%s of anti-entropy: exotic azure potion
反熵%s: 湛蓝合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.jade
%s of anti-entropy: exotic jade potion
反熵%s: 碧绿合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.golden
%s of anti-entropy: exotic golden potion
反熵%s: 金黄合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.magenta
%s of anti-entropy: exotic magenta potion
反熵%s: 品红合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.charcoal
%s of anti-entropy: exotic charcoal potion
反熵%s: 煤黑合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.ivory
%s of anti-entropy: exotic ivory potion
反熵%s: 乳白合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.amber
%s of anti-entropy: exotic amber potion
反熵%s: 琥珀合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.bistre
%s of anti-entropy: exotic bistre potion
反熵%s: 深褐合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.indigo
%s of anti-entropy: exotic indigo potion
反熵%s: 靛紫合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.silver
%s of anti-entropy: exotic silver potion
反熵%s: 银灰合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.unknown_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This round flask contains a grainy colorful liquid. It seems to be foreign to this land, who knows what it might do when drunk or thrown?
反熵%s: 这口圆底瓶里装着些有沉淀物的彩色液体。它似乎并不属于这个世界，谁知道饮用或投掷它时会有什么效果呢？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.warning
%s of anti-entropy: Do you really want to cancel this potion usage? It will be consumed anyway.
反熵%s: 你真的想终止这瓶药剂的使用？它仍会被消耗掉。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.yes
%s of anti-entropy: Yes, I'm positive
反熵%s: 是的，我确定

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.exoticpotion.no
%s of anti-entropy: No, I changed my mind
反熵%s: 不，我改变主意了

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofcleansing.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of cleansing
反熵%s: 全面净化合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofcleansing.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This powerful reagent will render the drinker immune to all harmful effects for a few turns when quaffed. It can be thrown at a target to cleanse them as well.
反熵%s: 当这种合剂被饮用时，它可以令饮用者短时间内对所有的负面状态免疫。它同样可以被扔向某个单位来驱散该单位的异常状态。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofcleansing$cleanse.name
%s of anti-entropy: cleansed
反熵%s: 全面净化

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofcleansing$cleanse.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This character is temporarily immune to all harmful effects!\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
反熵%s: 这个角色暂时对所有的负面效应免疫！\n\n剩余时长：%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofcorrosivegas.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of corrosive gas
反熵%s: 腐蚀酸雾合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofcorrosivegas.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Uncorking or shattering this pressurized glass will cause its contents to explode into a deadly cloud of corrosive rust-colored gas. The gas spreads more quickly than toxic gas and is more deadly, but also won't last as long.
反熵%s: 打开或摔碎这个密封的药瓶将导致内容物爆发成一团强腐蚀性的锈色酸雾。这种酸雾的扩散速度与致命性都远超毒气。不过稳定性较差，不能在空气中存留太久。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofdragonsbreath.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of dragon's breath
反熵%s: 火龙吐息合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofdragonsbreath.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Choose a location to burn
反熵%s: 选择要灼烧的位置

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofdragonsbreath.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This flask contains an unusual compound which bursts into flame shortly after mixing with saliva. Quickly spitting the liquid will allow the user to spew flame from their mouth!
反熵%s: 瓶子内奇特的化合物会在接触口腔后爆燃。迅速吐出液体就能让使用者从口中喷射火焰！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofearthenarmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of earthen armor
反熵%s: 大地护甲合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofearthenarmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Rather than paralyze, this liquid has a hardening effect on the skin which will turn it into temporary natural armor.
反熵%s: 与麻痹药剂不同的是，饮用这瓶合剂能够使使用者的皮肤硬化，在一段时间内形成一道天然护甲。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofdivineinspiration.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of divine inspiration
反熵%s: 神意启发合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofdivineinspiration.no_more_points
%s of anti-entropy: You can't gain any more bonus talent points.
反熵%s: 你无法再获得更多的额外天赋点了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofdivineinspiration.select_tier
%s of anti-entropy: Select a talent tier to gain two bonus points in. You must have unlocked the tier to be able to spend the points.
反熵%s: 选择一个天赋以获得两个额外点数。该天赋所在的层阶必须已被解锁。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofdivineinspiration.bonus
%s of anti-entropy: +2 Talent Points!
反熵%s: 天赋点+2！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofdivineinspiration.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The power of holy energy reduced to liquid form, this draught will imbue the drinker with divine power, granting them two bonus talent points in a tier of their choosing.\n\nThis potion can only be used once for each talent tier.
反熵%s: 这股神圣的力量会化作液态，灌注进饮用者的身体，赋予其钟意的天赋两个额外天赋点。\n\n这种药剂对每一层天赋只能生效一次。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofmagicalsight.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of magical sight
反熵%s: 魔能透视合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofmagicalsight.desc
%s of anti-entropy: After drinking this, your senses will be briefly heightened to incredible levels, allowing you to see through walls in a 12 tile radius!
反熵%s: 饮用这瓶合剂后，你的五感将被提高到一种无法想象的地步，使你能看穿12格以内的墙壁，洞察藏在墙后的事物！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofmastery.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of mastery
反熵%s: 肌肉记忆合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofmastery.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Master an Item
反熵%s: 精通一件物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofmastery.weapon_easier
%s of anti-entropy: Your weapon becomes easier to wield!
反熵%s: 你的武器变得前所未有的顺手！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofmastery.armor_easier
%s of anti-entropy: Your armor becomes easier to wear!
反熵%s: 你的护甲变得前所未有的合身！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofmastery.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Rather than granting raw strength, this potion will instead attune the muscles of the user to a particular item. This will make that item easier to use, as if the drinker had practised with it and built muscle memory.\n\nThe chosen weapon or armor will require 2 less strength to use. This potion can only be used once on each item.
反熵%s: 这个合剂不会直接增强你的力量，但却会为你建立使用特定物品的肌肉记忆。使你对其的运用更加得心应手，仿佛已经练习了千百遍。\n\n所选武器或护甲所需要的力量减少2点。此合剂在每个物品上只能使用一次。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofshielding.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of shielding
反熵%s: 奥术护盾合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofshielding.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Rather than heal, this potion will instead project a durable shield around the user's body, blocking a considerable amount of damage.
反熵%s: 与治疗药剂不同的是，饮用这瓶合剂能够使周身被护盾环绕，抵挡所受到的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofshroudingfog.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of shrouding fog
反熵%s: 暗夜迷雾合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofshroudingfog.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When exposed to air, the liquid in this flask will produce a thick smoky fog which quickly spreads and blocks the vision of your enemies.
反熵%s: 瓶中的液体遇到空气就会迅速爆发出一团能完全阻挡敌人视线的浓雾。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofsnapfreeze.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of snap freeze
反熵%s: 极速冰冻合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofsnapfreeze.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The chemical contained in this potion will rapidly react with the air, instantly freezing and rooting all within its effect.
反熵%s: 一旦暴露在空气里，这种化学混合物会瞬间冻结并缠绕范围内一切对象。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofstamina.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of stamina
反熵%s: 精力回复合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofstamina.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Drinking this oddly sweet liquid will imbue you with a long-lasting boost of energy, allowing you to run at a quickened pace for an extended period of time.
反熵%s: 喝下这甜到掉牙的奇怪液体后，体内会爆发一股巨大的能量，让你可以在长时间内飞速奔跑。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofstormclouds.name
%s of anti-entropy: potion of storm clouds
反熵%s: 暴风骤雨合剂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.potions.exotic.potionofstormclouds.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Throwing this potion will create a quickly-spreading cloud of concentrated vapor, which will condense and pour down onto the environment. Most terrain will be converted to water, fiery enemies will take damage, fire will be doused, and traps will be overwhelmed and break.
反熵%s: 这瓶合剂被丢出后会形成一团快速膨胀的浓厚水汽，并迅速凝结为雨水降下。受雨水覆盖的大部分地形都会变为水潭，火焰会熄灭，火属性敌人会受到伤害，陷阱也会淹毁。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.ceremonialcandle.name
%s of anti-entropy: ceremonial candle
反熵%s: 仪式蜡烛

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.ceremonialcandle.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A set of candles, melted down and fused together through use.\n\nAlone they are worthless, but used with other candles in a pattern, they can focus the energy for a summoning ritual.
反熵%s: 一套配套的蜡烛，在使用中融化在了一起。\n\n单独看来它们毫无价值，但与其它蜡烛按特定排布共用时却能为召唤仪式聚集能量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.corpsedust.name
%s of anti-entropy: corpse dust
反熵%s: 尸尘

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.corpsedust.chill
%s of anti-entropy: A chill runs down your spine.
反熵%s: 一股寒意穿透了你的脊背。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.corpsedust.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The ball of corpse dust doesn't differ outwardly from a regular dust ball. But you can feel a malevolent energy lurking within it.\n\nGetting rid of it as soon as possible would be a good idea.
反熵%s: 在外观上这团尸尘和普通灰尘差不多。而你却能够感受到其中潜伏着一股充满恶意的魔力。\n\n尽快脱手为好。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.darkgold.name
%s of anti-entropy: dark gold ore
反熵%s: 暗金矿

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.darkgold.you_now_have
%s of anti-entropy: You now have %d dark gold ore.
反熵%s: 你现在拥有%d个暗金矿。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.darkgold.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This metal is called dark not because of its color (it doesn't differ from the normal gold), but because it melts under the daylight, making it useless on the surface.
反熵%s: 这种金属名中的暗并非源于其色泽(它看起来和普通黄金一样)，而是因为它会在阳光下熔化，令其在地表上毫无用处。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.dwarftoken.name
%s of anti-entropy: dwarf token
反熵%s: 矮人徽记

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.dwarftoken.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Many dwarves and some of their larger creations carry these small pieces of metal of unknown purpose. Maybe they are jewelry or maybe some kind of ID. Dwarves are strange folk.
反熵%s: 很多矮人和他们的造物都携带着这种小块金属，理由不详。兴许它是装饰物或什么身份识别牌。矮人都挺奇怪的。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.embers.name
%s of anti-entropy: elemental embers
反熵%s: 元素余烬

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.embers.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Special embers which can only be harvested from young fire elementals. They radiate thermal energy.
反熵%s: 只能从新生火焰元素身上采集到的特殊余烬.。它们散发着温暖的能量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.gooblob.name
%s of anti-entropy: blob of goo
反熵%s: 粘咕球

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.gooblob.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A jiggly blob of goop, split off from Goo as it died. It's almost like a big ball of jelly, though you wouldn't dare eat it.\n\nIt does nothing on its own, but it might be useful when combined with certain potions, or a bomb. At the very least it should convert into a decent amount of energy.
反熵%s: 一团晃动着的黏糊糊球体，是从粘咕尸体上崩解下的一部分。看起来像是一个大果冻球，不过大概不能食用。\n\n该物品自身并没有什么实际用途，不过它在与特定药剂或炸弹共炼后可能有妙用。再不济，它也能提供相当的炼金能量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.metalshard.name
%s of anti-entropy: cursed metal shard
反熵%s: 邪能碎片

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.metalshard.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A shard of rusted cursed metal, which broke off DM-300 as it was destroyed. You can feel an inactive malevolent magic within it.\n\nIt does nothing on its own, but it might be useful when combined with certain scrolls, or a bomb. At the very least it should convert into a decent amount of energy.
反熵%s: 一块被诅咒的金属锈片，它是DM-300的装甲外壳被击碎时分离出来的。你能感受到某种尚未激活的恶毒魔力潜藏其中。\n\n该物品自身并没有什么实际用途，不过它在与特定卷轴或炸弹共炼时可能有妙用。再不济，它也能提供相当的炼金能量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.pickaxe.name
%s of anti-entropy: pickaxe
反熵%s: 镐子

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.pickaxe.ac_mine
%s of anti-entropy: MINE
反熵%s: 采掘

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.pickaxe.no_vein
%s of anti-entropy: There is no dark gold vein near you to mine.
反熵%s: 附近没有可供采掘的暗金矿脉。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.pickaxe.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: pierce
反熵%s: 穿刺

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.pickaxe.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _pierce_ an enemy with a pickaxe. This is guaranteed to hit, applies vulnerable for 3 turns, and deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ to enemies with rigid skin.
反熵%s: 决斗家可使用镐子_穿刺_一个敌人。穿刺必定命中，同时施加3回合的易伤效果，且会对有硬质表皮的敌人造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.pickaxe.upgrade_ability_stat_name
%s of anti-entropy: Ability Damage
反熵%s: 武技伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.pickaxe.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a sturdy and heavy tool for breaking rocks. You don't need to equip the pickaxe to mine with it, but it can probably be equipped as a weapon in a pinch.
反熵%s: 这是一件笨重但十分耐用的凿岩工具。不需要装备上就能作为挖掘工具使用，但在紧要关头也能作为武器装备。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.ratskull.name
%s of anti-entropy: giant rat skull
反熵%s: 巨鼠头骨

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.quest.ratskull.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A surprisingly large rat skull. It would make a great hunting trophy, if you had a wall to mount it on.
反熵%s: 一颗大得吓人的老鼠头骨。如果你能找到一面合适的墙来挂，它会是件不错的狩猎纪念品。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.remainsitem.ac_use
%s of anti-entropy: USE
反熵%s: 使用

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.bowfragment.name
%s of anti-entropy: bow fragment
反熵%s: 灵弓残件

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.bowfragment.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This broken fragment of wood was once part of a lost Huntress' spirit bow. You can still feel a little nature energy left in the fragment, you can use the fragment to grow some high grass around you. Doing this will destroy the fragment however.
反熵%s: 这块枯木曾经是一位殒落于此的女猎手所持灵能弓的一部分。你仍可以感受到枯木中残留的一点自然能量，你可以激发这最后的能量，令周身长出一片高草。但是当你这样做之后，这块枯木会由于自然能量耗尽而烟消云散。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.brokenhilt.name
%s of anti-entropy: broken hilt
反熵%s: 断折剑柄

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.brokenhilt.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This broken hilt looks like it came from a defeated Duelist's weapon. You can still feel a little martial power left in the hilt, you can use it to get a little bonus damage on your next two melee hits. Doing this will destroy the hilt however.
反熵%s: 这把断折剑柄曾经应是一名败于此地的决斗者随身武器。即使如今你仍可感受到剑柄其上残留的武道气息，你可以运起这股气息，在接下来使用近战武器两次命中时造成些许额外伤害。但这意味着剑柄会随着武者气息的流失而烟消云散。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.brokenstaff.name
%s of anti-entropy: broken staff
反熵%s: 横断魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.brokenstaff.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This Mage's staff has been broken in half after its owner met their demise. You can still feel some magical energy left in the staff, you can use it to give your wands a little charge boost. Doing this will destroy the staff however.
反熵%s: 这把法师魔杖在其主死后也断做两截。你仍可以感受到魔杖中残余的魔力波动，你可以用它来给你的法杖提供一些充能。但是，这样也会使得魔杖随着魔力的流失而烟消云散。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.cloakscrap.name
%s of anti-entropy: scrap of fabric
反熵%s: 残破织物

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.cloakscrap.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This scrap of translucent fabric looks like it came from a late Rogue's cloak of shadows. You can still feel a little mystical energy left in it, you can use it to give your artifacts a little charge boost. Doing this will destroy the fabric however.
反熵%s: 这块半透明的织物残片似是源于一位盗贼同行的暗影斗篷。你可以感受到一丝神秘的能量仍残留其中，你可以用它来给你的神器提供一些充能。但是如此残片也会随着神秘能量耗尽而烟消云散。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.sealshard.name
%s of anti-entropy: seal shards
反熵%s: 纹章残蜡

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.sealshard.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These tiny shards of red wax look like they came from the seal of a fallen Warrior. You can still feel a bit of willpower clinging to the seal, you can use it to give yourself a bit of shielding. Doing this will destroy the seal shards however.
反熵%s: 这些细碎的红色蜡块似是源于一名葬身于此战士的纹章。你可以感受到其上仍残留的一缕执念，你可以用它来给自己提供一些护盾。但是，伴随着这缕执念转化为护盾，这些蜡块也会烟消云散。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.tornpage.name
%s of anti-entropy: torn page
反熵%s: 圣典残页

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.remains.tornpage.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This page looks like it was ripped out of an expired Cleric's holy tome. There's still a little divine energy clinging to it, you can use it to regain a little bit of health. Doing this will destroy the torn page however.
反熵%s: 这片书页看起来是从一位已安息主怀的牧师的圣典中撕下来的。其上依旧残存有一丝神力，你可以使用它恢复少许生命值。但若如此书页也会随之烟消云散。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.diamond
%s of anti-entropy: diamond ring
反熵%s: 钻石戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.opal
%s of anti-entropy: opal ring
反熵%s: 蛋白石戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.garnet
%s of anti-entropy: garnet ring
反熵%s: 石榴石戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.ruby
%s of anti-entropy: ruby ring
反熵%s: 红宝石戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.amethyst
%s of anti-entropy: amethyst ring
反熵%s: 紫水晶戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.topaz
%s of anti-entropy: topaz ring
反熵%s: 黄玉戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.onyx
%s of anti-entropy: onyx ring
反熵%s: 黑曜石戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.tourmaline
%s of anti-entropy: tourmaline ring
反熵%s: 碧玺戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.emerald
%s of anti-entropy: emerald ring
反熵%s: 绿宝石戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.sapphire
%s of anti-entropy: sapphire ring
反熵%s: 蓝宝石戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.quartz
%s of anti-entropy: quartz ring
反熵%s: 石英戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.agate
%s of anti-entropy: agate ring
反熵%s: 玛瑙戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.equip_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The ring tightens around your finger painfully!
反熵%s: 这枚戒指突然紧缩，箍住了你的手指！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.unknown_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This metal band is adorned with a large gem that glitters in the darkness. Who knows what effect it has when worn?
反熵%s: 这枚金属环镶嵌着一颗在黑暗中闪烁光芒的大块宝石。谁知道戴上后会有什么效果？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.known
%s of anti-entropy: This is a %s
反熵%s: 这是一枚%s。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.identify
%s of anti-entropy: You are now familiar enough with your ring to identify it.
反熵%s: 你对你的戒指已经足够熟悉并且可以因此将其完全鉴定。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.cursed_worn
%s of anti-entropy: Because this ring is cursed, you are powerless to remove it.
反熵%s: 由于这个戒指被诅咒，你无力将其除下。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.curse_known
%s of anti-entropy: You can feel a malevolent magic lurking within this ring.
反熵%s: 你能感觉到这件戒指里潜伏着一股充满恶意的魔力。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ring.not_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: This ring is free of malevolent magic.
反熵%s: 这枚戒指没有被诅咒。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofaccuracy.name
%s of anti-entropy: ring of accuracy
反熵%s: 精准之戒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofaccuracy.stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will increase your accuracy by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的精准属性会增加_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofaccuracy.typical_stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will typically increase your accuracy by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的精准属性通常会增加_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofaccuracy.combined_stats
%s of anti-entropy: Your equipped rings are combining their power, increasing your accuracy by _%s%%_ in total.
反熵%s: 你已装备的戒指正联结它们的力量，一共增加了你_%s%%_的精准。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofaccuracy.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Accuracy Boost
反熵%s: 精准加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofaccuracy.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ring increases your focus, making it easier for your attacks to find their mark. A cursed ring will instead make it harder for your attacks to connect.
反熵%s: 这枚戒指提高了你的专注力，使敌人难以躲闪你的攻击。被诅咒的戒指则会让你的攻击更易于被闪避。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofarcana.name
%s of anti-entropy: ring of arcana
反熵%s: 奥术之戒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofarcana.stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will increase the power of enchantments and glyphs by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的附魔和刻印效果会提升_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofarcana.typical_stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will typically increase the power of enchantments and glyphs by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的附魔和刻印效果通常会提升_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofarcana.combined_stats
%s of anti-entropy: Your equipped rings are combining their power, increasing the power of enchantments and glyphs by _%s%%_ in total.
反熵%s: 你已装备的戒指正联结它们的力量，一共增强了_%s%%_的附魔与刻印效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofarcana.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Arcana Boost
反熵%s: 奥术加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofarcana.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ring enhances magical enchantments on weapons and glyphs on armor, including curses! It first increases activation chance, and then increases the strength of the effect once activation chance is 100%. A cursed ring will instead weaken enchantments, glyphs, and curses.
反熵%s: 这枚戒指增强了武器上的附魔和护甲上的刻印，也包括诅咒！戒指会先提高它们的触发概率，当触发概率达到100%时，会转而增加它们效果的强度。被诅咒的戒指则会反过来削弱附魔、刻印以及诅咒。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofelements.name
%s of anti-entropy: ring of elements
反熵%s: 元素之戒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofelements.stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will provide _%s%%_ elemental resistance.
反熵%s: 当佩戴这枚戒指时，你会获得_%s%%_的元素抗性。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofelements.typical_stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will typically provide _%s%%_ elemental resistance.
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你通常会获得_%s%%_的元素抗性。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofelements.combined_stats
%s of anti-entropy: Your equipped rings are combining their power, providing _%s%%_ elemental resistance in total.
反熵%s: 你已装备的戒指正联结它们的力量，一共提供了_%s%%_的元素伤害抗性。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofelements.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Resistance
反熵%s: 元素抗性

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofelements.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ring provides resistance to most elemental and magical effects, decreasing damage and debuff duration. Naturally a cursed ring will instead worsen these effects.
反熵%s: 这枚戒指能为佩戴者提供抗性，降低大部分元素和魔法效果的伤害和持续时间。被诅咒的戒指自然会加重这些效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofenergy.name
%s of anti-entropy: ring of energy
反熵%s: 能量之戒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofenergy.stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will increase wand, artifact, and heroic armor charge speed by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你持有的法杖，神器及英雄护甲充能速度将提高_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofenergy.typical_stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will typically increase wand, artifact, and heroic armor charge speed by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，通常情况下，你持有的法杖，神器及英雄护甲充能速度将提高_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofenergy.combined_stats
%s of anti-entropy: Your equipped rings are combining their power, increasing charge speed by _%s%%_ in total.
反熵%s: 你已装备的戒指正联结它们的力量，一共增加了_%s%%_的充能速度。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofenergy.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Charge Boost
反熵%s: 充能加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofenergy.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Your magical equipment will recharge more quickly in the arcane field that radiates from this ring. A cursed ring will instead slow recharge.
反熵%s: 在戒指的奥术领域笼罩下，你持有的所有魔法装备充能速度都会得到提升。被诅咒的戒指反而会减慢充能速度。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofevasion.name
%s of anti-entropy: ring of evasion
反熵%s: 闪避之戒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofevasion.stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will increase your evasion by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的闪避属性会提升_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofevasion.typical_stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will typically increase your evasion by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的闪避属性通常会提升_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofevasion.combined_stats
%s of anti-entropy: Your equipped rings are combining their power, increasing your evasion by _%s%%_ in total.
反熵%s: 你已装备的戒指正联结它们的力量，一共增加了_%s%%_的闪避。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofevasion.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Evasion Boost
反熵%s: 闪避加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofevasion.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ring quickens the wearer's reactions, making it harder to land blows on them. A cursed ring will instead make the user easier to strike.
反熵%s: 这枚戒指会加快佩戴者的反应速度，令其更难被敌人击中。被诅咒的戒指反而会让佩戴者更容易被击中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce.name
%s of anti-entropy: ring of force
反熵%s: 武力之戒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce.stats
%s of anti-entropy: When unarmed, at your current strength, this ring will deal _%1$d-%2$d damage._ With a weapon equipped, this ring will increase damage by _%3$d._
反熵%s: 赤手空拳时，以你目前的力量，佩戴这枚戒指能够造成_%1$d~%2$d伤害_。当装备一件武器时，这枚戒指会为其增加_%3$d_点伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce.typical_stats
%s of anti-entropy: When unarmed, at your current strength, typically this ring will deal _%1$d-%2$d damage._ With a weapon equipped, typically this ring will increase damage by _%3$d._
反熵%s: 赤手空拳时，以你目前的力量，佩戴这枚戒指通常能够造成_%1$d~%2$d伤害_。当装备一件武器时，这枚戒指通常会为其增加_%3$d_点伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce.combined_stats
%s of anti-entropy: Your equipped rings are combining their power, dealing a total of _%1$d-%2$d damage_ without a weapon, or increasing damage by _%3$d_ with one.
反熵%s: 你已装备的戒指正联结它们的力量，在不使用武器时一共造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，在使用武器时则可提升_%3$d_点伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Unarmed Damage
反熵%s: 徒手伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Armed Damage Boost
反熵%s: 武器伤害加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce.upgrade_stat_name_3
%s of anti-entropy: Ability Damage
反熵%s: 武技伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: brawler's stance
反熵%s: 拳击架势

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can adopt a _brawler's stance_ with this ring, causing her regular attacks to always use this ring even with a weapon equipped. These attacks will typically deal _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and will also inherit the weapon's enchantment and augmentation. This stance slows weapon recharging speed by 50%%.
反熵%s: 决斗家可通过这枚戒指进入_拳击架势_，使得决斗家哪怕装备了其它武器也会用这枚戒指发动普通攻击。每次攻击一般会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，并继承武器的附魔与强化效果。在这种架势下，武器的充能速度会减慢50%%。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can adopt a _brawler's stance_ with this ring, causing her regular attacks to always use this ring even with a weapon equipped. These attacks will deal _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and will also inherit the weapon's enchantment and augmentation. This stance slows weapon recharging speed by 50%%.
反熵%s: 决斗家可通过这枚戒指进入_拳击架势_，使得决斗家哪怕装备了其它武器也会用这枚戒指发动普通攻击。每次攻击会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，并继承武器的附魔与强化效果。在这种架势下，武器的充能速度会减慢50%%。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ring enhances the force of the wearer's melee blows. This extra power is fairly weak when wielding weapons, but an unarmed attack will be made much stronger. A cursed ring will instead weaken the wearer's blows.
反熵%s: 这枚戒指能够增强佩戴者的打击力度。这份额外的力量在挥舞武器时相当有限，而徒手攻击则会被大幅增强。被诅咒的戒指会导致佩戴者的攻击变得软弱无力。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce$brawlersstance.name
%s of anti-entropy: brawler's stance
反熵%s: 拳击架势

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofforce$brawlersstance.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
While in this stance the Duelist's regular attacks will use an equipped ring of force even when she has a weapon equipped. These attacks gain bonus damage and will still use the weapon's augmentation and enchantment.

Maintaining this stance takes focus however, reducing weapon ability recharge speed by 50%.

This stance can be toggled on or off by using a ring of force, but the reduction in charge speed will persist for a little while if the stance is quickly activated and deactivated.
反熵%s:
在这种架势下，决斗家将使用装备着的武力戒指进行普通攻击，哪怕她已经装备了其他武器。这种攻击会使用武器的强化与附魔效果，还会造成额外伤害。

不过，维持这个架势需要耗费精力，导致决斗家的武技充能速度降低50%。

这个架势可以用武力戒指来进入和退出，不过进出这个架势会导致武技充能的减缓效果持续一小会儿。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringoffuror.name
%s of anti-entropy: ring of furor
反熵%s: 狂怒之戒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringoffuror.stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will increase the speed of your attacks by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的攻击速度会提升_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringoffuror.typical_stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will typically increase the speed of your attacks by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的攻击速度通常会提升_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringoffuror.combined_stats
%s of anti-entropy: Your equipped rings are combining their power, increasing the speed of your attacks by _%s%%_ in total.
反熵%s: 你已装备的戒指正联结它们的力量，一共增加了_%s%%_的攻击速度。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringoffuror.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Attack Speed Boost
反熵%s: 攻速加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringoffuror.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ring grants the wearer an inner fury, allowing them to attack more rapidly. A cursed ring will instead slow the wearer's speed of attack.
反熵%s: 这枚戒指会激发佩戴者内心的怒火，使其能够更迅猛地攻击。被诅咒的戒指则会导致佩戴者攻击迟缓。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofhaste.name
%s of anti-entropy: ring of haste
反熵%s: 疾速之戒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofhaste.stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will increase your movement speed by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的移动速度会提升_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofhaste.typical_stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will typically increase your movement speed by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的移动速度通常会提升_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofhaste.combined_stats
%s of anti-entropy: Your equipped rings are combining their power, increasing your movement speed by _%s%%_ in total.
反熵%s: 你已装备的戒指正联结它们的力量，一共增加了_%s%%_的移动速度。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofhaste.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Move Speed Boost
反熵%s: 移速加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofhaste.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ring reduces the stress of movement on the wearer, allowing them to run at superhuman speeds. A cursed ring will instead weigh the wearer down.
反熵%s: 这枚戒指减轻了佩戴者在移动时的负担，使其能够飞速奔跑。被诅咒的戒指则会使佩戴者倍感沉重。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofmight.name
%s of anti-entropy: ring of might
反熵%s: 根骨之戒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofmight.stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will increase your strength by _%1$d_ and your max HP by _%2$s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的力量会增加_%1$d_，你的最大生命值会增加_%2$s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofmight.typical_stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will typically increase your strength by _%1$d_ and your max HP by _%2$s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的力量通常会提升_%1$d_点，并且最大生命值通常会增加_%2$s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofmight.combined_stats
%s of anti-entropy: Your equipped rings are combining their power, boosting your strength by _%1$d_ and max HP by _%2$s%%_ in total.
反熵%s: 你已装备的戒指正联结它们的力量，一共提高了你_%1$d_点力量与_%2$s%%_点最大生命值。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofmight.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Strength Boost
反熵%s: 力量加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofmight.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Max HP Boost
反熵%s: 生命上限加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofmight.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ring enhances the physical traits of the wearer, granting them greater physical strength and constitution. A cursed ring will weaken the wearer.
反熵%s: 这枚戒指会增强佩戴者的体质，使其拥有更强的力量与体格。被诅咒的戒指则会使人虚弱。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofsharpshooting.name
%s of anti-entropy: ring of sharpshooting
反熵%s: 神射之戒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofsharpshooting.stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will boost the damage of your thrown weapons as if their level was increased by _%1$d_, and will increase their durability by _%2$s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的投掷武器伤害会获得_%1$d_级的提升，耐久度则会提升_%2$s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofsharpshooting.typical_stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will typically boost the damage of your thrown weapons as if their level was increased by _%1$d_ and will increase their durability by _%2$s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的投掷武器伤害通常会获得_%1$d_级的提升，耐久度则会提升_%2$s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofsharpshooting.combined_stats
%s of anti-entropy: Your equipped rings are combining their power, boosting effective thrown weapon level by _%1$d_ and increasing their durability by _%2$s%%_ in total.
反熵%s: 你已装备的戒指正联结它们的力量，一共提高了_%1$d_级投掷武器等级，并且增加了其_%2$s%%_耐久。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofsharpshooting.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Level Damage Boost
反熵%s: 等级伤害加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofsharpshooting.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Durability Boost
反熵%s: 耐久加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofsharpshooting.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ring enhances the wearer's precision and aim, which will make all projectile weapons more damaging and durable. A cursed ring will have the opposite effect.
反熵%s: 这枚戒指会加强佩戴者的瞄准能力，使投掷武器变得更加致命且耐用。被诅咒的戒指则会起反作用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringoftenacity.name
%s of anti-entropy: ring of tenacity
反熵%s: 韧性之戒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringoftenacity.stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will reduce the damage you take by up to _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你受到的伤害至多减少_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringoftenacity.typical_stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will typically reduce the damage you take by up to _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你受到的伤害通常至多减少_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringoftenacity.combined_stats
%s of anti-entropy: Your equipped rings are combining their power, reducing the damage you take by up to _%s%%_ in total.
反熵%s: 你已装备的戒指正联结它们的力量，一共减少了你受到伤害的最多_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringoftenacity.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Max Damage Resist
反熵%s: 伤害抗性上限

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringoftenacity.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will allow the wearer to resist normally mortal strikes. The more injured the user is, the more resistant they will be to damage. A cursed ring will instead make it easier for enemies to execute the wearer.
反熵%s: 这枚戒指使佩戴者能够抵御本应致命的打击。佩戴者受伤越重，对伤害的抗性就越高。被诅咒的戒指则会让敌人更容易杀死佩戴者。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofwealth.name
%s of anti-entropy: ring of wealth
反熵%s: 财富之戒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofwealth.stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will increase your luck by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的整体幸运程度会提升_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofwealth.typical_stats
%s of anti-entropy: When worn, this ring will typically increase your luck by _%s%%._
反熵%s: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你的整体幸运程度通常会提升_%s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofwealth.combined_stats
%s of anti-entropy: Your equipped rings are combining their power, increasing your luck by _%s%%_ in total.
反熵%s: 你已装备的戒指正联结它们的力量，一共增加了你_%s%%_的幸运。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofwealth.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Luck Boost
反熵%s: 幸运加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.rings.ringofwealth.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ring acts like a magnet for treasure, increasing the likelihood that enemies and containers will be carrying valuable items. A cursed ring will instead reduce your chance of receiving loot.
反熵%s: 这枚戒指有如磁石般的招财功效，佩戴者有更大的机率从敌人身上或各类宝箱中取得较有价值的道具。被诅咒的戒指反而会降低发现宝物的可能性。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scroll.ac_read
%s of anti-entropy: READ
反熵%s: 阅读

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scroll.kaunan
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of KAUNAN
反熵%s: KAUNAN卷轴

%s of anti-entropy: scroll of SOWILO
反熵%s: SOWILO卷轴

%s of anti-entropy: scroll of LAGUZ
反熵%s: LAGUZ卷轴

%s of anti-entropy: scroll of YNGVI

反熵%s: GYFU卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scroll.raido

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scroll.naudiz

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scroll.berkanan
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of BERKANAN
反熵%s: BERKANAN卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scroll.odal
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of ODAL
反熵%s: ODAL卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scroll.tiwaz
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of TIWAZ
反熵%s: TIWAZ卷轴
