items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scroll.unknown_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An indecipherable magical rune is written on this parchment. Who knows what it will do when read aloud?
反熵%s: 这张羊皮纸上写满了难以破译的魔法符文。大声念出来会发生什么？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scroll.blinded
%s of anti-entropy: You can't read a scroll while blinded.
反熵%s: 你不能在失明时阅读卷轴。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scroll.no_magic
%s of anti-entropy: You can't read a scroll while magic immune.
反熵%s: 你不能在魔法免疫时阅读卷轴。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scroll.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: Your cursed spellbook prevents you from invoking this scroll's magic! A scroll of remove curse might be strong enough to still work though...
反熵%s: 被诅咒的法典抑制了卷轴中法术的启动！也许祛邪卷轴足够强大还能被使用.....

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scroll$placeholder.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll
反熵%s: 卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.inventoryscroll.warning
%s of anti-entropy: Do you really want to cancel this scroll usage? The scroll wasn't previously identified, so it will be consumed anyway.
反熵%s: 你真的想终止这张卷轴的施放？这张卷轴之前未被鉴定，因此它仍会被消耗掉。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.inventoryscroll.yes
%s of anti-entropy: Yes, I'm positive
反熵%s: 是的，我确定

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.inventoryscroll.no
%s of anti-entropy: No, I changed my mind
反熵%s: 不，我改变主意了

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofidentify.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of identify
反熵%s: 鉴定卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofidentify.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Identify an item
反熵%s: 选择一样要鉴定的物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofidentify.it_is
%s of anti-entropy: Your item has been identified: %s.
反熵%s: 你的物品已被鉴定为：%s。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofidentify.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This scroll permanently reveals all of the secrets of a single item.
反熵%s: 该卷轴能永久揭示一件物品的所有秘密。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrolloflullaby.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of lullaby
反熵%s: 催眠卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrolloflullaby.sooth
%s of anti-entropy: The scroll utters a soothing melody. You feel very sleepy.
反熵%s: 卷轴发出了某种舒缓的旋律。你觉得非常困倦。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrolloflullaby.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Reading this scroll emits a soothing melody which will lull all who hear it into a deep magical sleep. For the reader and their allies the sleep is restorative.
反熵%s: 阅读这张卷轴会释放出一段舒缓的旋律，让所有听到它的生物深陷魔法睡眠。这种睡眠有益于阅读者及友方单位的健康。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofmagicmapping.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of magic mapping
反熵%s: 探地卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofmagicmapping.layout
%s of anti-entropy: You are now aware of the level layout.
反熵%s: 你熟悉了这层的地形。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofmagicmapping.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When this scroll is read, an image of crystal clarity will be etched into your memory, alerting you to the precise layout of the level and revealing all hidden secrets. The locations of items and creatures will remain unknown.
反熵%s: 阅读这张卷轴时，一副明晰的景象会刻入你的记忆中，告知你整个楼层的精确布局并揭开所有隐藏的秘密。不过道具位置和生物分布依旧是未知状态。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofmirrorimage.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of mirror image
反熵%s: 镜像卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofmirrorimage.copies
%s of anti-entropy: The scroll forms mirror images of you.
反熵%s: 卷轴生成了你的镜像。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofmirrorimage.no_copies
%s of anti-entropy: The scroll attempts to create mirror images of you, but they have nowhere to go.
反熵%s: 卷轴尝试创造你的镜像，但是它们没有空间出现。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofmirrorimage.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The incantation on this scroll will create two illusory twins of the reader. These mirror images act as weaker clones of the reader, and will chase down their enemies. They have no durability however, and will fade upon taking damage.
反熵%s: 卷轴上的咒文会创造使用者的两个镜像。这些像使用者的弱化版克隆体的镜像会对敌人展开追杀。不过镜像非常脆弱，受到伤害就会瞬间消散。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofretribution.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of retribution
反熵%s: 复仇卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofretribution.blast
%s of anti-entropy: Powerful magical energy erupts from the scroll!
反熵%s: 强大的魔力从卷轴中爆发！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofretribution.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This scroll contains destructive energy which channels the reader's suffering outward into a blast of power. The weaker the reader is, the more damage they will deal. At very low health this scroll can kill most enemies instantly.\n\nUsing the scroll takes a toll on the user however, blinding and weakening them.
反熵%s: 这张卷轴可以将使用者的所受的伤痛转化为能量释放而出。使用者的伤势越重，所释放的能量越大。使用者处于低血量的情况下所释放的这种能量足以杀死大部分敌人。\n\n即便如此，这张卷轴依然会影响使用者，使其短时间目盲并虚弱无比。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofrage.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of rage
反熵%s: 盛怒卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofrage.roar
%s of anti-entropy: The scroll emits an enraging roar that echoes throughout the dungeon!
反熵%s: 卷轴产生的激怒咆哮在地牢中回荡！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofrage.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When read aloud, this scroll will unleash a great roar that draws all enemies to the reader, and enrages nearby ones.
反熵%s: 大声诵读内容时，卷轴将释放出一声轰响的咆哮，将所有敌人引向你并激怒附近的单位。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofrecharging.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of recharging
反熵%s: 充能卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofrecharging.surge
%s of anti-entropy: A surge of energy courses through your body, invigorating your wands!
反熵%s: 一股能量在体内奔腾而过，使你的法杖力量充沛！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofrecharging.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The raw magical power bound up in this parchment will charge up all the user's wands over time when released.
反熵%s: 纯正的魔法能量被禁锢在羊皮纸内，当这股能量被释放时会在短时间内持续为阅读者的所有法杖充能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofremovecurse.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of remove curse
反熵%s: 祛邪卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofremovecurse.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Cleanse an item
反熵%s: 选择一件要净化的物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofremovecurse.cleansed
%s of anti-entropy: Your item glows with a cleansing light, and a malevolent energy disperses!
反熵%s: 你的道具闪耀着净化的光芒，一股恶毒的能量从中消散。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofremovecurse.not_cleansed
%s of anti-entropy: Your item glows with a cleansing light, but nothing happens.
反熵%s: 你的道具闪耀着净化的光芒，不过什么也没发生。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofremovecurse.spirit
%s of anti-entropy: Your scroll frees the tormented spirit!
反熵%s: 你的卷轴让咒缚灵得以解脱！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofremovecurse.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The incantation on this scroll will instantly strip any curses from a single weapon, ring, wand, armor, or artifact.
反熵%s: 卷轴上的咒语能够瞬间清除指定的一件武器、护甲、法杖、戒指或神器上的诅咒。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofteleportation.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of teleportation
反熵%s: 传送卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofteleportation.tele
%s of anti-entropy: In a blink of an eye you were teleported to another location of the level.
反熵%s: 眨眼之间你就被传送到本层的另外一个位置。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofteleportation.no_tele
%s of anti-entropy: The teleportation magic fails.
反熵%s: 传送魔法失败了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofteleportation.cant_reach
%s of anti-entropy: You can't teleport there.
反熵%s: 你不能传送到那个位置。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofteleportation.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Choose a location to teleport
反熵%s: 选择想要传送的地点

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofteleportation.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The spell on this parchment instantly transports the reader to a different location on the dungeon level. The scroll prioritizes areas the reader hasn't been to before, though it is not able to teleport past locked doors or barricades. It can, however, reveal hidden doors that lead to new areas.
反熵%s: 羊皮纸上的咒语能立刻让阅读者传送到本层的另一处。卷轴会优先选择阅读者还未探索的地方，但无法将人传送到门被锁或被路障堵住入口的密室中。不过，它能帮助发现通向未知区域的隐藏门。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofterror.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of terror
反熵%s: 恐惧卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofterror.none
%s of anti-entropy: The scroll emits a brilliant flash of red light.
反熵%s: 这个卷轴产生了一阵明亮的红色闪光。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofterror.one
%s of anti-entropy: The scroll emits a brilliant flash of red light and the %s flees!
反熵%s: 这个卷轴产生了一阵明亮的红色闪光的同时%s逃跑了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofterror.many
%s of anti-entropy: The scroll emits a brilliant flash of red light and the monsters flee!
反熵%s: 这个卷轴产生了一阵明亮的红色闪光的同时怪物们逃跑了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofterror.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When read, this scroll will emit a flash of red light that will overwhelm all enemies in your field of view with terror, and they will turn and flee. Attacking a fleeing enemy will shorten the effect.
反熵%s: 被阅读的时候，该卷轴会爆射出一道可怖的红色闪光，以恐惧压垮使用者视野范围内生物的心智并使它们转身逃跑。攻击正在逃跑的敌人会缩短该效果的持续时长。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrolloftransmutation.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of transmutation
反熵%s: 嬗变卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrolloftransmutation.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Transmute an item
反熵%s: 选择一件要嬗变的物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrolloftransmutation.nothing
%s of anti-entropy: Nothing interesting happens.
反熵%s: 没发生什么有意思的事。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrolloftransmutation.morph
%s of anti-entropy: Your item morphs into something different!
反熵%s: 你的道具变成了另一样东西！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrolloftransmutation.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This scroll contains powerful transmutation magic. When used on an eligible item it will transform it into a different item of the same type. The magic will even preserve upgrades, enchantments, and glyphs. Scrolls and potions will be transmuted into their exotic equivalent, and vice-versa.
反熵%s: 卷轴内存着强力的嬗变魔法，用在可行的物品上会将其转变成同类型的另一样物品。嬗变魔法还会保留原物品上的升级、附魔和刻印。卷轴或药剂将被转化为秘卷或合剂，反之亦然。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofupgrade.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of upgrade
反熵%s: 升级卷轴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofupgrade.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Upgrade an item
反熵%s: 选择一件要升级的物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofupgrade.weaken_curse
%s of anti-entropy: The scroll of upgrade weakens the curse on your item.
反熵%s: 升级卷轴减弱了物品上的诅咒。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofupgrade.remove_curse
%s of anti-entropy: The scroll of upgrade cleanses the curse on your item!
反熵%s: 升级卷轴净化了物品上的诅咒！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.scrollofupgrade.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This scroll will upgrade a single item. Wands will increase in power and number of charges, weapons and armor will deal and block more damage, and the effects of rings will intensify.\n\nIt can even weaken or sometimes totally dispel curses, though it is not as potent as a scroll of remove curse. Unfortunately, the upgrading magic can also erase enchantments or glyphs on higher level gear.
反熵%s: 这张卷轴可以升级一件物品。升级可以强化法杖的威力和充能数、武器护甲的攻防属性、戒指的增益效果。\n\n这张卷轴能弱化诅咒甚至可能将其完全净化，但是效果不如祛邪卷轴稳定。不幸地，升级魔法也可能消除高级装备的附魔或刻印。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.kaunan
%s of anti-entropy: exotic scroll of KAUNAN
反熵%s: KAUNAN秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.sowilo
%s of anti-entropy: exotic scroll of SOWILO
反熵%s: SOWILO秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.laguz
%s of anti-entropy: exotic scroll of LAGUZ
反熵%s: LAGUZ秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.yngvi
%s of anti-entropy: exotic scroll of YNGVI
反熵%s: YNGVI秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.gyfu
%s of anti-entropy: exotic scroll of GYFU
反熵%s: GYFU秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.raido
%s of anti-entropy: exotic scroll of RAIDO
反熵%s: RAIDO秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.isaz
%s of anti-entropy: exotic scroll of ISAZ
反熵%s: ISAZ秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.mannaz
%s of anti-entropy: exotic scroll of MANNAZ
反熵%s: MANNAZ秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.naudiz
%s of anti-entropy: exotic scroll of NAUDIZ
反熵%s: NAUDIZ秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.berkanan
%s of anti-entropy: exotic scroll of BERKANAN
反熵%s: BERKANAN秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.odal
%s of anti-entropy: exotic scroll of ODAL
反熵%s: ODAL秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.tiwaz
%s of anti-entropy: exotic scroll of TIWAZ
反熵%s: TIWAZ秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.exoticscroll.unknown_desc
%s of anti-entropy: A glowing indecipherable magical rune is written on this black parchment. It seems to be foreign to this land, who knows what it will do when read aloud?
反熵%s: 这张漆黑的羊皮纸上刻满了闪耀着魔力光芒的晦涩符文。看起来这不是这个世界的物品。大声念出来会发生什么？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofsirenssong.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of siren's song
反熵%s: 魅音秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofsirenssong.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Choose a target
反熵%s: 选择一个目标

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofsirenssong.no_target
%s of anti-entropy: The scroll activates without a target.
反熵%s: 这张秘卷在没有目标的情况下激活了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofsirenssong.cancel
%s of anti-entropy: You must choose a target.
反熵%s: 你必须选择一个目标。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofsirenssong.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Reading this scroll emits an alluring melody which will enthrall a targeted enemy, permanently turning them into an ally! Other enemies who hear it will be temporarily charmed.\n\nParticularly strong enemies can resist the enthrall effect, and will be charmed instead.
反熵%s: 阅读此卷轴将播放出摄人心魄的音律，令目标敌人沉沦于你，永久地变成盟友！听到这歌声的其它敌人则是暂时被魅惑。\n\n特别强大的敌人可以抵抗沉沦效果，但同样会被魅惑。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofsirenssong$enthralled.name
%s of anti-entropy: enthralled
反熵%s: 沉沦

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofsirenssong$enthralled.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This creature has been bewitched by the magic of a scroll of siren's song.\n\nAn enthralled character is permanently your ally, and will fight any enemies they encounter.
反熵%s: 这个生物已因魅音秘卷的效果而沉沦。\n\n沉沦的单位将永远忠心于你，并主动攻击其遇到的所有敌人。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofantimagic.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of anti-magic
反熵%s: 驱魔秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofantimagic.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The incantation on this scroll will surround you with a magical aura that temporarily blocks all magical effects, harmful or helpful. This includes most magical item effects such as wands, scrolls, rings, artifacts, enchantments, and curses. Heroic armor abilities are strong enough to work regardless however.
反熵%s: 使用这张秘卷会让你被包裹在一个能够屏蔽所有魔法效果的魔力结界中，无论它是有利或是有害。屏蔽效果包括大多数魔法物品效果，例如法杖、卷轴、戒指、神器、附魔与诅咒。特别地，英雄护甲技能足够强大，因而能够不受该秘卷的限制。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofchallenge.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of challenge
反熵%s: 决斗秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofchallenge.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
When read aloud, this scroll will unleash a great roar that draws enemies to the user while simultaneously creating a small arena around them.

As long as the reader stays in this arena they will take 33% less damage from all sources (this is applied before other forms of damage reduction), and they will not lose satiety.

The size of the arena will scale with the size of the area the reader is in. It will be particularly small in some boss areas.
反熵%s:
大声诵读此卷轴时，它将发出巨大的吼声，将敌人吸引到诵读者身边，同时在它们周围创建一个小型的竞技场。

只要使用者在这个竞技场里，就将获得33%的伤害减免(在其它所有伤害减免计算之前)，并且不会损失饱食度。

竞技场的大小将随着诵读者所在区域的大小而改变。在一些Boss战区域，竞技场会格外的小。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofchallenge$challengearena.name
%s of anti-entropy: challenge arena
反熵%s: 决斗区域

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofchallenge$challengearena.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
A magical arena has appeared around you, denoted by a billowing red fog.

While standing in the fog, your hunger will not increase and you will take 33%% less damage from all sources. If you have any other sources of damage reduction (such as armor), they will apply after the 33%% reduction.

Turns remaining: %d.
反熵%s:
一个由魔力构筑的竞技场在你周围浮现，其中翻腾着一阵猩红血雾。

当你站在雾中时，饥饿值不会增加，并且受到的任何伤害都会减少33%%。如果你有任何其他减伤手段(例如护甲)，它们都会在33%%伤害减免之后生效。

剩余回合数：%d回合

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofdivination.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of divination
反熵%s: 预知秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofdivination.nothing_left
%s of anti-entropy: There is nothing left to identify!
反熵%s: 没有可以鉴定的道具了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofdivination.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This scroll will randomly identify four types of item that you don't currently know. The types identified can be a potion's color, a scroll's rune, or a ring's gem. The items identified won't necessarily be ones you're carrying.
反熵%s: 这张秘卷会随机鉴定四种你尚未明确的道具。它可能帮你鉴定出某药剂的颜色，某卷轴的符文，或是某戒指的宝石。不过被鉴定的道具未必是你包裹中有的。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofdivination$wnddivination.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Your scroll of divination has identified the following items:
反熵%s: 你的预知秘卷鉴定了下列道具：

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofdread.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of dread
反熵%s: 梦魇秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofdread.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
When read, this scroll will emit a flash of red light that will instill incredible terror in all enemies in your field of view. So great is this effect that they will rapidly try to flee from the entire dungeon, never to be seen again!

Just like with terror, this effect can expire with time, or if the enemy is attacked.

Strong-willed enemies, such as bosses, will be inflicted with regular terror instead.
反熵%s:
诵读的时候，梦魇秘卷会爆射出一道极度可怖的红色闪光，其中的杀气仿佛已经凝成实体。这足以令你视野中所有的敌人吓得魂飞魄散，不顾一切地想要逃离这座地牢，永远也不回来了！

与恐惧效果一样，逃命的敌人也会随着时间流逝逐渐冷静下来，来自外界的伤害更能加速这一过程。

意志坚定的敌人，比如Boss们，将能抵抗逃命的冲动，但仍会感到恐惧。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofenchantment.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of enchantment
反熵%s: 注魔秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofenchantment.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Enchant an item
反熵%s: 附魔一件物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofenchantment.weapon
%s of anti-entropy: Select an enchantment to apply to your weapon.
反熵%s: 为你的武器选择附魔。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofenchantment.armor
%s of anti-entropy: Select a glyph to apply to your armor.
反熵%s: 为你的防具选择刻印。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofenchantment.cancel
%s of anti-entropy: cancel
反熵%s: 取消

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofenchantment.cancel_warn
%s of anti-entropy: Cancelling will still consume your scroll of enchantment, are you sure?
反熵%s: 取消该行动仍然会消耗你的注魔秘卷，你确定吗？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofenchantment.cancel_warn_yes
%s of anti-entropy: Yes, I'm sure
反熵%s: 是的，我确定

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofenchantment.cancel_warn_no
%s of anti-entropy: No, I changed my mind
反熵%s: 不，我改主意了

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofenchantment.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This scroll will infuse a weapon or armor with powerful magical energy. The reader even has some degree of control over which magic is imbued.
反熵%s: 这张秘卷可以为武器或护甲注入强大的魔力。使用者甚至可以在一定程度上选择注入哪种魔力。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofforesight.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of foresight
反熵%s: 先见秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofforesight.desc
%s of anti-entropy: After reading this scroll, the detail of nearby terrain will be constantly fed to the reader's mind in crystal clarity. This effect lasts for a considerable amount of time, and will reveal all hidden doors or traps, making searching unnecessary.
反熵%s: 在阅读了这幅卷轴后，附近地形的细节将自发不断地映入阅读者的脑海。这种效果会持续相当长的一段时间，并且会揭示所有的隐藏门与陷阱，不再需要主动搜索。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofmetamorphosis.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of metamorphosis
反熵%s: 蜕变秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofmetamorphosis.choose_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Choose a talent to metamorphose.
反熵%s: 选择一个天赋以进行蜕变

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofmetamorphosis.replace_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Choose a new talent to replace your metamorphosed talent with.
反熵%s: 选择你希望蜕变出的天赋

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofmetamorphosis.cancel_warn
%s of anti-entropy: Cancelling will still consume your scroll of metamorphosis, are you sure?
反熵%s: 取消该行动仍然会消耗你的蜕变秘卷，你确定吗？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofmetamorphosis.metamorphose_talent
%s of anti-entropy: metamorphose talent
反熵%s: 蜕变天赋

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofmetamorphosis.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This scroll contains powerful transmutation magic, which will apply to the caster instead of to an item. The magic of this scroll will let you select one talent, and replace it with one of four talents of the same tier from different hero classes!\n\nThis effect can only apply to class talents, not talents gained from subclasses or armor abilities. Talents that you cannot use will not be given as options.
反熵%s: 这张秘卷充满了嬗变的魔力，不过与一般的嬗变卷轴不同。这股魔力将作用于释放者本身而不是一个物品。秘卷的魔力将允许你蜕变一个自身的天赋，使其转化为来自其他不同英雄的同层天赋之一！\n\n这个效果只适用于英雄自身的天赋，对专精天赋与护甲天赋无效。那些你无法使用的天赋将不会出现在蜕变选项里。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofmysticalenergy.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of mystical energy
反熵%s: 魔能秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofmysticalenergy.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The raw magical power bound up in this parchment will, when released, charge a user's equipped artifacts over time.
反熵%s: 奇异的魔法能量被禁锢在秘卷羊皮纸内，当这股能量被释放时会在短时间内持续为阅读者的所有神器充能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofpassage.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of passage
反熵%s: 归返秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofpassage.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The spell on this parchment instantly transports the reader to the nearest region first floor above them. Very handy for quickly getting to a shop.
反熵%s: 这张羊皮纸上的咒语能瞬间将读者传送到楼上与之距离最近的区域首层。想去商店的话，用这张秘卷会非常方便。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofprismaticimage.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of prismatic image
反熵%s: 虹卫秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofprismaticimage.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
The incantation on this scroll will create a colorful illusory twin of the reader. This prismatic image acts as a weaker clone of the reader, with similar defence but lower hp and damage.

The prismatic image will show itself when enemies are present, and will attempt to defend the reader.

If a prismatic image already exists, using this scroll will fully heal it.
反熵%s:
这张秘卷上的咒文会创造使用者的一个虹光守卫。这个像使用者的弱化版克隆体的幻像有着相同的防御，但生命值和造成的伤害更低。

虹光守卫将吸引敌人的火力从而保护使用者。

当虹光守卫存在时阅读这张秘卷将会为其恢复所有生命。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofpsionicblast.name
%s of anti-entropy: scroll of psionic blast
反熵%s: 灵爆秘卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofpsionicblast.ondeath
%s of anti-entropy: The Psionic Blast tears your mind apart...
反熵%s: 灵能震爆撕碎了你的意识...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.scrolls.exotic.scrollofpsionicblast.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This scroll contains incredible destructive energy that can be channeled to destroy the minds of all visible creatures.\n\nThere is significant feedback however, and the reader will also be damaged, blinded, and weakened. The more targets the scroll hits, the less self-damage will be taken.
反熵%s: 这张秘卷封存着惊人的毁灭性能量，一旦被释放出来可摧毁视野内所有生物的心智。\n\n然而，使用者也会遭受灵爆的严重反噬，使其身受重创，双目失明，力量虚弱。灵爆秘卷击中的目标越多，其对使用者造成的伤害越低。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.alchemize.name
%s of anti-entropy: alchemize
反熵%s: 炼金菱晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.alchemize.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Alchemize an Item
反熵%s: 炼化一个物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.alchemize.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This spell contains transmutative powers similar to those found in an alchemy pot. Each cast allows the user to turn an item (or stack of items) into gold or alchemical energy. Turning potions or scrolls into energy will even identify them!\n\nA few Alchemize uses are sold from shops, but many more can be made using alchemy by combining a seed, runestone, and a little alchemical energy.
反熵%s: 这个菱晶包含的转化能力与炼金釜类似。允许使用者将一件物品(或一堆物品)转化为金币或炼金能量。将药剂、卷轴炼化为能量甚至可以鉴定它们！\n\n你可以在商店中买到少许炼金菱晶，但也可以通过炼金术用种子、符石与少量炼金能量合成更多的炼金菱晶。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.alchemize$wndalchemizeitem.sell
%s of anti-entropy: Turn into %dg
反熵%s: 转化为%d个金币

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.alchemize$wndalchemizeitem.sell_1
%s of anti-entropy: Turn 1 into %dg
反熵%s: 转化一个为%d个金币

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.alchemize$wndalchemizeitem.sell_all
%s of anti-entropy: Turn all into %dg
反熵%s: 转化全部为%d个金币

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.alchemize$wndalchemizeitem.energize
%s of anti-entropy: Turn into %d energy
反熵%s: 转化为%d点能量

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.alchemize$wndalchemizeitem.energize_1
%s of anti-entropy: Turn 1 into %d energy
反熵%s: 转化一个为%d点能量

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.alchemize$wndalchemizeitem.energize_all
%s of anti-entropy: Turn all into %d energy
反熵%s: 转化全部为%d点能量

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.beaconofreturning.name
%s of anti-entropy: beacon of returning
反熵%s: 返回晶柱

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.beaconofreturning.preventing
%s of anti-entropy: The strong magic aura of this place prevents you from using the spell!
反熵%s: 这里强大的魔力流阻止了你的晶柱效果！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.beaconofreturning.creatures
%s of anti-entropy: The Psychic aura of neighbouring creatures doesn't allow you to teleport at this moment.
反熵%s: 临近生物的心灵信号干扰不允许你在此刻进行传送。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.beaconofreturning.set
%s of anti-entropy: The beacon was set at your current location.
反熵%s: 信标设置在了你现在的位置。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.beaconofreturning.wnd_body
%s of anti-entropy: Setting will override the location the beacon was previously set to.\n\nReturning will return to your last set location and consume one use of the spell.
反熵%s: 新的设置会覆盖原来的信标设置的位置。\n\n返回将会让你回到上一个设置的位置并且消耗一个菱晶。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.beaconofreturning.wnd_set
%s of anti-entropy: Set
反熵%s: 设置

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.beaconofreturning.wnd_return
%s of anti-entropy: Return
反熵%s: 返回

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.beaconofreturning.desc_set
%s of anti-entropy: This beacon was set somewhere on floor %d.
反熵%s: 信标被设置在了第%d层的某处

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.beaconofreturning.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This intricate spell grants the user the ability to return to a set location, regardless of distance. The spell will only be consumed by returning, it can be set as many times as you like, but it will only remember the most recent location it was set to.
反熵%s: 这个复杂的晶柱给予了使用者无视距离返回到设定地点的能力。该晶柱只会在返回时消耗。你可以随时改变它的设定位置，但该晶柱只能记忆最近一次设置的位置。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.curseinfusion.name
%s of anti-entropy: curse infusion
反熵%s: 诅咒菱晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.curseinfusion.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Curse an item
反熵%s: 诅咒一件物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.curseinfusion.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
This spell infuses a piece of equipment with the same powerful malignant magic present within DM-300. The item it is used on will immediately be cursed, and any enchantment or glyph it may have had will be overridden.

In the case of weapons, armor, and wands, the item will gain upgrades in addition to being cursed. Curse infusion upgrades do not stack, and the upgrades are lost if the item becomes uncursed.

Multiple curse infusions can also be used to change the curse on a weapon or armor.
反熵%s:
这个菱晶可以向一件装备注入和DM-300内部相同的的邪恶魔法。目标物品会立刻被诅咒，且原有的附魔与刻印会被覆盖。

对武器、护甲和法杖使用时，诅咒菱晶在诅咒的基础上还会升级目标物品。诅咒菱晶造成的升级不会叠加，而且去除诅咒后升级也随之消失。

对武器护甲的重复诅咒可以更换其上的诅咒种类。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.spell.ac_cast
%s of anti-entropy: CAST
反熵%s: 施放

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.spell.no_magic
%s of anti-entropy: You can't cast spells while magic immune.
反熵%s: 你无法在魔法免疫的情况下使用法术结晶。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.magicalinfusion.name
%s of anti-entropy: magical infusion
反熵%s: 注魔菱晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.magicalinfusion.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Infuse an item
反熵%s: 灌注一件物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.magicalinfusion.infuse
%s of anti-entropy: Your item is infused with arcane energy!
反熵%s: 你的物品充满了奥术能量！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.magicalinfusion.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This spell possesses the same magical power as a scroll of upgrade, but in a more stable form.\n\nIn addition to upgrading an item as normal it will never erase an enchantment, glyph, or curse.
反熵%s: 这个菱晶蕴含着和升级卷轴同样强大的魔力，不过这种魔力更为稳定。\n\n这个菱晶在升级道具的同时不会消除上面的附魔、刻印或诅咒。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.magicalporter.name
%s of anti-entropy: magical porter
反熵%s: 信使结晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.magicalporter.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Port an item
反熵%s: 传送一个物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.magicalporter.nowhere
%s of anti-entropy: There is nowhere for you to port an item to.
反熵%s: 没有传送物品的目标地点。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.magicalporter.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This spell will magically transport any item it is cast on. Unlike a merchant's beacon however, the items will be transported to the entrance of the next boss floor.
反熵%s: 这个结晶能够通过魔法传送任何成为施法目标的物品。但不同于商人信标，这些物品会被传送到下一个boss层的入口处。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.phaseshift.name
%s of anti-entropy: phase shift
反熵%s: 转移结晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.phaseshift.no_target
%s of anti-entropy: There is nothing to teleport there.
反熵%s: 那里没什么可传送的东西。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.phaseshift.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This chaotic spell will teleport any character it is aimed at to a random location on the current floor, and stun them for a significant amount of time. Powerful foes will be able to resist the stunning effect. This spell can be directed at a target or at the user themselves.
反熵%s: 这个充满混沌能量的结晶会将目标单位传送到本层随机位置。被传送的角色会被麻痹相当长的一段时间，而足够强大的敌人则可抵抗该效果。这个结晶可以对目标单位或施法者自身使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.reclaimtrap.name
%s of anti-entropy: reclaim trap
反熵%s: 陷阱晶柱

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.reclaimtrap.no_trap
%s of anti-entropy: There is no trap there.
反熵%s: 这里没有陷阱。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.reclaimtrap.desc_trap
%s of anti-entropy: The spell is currently ready to trigger a _%s._
反熵%s: 施放晶柱将在目标位置产生一次_%s_的效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.reclaimtrap.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This spell contains remnants of the mechanical energy of DM-300. When cast on an active trap, the power of the trap will become attached to you, allowing you to use the spell again to expel this power and trigger the trap's effect at any location you like.\n\nHowever, some traps may not function in all places, and only one trap can be stored at a time.
反熵%s: 这个晶柱蕴含着DM-300残余的机械能量。当对一个未触发的陷阱使用时，陷阱的力量会附着在你身上，使你能再次使用晶柱以释放这股力量并在你指定的任何位置触发此陷阱的效果。\n\n不过，有的陷阱并不能在任何位置都生效，而且晶柱一次只能储存一个陷阱。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.recycle.name
%s of anti-entropy: recycle
反熵%s: 转换菱晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.recycle.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Recycle an item
反熵%s: 转换一件物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.recycle.recycled
%s of anti-entropy: Your item was recycled into: %s.
反熵%s: 你的物品被转换为%s。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.recycle.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This spell contains a lesser form of transmutation magic. While it won't work on equipment, this spell will transform a scroll, potion, seed, runestone, or tipped dart into a random item of the same type.
反熵%s: 这个菱晶蕴含着弱化的嬗变魔力。虽然不能对装备使用，但它能将卷轴、药剂、种子、符石或涂药飞镖转换为一个随机的同类物品。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.summonelemental.name
%s of anti-entropy: summon elemental
反熵%s: 唤魔晶柱

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.summonelemental.ac_imbue
%s of anti-entropy: IMBUE
反熵%s: 灌注

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.summonelemental.imbue_prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Imbue an item
反熵%s: 灌注一件物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.summonelemental.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This spell channels the energy of the elemental embers used to make it, and will allow you to summon a friendly elemental to fight with you! Only one elemental can be summoned at a time, but the spell can be re-cast to return the elemental to you at no cost.
反熵%s: 这个晶柱联系着用于制造它的元素余烬的能量，能够召唤出一个友好的元素助你战斗！同一时间只能召唤一个元素，但是重新释放该元素不需要消耗额外能量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.summonelemental.desc_newborn
%s of anti-entropy: The spell is currently unimbued, and will summon a _newborn elemental_ without a ranged attack. You can imbue an identified potion of liquid flame, potion of frost, scroll of recharging, or scroll of transmutation to power the spell up, causing future summons to be a full power elemental!
反熵%s: 这个晶柱尚未被灌注，只能召唤一个不会远程攻击的_新生元素_。你可以用已鉴定的液火药剂、冰霜药剂、充能卷轴或嬗变卷轴为其充能，使其之后召唤出的都是完全体元素！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.summonelemental.desc_fire
%s of anti-entropy: The spell is currently hot to the touch, it will summon a _fire elemental_. You can imbue a different item, but the spell will lose its current imbue.
反熵%s: 这个晶柱触感灼热，可用来召唤出一个_火焰元素_。你可以通过灌注的方法覆盖当前的充能类型。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.summonelemental.desc_frost
%s of anti-entropy: The spell is currently cold to the touch, it will summon a _frost elemental_. You can imbue a different item, but the spell will lose its current imbue.
反熵%s: 这个晶柱触感冰冷，可用来召唤出一个_冰霜元素_。你可以通过灌注的方法覆盖当前的充能类型。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.summonelemental.desc_shock
%s of anti-entropy: The spell is currently radiating static energy, it will summon a _shock elemental_. You can imbue a different item, but the spell will lose its current imbue.
反熵%s: 这个晶柱散发着静电能量，可用来召唤出一个_电光元素_。你可以通过灌注的方法覆盖当前的充能类型。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.summonelemental.desc_chaos
%s of anti-entropy: The spell is currently radiating chaotic energy, it will summon a _chaos elemental_. You can imbue a different item, but the spell will lose its current imbue.
反熵%s: 这个晶柱散发着混沌能量，可用来召唤出一个_混沌元素_。你可以通过灌注的方法覆盖当前的充能类型。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.targetedspell.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Choose a target
反熵%s: 选择一个目标

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.targetedspell.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Infuse an item
反熵%s: 灌注一件物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.telekineticgrab.name
%s of anti-entropy: telekinetic grab
反熵%s: 念力结晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.telekineticgrab.cant_grab
%s of anti-entropy: You can't grab that.
反熵%s: 你无法抓取它。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.telekineticgrab.no_target
%s of anti-entropy: There's nothing to grab there.
反熵%s: 这里没什么可抓取的东西。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.telekineticgrab.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This spell allows the caster to remotely grab all items at a location, or all thrown weapons stuck to an enemy!\n\nIt can't be used to grab items that someone else owns, or to grab containers like chests.
反熵%s: 这个结晶允许使用者远程抓取一格所有的物体，或从敌人身上取回卡住的投掷武器！\n\n结晶无法用于抓取其他角色拥有的物品，也无法抓取诸如箱子这般的容器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.unstablespell.name
%s of anti-entropy: unstable spell
反熵%s: 无序结晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.unstablespell.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This small black square crystal has shifting runic symbols on each of its surfaces.\n\nWhen activated, it will trigger the effect of a random scroll. The scroll effect will always be combat focused if there are enemies in your field of view, and will always be non-combat focused otherwise.
反熵%s: 这个小型黑色立方结晶的表面附有流动着的符文碎形。\n\n视野内有敌人时，激活它会触发一个随机的战斗类卷轴效果；而视野内没有敌人时激活它会触发一个非战斗类卷轴效果

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.wildenergy.name
%s of anti-entropy: wild energy
反熵%s: 强能结晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.spells.wildenergy.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This spell contains some of the cursed energy which powered DM-300. When cast, it will recharge your wands and worn artifacts, while also triggering a random cursed wand effect. You are able to choose a direction for this cursed magic to shoot in, however.
反熵%s: 这个结晶中含有部分驱动DM-300的诅咒之力。当施放时，它会为你的法杖与佩戴着的神器充能，但同时也会随机触发一种诅咒法杖效果。幸运的是你可以指定这种诅咒魔法的施放方向。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.inventorystone.ac_use
%s of anti-entropy: USE
反熵%s: 使用

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.runestone$placeholder.name
%s of anti-entropy: runestone
反熵%s: 符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaggression.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of aggression
反熵%s: 敌意符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaggression.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When this stone is thrown at an ally or enemy, all nearby enemies will prefer to attack that character for a short time. \n\nBoss enemies can resist the effect however, reducing the duration significantly and taking less damage from their minion's attacks.
反熵%s: 当把这颗符石丢向一个盟友或敌人时，附近所有敌人都会在短时间内优先攻击该单位。\n\n然而，Boss对符石效果具有抗性，能够显著降低符石效果持续时间并降低其随从对Boss造成的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaggression$aggression.name
%s of anti-entropy: targeted
反熵%s: 众矢之的

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaggression$aggression.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Manipulative magic is making all nearby enemies prefer to attack this character.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
反熵%s: 支配魔法正使附近所有敌人优先攻击该单位。\n\n剩余回合数：%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaugmentation.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of augmentation
反熵%s: 强化符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaugmentation.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Augment an item
反熵%s: 强化一件物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaugmentation.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
This runestone possesses potent magic which can augment equipment to enhance one property at the cost of another.

Using on a weapon will allow you to enhance either speed or damage.

Using on armor will allow you to enhance either defense or evasion.
反熵%s:
这颗符石内的强力魔法可以用于强化装备的一种属性，代价是会减弱另一种属性。

用于武器可以强化伤害或者速度。

用于护甲可以强化防御或者闪避。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaugmentation$wndaugment.choice
%s of anti-entropy: What would you like to enhance?
反熵%s: 你想强化哪个属性？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaugmentation$wndaugment.speed
%s of anti-entropy: Speed
反熵%s: 速度

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaugmentation$wndaugment.damage
%s of anti-entropy: Damage
反熵%s: 伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaugmentation$wndaugment.evasion
%s of anti-entropy: Evasion
反熵%s: 闪避

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaugmentation$wndaugment.defense
%s of anti-entropy: Defense
反熵%s: 防御

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaugmentation$wndaugment.none
%s of anti-entropy: Remove Augmentation
反熵%s: 移除强化

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofaugmentation$wndaugment.cancel
%s of anti-entropy: Never mind
反熵%s: 算了

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofblast.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of blast
反熵%s: 震爆符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofblast.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This runestone will instantly explode at the location it is thrown to. Just like a bomb, the explosion will deal damage to anything nearby.
反熵%s: 这颗符石被扔出后会在目的地立即爆炸。和炸弹一样，爆炸会对范围内的所有东西造成伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofblink.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of blink
反熵%s: 闪现符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofblink.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This runestone will teleport the user to the location it is thrown to.
反熵%s: 这颗符石被扔出后会把使用者传送到目的地。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofclairvoyance.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of clairvoyance
反熵%s: 明示符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofclairvoyance.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This stone will instantly reveal all tiles in a very wide area around where it is thrown. Its effect will even reach through walls.
反熵%s: 这颗符石被扔出后会瞬间搜索以目的地为中心的巨大范围内的所有地格。该搜索能力甚至不受墙壁的阻隔。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofdeepsleep.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of deep sleep
反熵%s: 沉睡符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofdeepsleep.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When this stone is thrown at an enemy, it will put them into a deep magical sleep. Magically slept enemies will sleep forever until disturbed.
反熵%s: 当把这颗符石掷向一个敌人时，被命中的敌人会陷入魔法睡眠。陷入魔法睡眠的敌人会永远沉睡下去，除非受到外界打扰。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofdetectmagic.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of detect magic
反熵%s: 探魔符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofdetectmagic.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Detect an item
反熵%s: 探测一件物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofdetectmagic.detected_none
%s of anti-entropy: You don't detect any magic affecting this item.
反熵%s: 你探测出没有魔法影响着这件物品。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofdetectmagic.detected_both
%s of anti-entropy: You detect both positive and malevolent magic affecting this item!
反熵%s: 你探测出正面魔法和诅咒魔法同时影响着这件物品！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofdetectmagic.detected_good
%s of anti-entropy: You detect positive magic affecting this item!
反熵%s: 你探测出正面魔法影响着这件物品！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofdetectmagic.detected_bad
%s of anti-entropy: You detect malevolent magic affecting this item!
反熵%s: 你探测出诅咒魔法影响着这件物品！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofdetectmagic.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This runestone is able to detect magic affecting an item. Using this stone on an unidentified item will tell you if it is affected by a malevolent curse and whether it is affected by positive magic such as an enchantment or upgrades.
反熵%s: 这颗符石可以探测出影响着一件物品的魔法。对一件未鉴定物品使用此符石会为你探测其是否受到诅咒魔法的影响，以及其是否受到附魔或升级的正面魔法的影响。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofdisarming.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of disarming
反熵%s: 拆除符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofdisarming.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This runestone holds magic that can disable malicious traps hidden throughout the dungeon. It will disarm up to 9 traps around the area it is thrown at.
反熵%s: 这颗符石具有破坏隐藏于地牢各处的有害陷阱的魔力。它的魔力最多能拆除以投掷目的地为中心的一片区域内的9个陷阱。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofenchantment.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of enchantment
反熵%s: 附魔符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofenchantment.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Enchant an item
反熵%s: 附魔一件物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofenchantment.weapon
%s of anti-entropy: Your weapon glows in the darkness!
反熵%s: 你的武器在暗中微微发光！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofenchantment.armor
%s of anti-entropy: Your armor glows in the darkness!
反熵%s: 你的护甲在暗中微微发光！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofenchantment.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This runestone possesses enchanting magic. Unlike a scroll of upgrade, it will not increase the direct power of an item, but will instead imbue a weapon or armor with an enchantment, granting it a new power.
反熵%s: 这颗符石拥有施加附魔的能力。和升级卷轴不同，它不会直接加强一个道具的能力，但能给武器或者护甲施加附魔，使其拥有新的特性。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneoffear.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of fear
反熵%s: 恐惧符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneoffear.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When this stone is thrown onto a character they will be overwhelmed with terror, and will turn and flee. Attacking a fleeing character will shorten the effect.
反熵%s: 当把这颗符石掷向一个盟友或敌人时，被命中的角色会陷入深深的恐惧中，无法克制地逃离。攻击会刺激其从恐惧中更快恢复。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofflock.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of flock
反熵%s: 羊群符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofflock.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This runestone summons magical sheep for a short time around the location it is thrown to.
反熵%s: 这颗符石被扔出后会在目的地召唤一群魔法绵羊。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofintuition.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of intuition
反熵%s: 感知符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofintuition.inv_title
%s of anti-entropy: Select an item
反熵%s: 选择一件物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofintuition.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This runestone holds a weaker version of the magic found in scrolls of identification. Rather than directly identifying an item, it will work on your intuition, allowing you to attempt to identify the type of a potion, scroll, or ring by guessing.
反熵%s: 这块符石含有的魔法就像一个弱化版的鉴定卷轴。和鉴定卷轴那种直接识别物品的魔法不一样，它会加强你的直觉，让你通过猜测来试图鉴定一种药水、卷轴或者戒指的种类。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofintuition.break_info
%s of anti-entropy: You can use stones of intuition twice before one breaks, _your next use won't consume a stone_.
反熵%s: 你可以在其粉碎前使用两次感知符石，_你的下次使用不会消耗符石_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofintuition.break_warn
%s of anti-entropy: You've used a stone of intuition previously, so _your next use will consume a stone_.
反熵%s: 你之前已经使用了一次感知符石，所以_你的下次使用将会消耗符石_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofintuition$wndguess.text
%s of anti-entropy: Guess what the type of the unidentified item is. If you guess correctly, the type will be identified!
反熵%s: 猜猜这件未鉴定道具是什么。猜对了的话就会鉴定物品种类！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofintuition$wndguess.correct
%s of anti-entropy: Correct. The item's type has been identified!
反熵%s: 猜测正确，此类物品已被鉴定！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofintuition$wndguess.incorrect
%s of anti-entropy: Your guess was incorrect.
反熵%s: 你猜错了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofintuition$wndguess.break
%s of anti-entropy: Your stone of intuition crumbles to dust...
反熵%s: 你的感知符石化为了尘土...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofshock.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone of shock
反熵%s: 电击符石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stones.stoneofshock.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This runestone unleashes a blast of electrical energy which briefly stuns all nearby targets, and grants the thrower wand charge for each target hit.
反熵%s: 这颗符石被扔出后会爆出一阵电能量，短暂麻痹范围内所有目标并根据电到的目标数量恢复使用者的法杖充能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.chaoticcenser.name
%s of anti-entropy: chaotic censer
反熵%s: 混沌香炉

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.chaoticcenser.spew
%s of anti-entropy: Your censer is about to spew: %s.
反熵%s: 你的香炉将要喷出：%s。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.chaoticcenser.desc
%s of anti-entropy: After some time in the alchemy pot this incense-burning censer appears to be producing smoke all on its own! These gasses build up and will spew forth from the censer toward enemies at semi-random intervals. It seems capable of producing all sorts of gasses, but you'll get a moment of warning just before the censer activates.
反熵%s: 在炼金釜内炼制一段时间后，这个原用于焚香的香炉竟开始自发产生气体！这些气体会在炉内积聚起来，并间歇性地向敌人喷去。香炉似乎能够生成各式各样的气体，但在气体释放前你会得到片刻的预警。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.chaoticcenser.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will spawn a harmful gas near an enemy roughly every _%d_ turns. Gasses will only appear when enemies are present. At higher levels these gases are more likely to be exotic and powerful.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会每经_%d_±回合在敌人附近生成一团有害气体。气体仅在敌人存在时生成。更高等级的香炉生成稀有而强力的气体的可能性更高。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.chaoticcenser.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level, this trinket will spawn a harmful gas near an enemy roughly every _%d_ turns. Gasses will only appear when enemies are present. At higher levels these gases are more likely to be exotic and powerful.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会每经_%d_±回合在敌人附近生成一团有害气体。气体仅在敌人存在时生成。更高等级的香炉生成稀有而强力的气体的可能性更高。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.dimensionalsundial.name
%s of anti-entropy: dimensional sundial
反熵%s: 位面日晷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.dimensionalsundial.warning
%s of anti-entropy: Your sundial isn't casting a shadow, you feel uneasy.
反熵%s: 你的日晷不再显影，这使你倍感不安。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.dimensionalsundial.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This small handheld sundial is somehow able to cast a shadow in the depths of the dungeon, even if you aren't holding it upright. Even more strangely, the shadow's position seems to have no relation to the sun in this world. When no shadow is cast, the sundial seems to attract danger.
反熵%s: 不知为何，这块小型手持式日晷能在地牢深处显影，甚至你不将其摆正也是如此。更奇怪的是，晷影的方位似乎与这个世界的太阳无关。当晷影不再显现时，日晷似乎会招致危险。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.dimensionalsundial.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will reduce the spawning rate of enemies by _%1$d%%_ during the daytime in real life (8am-8pm), and increase the spawning rate of enemies by _%2$d%%_ at nighttime (8pm-8am).
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会在实时日间(早上8:00到晚上8:00)降低_%1$d%%_的敌人生成速率并在实时夜间(晚上8:00到早上8:00)提升_%2$d%%_的敌人生成速率。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.dimensionalsundial.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level, this trinket will reduce the spawning rate of enemies by _%1$d%%_ during the daytime in real life (8am-8pm), and increase the spawning rate of enemies by _%2$d%%_ at nighttime (8pm-8am).
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会在实时日间(早上8:00到晚上8:00)降低_%1$d%%_的敌人生成速率并在实时夜间(晚上8:00到早上8:00)提升_%2$d%%_的敌人生成速率。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.exoticcrystals.name
%s of anti-entropy: exotic crystals
反熵%s: 奇异能晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.exoticcrystals.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These small pink crystals have the same shape as crystals of alchemical energy. While they can't be used for energy directly, they seem to be somehow influencing the potions and scrolls you find.
反熵%s: 这些小型粉色晶体有着和炼金能量晶体一样的几何外形。尽管它们不能直接为炼金实验供能，但不知为何似乎能影响你找到的药剂和卷轴。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.exoticcrystals.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will replace _%s%%_ of potion or scroll drops with their exotic equivalents. This does not affect potions of strength, scrolls of upgrade, or items that are generated to help solve hazard rooms.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会使_%s%%_的药剂、卷轴转化为其对应的合剂、秘卷。转化不会影响力量药剂，升级卷轴与为解决特殊房间提供帮助而生成的物品。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.exoticcrystals.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will replace _%s%%_ of potion or scroll drops with their exotic equivalents. This does not affect potions of strength, scrolls of upgrade, or items that are generated to help solve hazard rooms.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会使_%s%%_的药剂、卷轴转化为其对应的合剂、秘卷。转化不会影响力量药剂，升级卷轴与为解决特殊房间提供帮助而生成的物品。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.eyeofnewt.name
%s of anti-entropy: eye of newt
反熵%s: 蝾螈魔眼

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.eyeofnewt.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This golden and black newt's eye is a common ingredient, now enhanced into a trinket. The eye seems to be reducing your vision in exchange for letting you see things in other ways.
反熵%s: 这颗黑金色的蝾螈之眼是一种常见的炼金原料，而现在已被附魔强化为一件饰物。魔眼似乎降低了你的视力，以为你换取其他形式的视觉。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.eyeofnewt.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will reduce your vision range by _%1$s%%_, but will also grant you mind vision on enemies within _%2$d_ tiles.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会降低你_%1$s%%_的视野范围，但也会使你获得对_%2$d_格范围内敌人的灵视感知。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.eyeofnewt.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will reduce your vision range by _%1$s%%_, but will also grant you mind vision on enemies within _%2$d_ tiles.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会降低你_%1$s%%_的视野范围，但也会使你获得对_%2$d_格范围内敌人的灵视感知。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.mimictooth.name
%s of anti-entropy: mimic tooth
反熵%s: 拟箱利齿

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.mimictooth.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This large sharp tooth must have been pulled from a very unhappy mimic. It seems to be influencing the mimics of the dungeon, making them more frequent and dangerous.
反熵%s: 这颗大尖牙肯定是强行从某个非常倒霉的宝箱怪口中拔下来的。它似乎能影响地牢中的宝箱怪，使它们更常见，也更危险。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.mimictooth.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will make all kinds of mimic _%1$sx_ more common and much more difficult to detect, but will also increase the amount of loot they drop. Each dungeon floor will also have a _%2$s%%_ chance to contain an extra stealthy ebony mimic.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会使所有类型的宝箱怪的出现频率变为原频率的_%1$s倍_，并使宝箱怪更难以识别，而其掉落的战利品也会更加丰厚。此外，每层地牢还会有_%2$s%%_的概率额外带有一个隐藏的黑檀宝箱怪。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.mimictooth.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will make all kinds of mimic _%1$sx_ more common and much more difficult to detect, but will also increase the amount of loot they drop. Each dungeon floor will also have a _%2$s%%_ chance to contain an extra stealthy ebony mimic.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会使所有类型的宝箱怪的出现频率变为原频率的_%1$s倍_，并使宝箱怪更难以识别，而其掉落的战利品也会更加丰厚。此外，每层地牢还会有_%2$s%%_的概率额外带有一个隐藏的黑檀宝箱怪。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.mossyclump.name
%s of anti-entropy: mossy clump
反熵%s: 苔藓丛簇

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.mossyclump.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This clump of wet moss seems to hold onto its moisture no matter how hard you squeeze it. It seems to be magically tied to the dungeon itself, making grass and water more likely to appear.
反熵%s: 无论你如何用力挤压它，这团潮湿的苔藓似乎都能保持其水分。它似乎通过魔法与地牢本身形成链接，促使草木流水频繁出现。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.mossyclump.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will make _%d%%_ of unthemed floors become filled with either water or grass instead.\n\nThis trinket costs a very large amount of energy to upgrade.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会使_%d%%_的无感觉楼层获得流水或草木感觉。\n\n这件饰物升级所消耗的炼金能量较多。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.mossyclump.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will make _%d%%_ of unthemed floors become filled with either water or grass instead.\n\nThis trinket costs a very large amount of energy to upgrade.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会使_%d%%_的无感觉楼层获得流水或草木感觉。\n\n这件饰物升级所消耗的炼金能量较多。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.parchmentscrap.name
%s of anti-entropy: parchment scrap
反熵%s: 残魔余卷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.parchmentscrap.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This little scrap of parchment looks like it came from a scroll. It has retained some of its magic, and it seems to be influencing weapons and armor found in the dungeon.
反熵%s: 这块小小的羊皮纸残片看起来来自一张卷轴。它仍附有一丝残存的魔力，并且似乎能影响在地牢中找到的武器和护甲。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.parchmentscrap.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will make enchantments and glyphs _%dx_ as common, and curses on weapons and armor _%sx_ as common. Curses on wands, rings, or artifacts are not affected.\n\nThis trinket costs a moderately large amount of energy to upgrade.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会使附魔与刻印的出现频率变为原频率的_%d倍_，而武器与护甲的诅咒的出现频率变为原频率的_%s倍_。法杖、戒指与神器的诅咒不受影响。\n\n这件饰物升级所消耗的炼金能量较多。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.parchmentscrap.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will make enchantments and glyphs _%dx_ as common, and curses on weapons and armor _%sx_ as common. Curses on wands, rings, or artifacts are not affected.\n\nThis trinket costs a moderately large amount of energy to upgrade.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会使附魔与刻印的出现频率变为原频率的_%d倍_，而武器与护甲的诅咒的出现频率变为原频率的_%s倍_。法杖、戒指与神器的诅咒不受影响。\n\n这件饰物升级所消耗的炼金能量较多。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.petrifiedseed.name
%s of anti-entropy: petrified seed
反熵%s: 石化种子

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.petrifiedseed.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This seed has been fossilised, either by slow geological processes or by magic. The seed seems to be magically influencing the flora of the dungeon, occasionally replacing plant seeds with runestones.
反熵%s: 这粒种子在缓慢的地质作用或法术作用的影响下石化了。它似乎通过魔法影响着地牢的植物群系，时不时使种子转化为符石。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.petrifiedseed.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will cause trampled grass to drop runestones instead of seeds _%1$s%%_ of the time, and will also cause high grass to drop items _%2$s%%_ more often.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会有_%1$s%%_的概率使被践踏的高草掉落符石而非种子，还会使高草掉落物品的概率提升_%2$s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.petrifiedseed.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will cause trampled grass to drop runestones instead of seeds _%1$s%%_ of the time, and will also cause high grass to drop items _%2$s%%_ more often.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会有_%1$s%%_的概率使被践踏的高草掉落符石而非种子，还会使高草掉落物品的概率提升_%2$s%%_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.ratskull.name
%s of anti-entropy: rat skull
反熵%s: 巨鼠头骨

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.ratskull.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This macabre trinket isn't much larger than the skull of a normal rat, which is somehow a rarity down in this dungeon. The skull's magical influence seems to attract the more rare denizens of the dungeon, making them appear far more often.
反熵%s: 这件可怕的饰物并不比正常老鼠的头骨大多少，但不知为何在这个地牢却很稀有。头骨的魔力似乎能吸引更多稀有的地牢住民，使它们更有可能出现。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.ratskull.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will make rare exotic enemies _%dx_ as likely to appear. The skull is only half as effective at attracting crystal mimics and armored statues, however.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会使稀有敌人的出现频率变为原频率的_%d倍_。然而，头骨对于提升水晶宝箱怪和装甲石像出现频率效果减半。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.ratskull.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will make rare exotic enemies _%dx_ as likely to appear. The skull is only half as effective at attracting crystal mimics and armored statues, however.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会使稀有敌人的出现频率变为原频率的_%d倍_。然而，头骨对于提升水晶宝箱怪与装甲石像出现频率效果减半。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.saltcube.name
%s of anti-entropy: salt cube
反熵%s: 盐晶立方

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.saltcube.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This large salt crystal was cut into an almost perfect cube shape, and it somehow managed to drain half the water from the alchemy pot instead of dissolving. It seems to be magically dehydrating and preserving the food you eat, extending the satiety you get, but also lessening your health restoration when not starving.
反熵%s: 这块巨大的盐晶被切割成近乎完美的立方体，而不知为何盐晶成功吸收了炼金釜中一半的水分而非溶解于其中。它似乎通过魔法脱水并保存了你的食物，延长了你所得的饱腹感，但也减少了你不挨饿时的生命回复。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.saltcube.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will increase the amount of time before you grow hungry by _%1$s%%_, but will also reduce your rate of health regeneration by _%2$s%%_.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会增加你_%1$s%%_的饥饿所需时间，但也会降低你_%2$s%%_的生命回复速率。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.saltcube.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will increase the amount of time before you grow hungry by _%1$s%%_, but will also reduce your rate of health regeneration by _%2$s%%_.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会增加你_%1$s%%_的饥饿所需时间，但也会降低你_%2$s%%_的生命回复速率。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.shardofoblivion.name
%s of anti-entropy: shard of oblivion
反熵%s: 遗忘碎片

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.shardofoblivion.desc
%s of anti-entropy: After stewing in the alchemy pot, this small shard of cursed metal has changed to be made of... nothing? Light seems to bend around it, and it hovers in place when you aren't holding it. The shard seems to be magically drawing power from your ignorance, so it's probably best to not think about it too much.
反熵%s: 经过炼金釜的烹煮，这一小块邪能碎片已经化为了...一片虚空？光线似乎在碎片边缘发生了弯曲，而只要你不握住它，它就会悬停在原地。碎片似乎通过魔法从你的无知中获得力量，所以对此最好不要想太多。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.shardofoblivion.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will increase the rate that enemies drop loot by 20%% for each piece of unidentified equipment you have equipped or recently used, to a max of _%d item(s)_. The shard will also prevent you from identifying equipment, but can be used to manually identify items that are ready for it.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会根据你已经装备或最近使用的每件(最多_%d件_)未鉴定装备提升20%%的敌人掉落战利品的概率。碎片还会阻止你鉴定装备，你只能通过碎片手动鉴定符合鉴定条件的装备。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.shardofoblivion.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will increase the rate that enemies drop loot by 20%% for each piece of unidentified equipment you have equipped or recently used, to a max of _%d item(s)_. The shard will also prevent you from identifying equipment, but can be used to manually identify items that are ready for it.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会根据你已经装备或最近使用的每件(最多_%d件_)未鉴定装备提升20%%的敌人掉落战利品的概率。碎片还会阻止你鉴定装备，你只能通过碎片手动鉴定符合鉴定条件的装备。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.shardofoblivion.ac_identify
%s of anti-entropy: IDENTIFY
反熵%s: 鉴定

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.shardofoblivion.identify_prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Identify an Item
反熵%s: 鉴定一件物品

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.shardofoblivion.identify_ready
%s of anti-entropy: An item is ready to identify: %s.
反熵%s: 符合鉴定条件的物品：%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.shardofoblivion.identify_ready_worn
%s of anti-entropy: Your worn items are now all ready to identify.
反熵%s: 你所装备的物品已符合鉴定条件。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.shardofoblivion.identify_not_yet
%s of anti-entropy: That item isn't ready to be identified yet.
反熵%s: 这件物品尚未符合鉴定条件。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.shardofoblivion.identify
%s of anti-entropy: You identify the item!
反熵%s: 你鉴定了这个物品！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.shardofoblivion$wandusetracker.name
%s of anti-entropy: Unidentified Wand Used
反熵%s: 已使用未鉴定法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.shardofoblivion$wandusetracker.desc
%s of anti-entropy: You have recently used an unidentified wand, which counts as one piece of used unidentified equipment for the shard of oblivion for a little while.\n\nTurns remaining: %s
反熵%s: 你最近使用了一根未鉴定法杖，短期内遗忘碎片将其视为使用了一件未鉴定装备。\n\n效果剩余时长：%s回合

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.thirteenleafclover.name
%s of anti-entropy: thirteen leaf clover
反熵%s: 十三叶草

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.thirteenleafclover.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Somehow stewing in the alchemy pot has caused this clover to grow a bunch of extra leaves! It's not really clear if this trinket is lucky or unlucky, perhaps this trinket will make your luck more chaotic?
反熵%s: 不知为何，炼金釜的烹煮导致这株三叶草长出了一堆额外的叶片！这件饰物幸运与否暂且不知，也许只会增加你的运气的混乱程度？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.thirteenleafclover.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will cause you to deal maximum damage _%1$d%%_ of the time, and minimum damage _%2$d%%_ of the time.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会使你有_%1$d%%_的概率造成最大伤害，而有_%2$d%%_的概率造成最小伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.thirteenleafclover.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will cause you to deal maximum damage _%1$d%%_ of the time, and minimum damage _%2$d%%_ of the time.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会使你有_%1$d%%_的概率造成最大伤害，而有_%2$d%%_的概率造成最小伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.trapmechanism.name
%s of anti-entropy: trap mechanism
反熵%s: 陷阱元件

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.trapmechanism.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The core mechanism of one of the dungeon's pitfall traps, carefully carved out of the floor so it can be carried. It seems to be magically tied to the dungeon itself, making hazardous terrain more common but also increasing your affinity towards it.
反熵%s: 地牢中某个塌方陷阱的核心元件，被小心地从地面中挖掘而出以便携带。它似乎通过魔法与地牢本身形成链接，促使险恶地形频繁出现，并增强了你对陷阱的探查能力。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.trapmechanism.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will make _%1$d%%_ of unthemed floors become filled with either traps or chasms instead. Additionally, _%2$d%%_ of the dungeon's hidden traps will instead be visible.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会使_%1$d%%_的无感觉楼层获得陷阱或深渊感觉。此外，地牢中_%2$d%%_的隐藏陷阱会变得可见。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.trapmechanism.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will make _%1$d%%_ of unthemed floors become filled with either traps or chasms instead. Additionally, _%2$d%%_ of the dungeon's hidden traps will instead be visible.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会使_%1$d%%_的无感觉楼层获得陷阱或深渊感觉。此外，地牢中_%2$d%%_的隐藏陷阱会变得可见。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.vialofblood.name
%s of anti-entropy: vial of blood
反熵%s: 凝血试管

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.vialofblood.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This thin vial contains the blood of some denizen of the dungeon, it moves slowly as you rotate the vial. It seems to be magically enhancing stronger healing effects, but also delaying them.
反熵%s: 这根细长的试管内装有一些地牢住民的血液，当你转动试管时其中的血液也会随之缓慢流动。它似乎通过魔法增强而延迟了更强的治疗效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.vialofblood.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will increase the overall health you gain from drinking potions of healing, waterskins, or wells of health by _%1$s%%_. However, these healing effects will also occur more slowly, regenerating a maximum of _%2$s_ HP per turn (this scales with hero level).
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会增加你_%1$s%%_的饮用治疗药剂、水袋或生命之泉获得的治疗总量。但上述治疗效果也会更慢地起效，每回合最多回复英雄_%2$s点_生命值(最大治疗量随英雄等级成长而成长)。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.vialofblood.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will increase the overall health you gain from drinking potions of healing, waterskins, or wells of health by _%1$s%%_. However, these healing effects will also occur more slowly, regenerating a maximum of _%2$s_ HP per turn (this scales with hero level).
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会增加你_%1$s%%_的饮用治疗药剂、水袋或生命之泉获得的治疗总量。但上述治疗效果也会更慢地起效，每回合最多回复英雄_%2$s点_生命值(最大治疗量随英雄等级成长而成长)。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.wondrousresin.name
%s of anti-entropy: wondrous resin
反熵%s: 奇迹树脂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.wondrousresin.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This shimmering blue resin appears to have the distilled essence of a cursed wand's magic. The magic from the alchemy pot has seemed to stabilize it somewhat, and it's now affecting your wands.
反熵%s: 这团泛着微光的蓝色树脂看起来附有某根诅咒法杖魔法的纯化精华。炼金釜中的魔力似乎在一定程度上稳定了树脂的诅咒魔法，而这种魔法现在正影响着你的法杖。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.wondrousresin.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this trinket will force cursed wand effects to become neutral or positive _%1$s%%_ of the time, and will cause uncursed wands to fire an additional neutral or positive cursed zap _%2$s%%_ of the time.\n\nThis trinket costs a moderately large amount of energy to upgrade.
反熵%s: 这件饰物通常会有_%1$s%%_的概率迫使诅咒法杖效果变得无害或有益，还会有_%2$s%%_的概率使无诅咒的法杖施放一次额外的无害或有益的诅咒法杖效果。\n\n这件饰物升级所消耗的炼金能量较多。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.wondrousresin.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: At its current level this trinket will force cursed wand effects to become neutral or positive _%1$s%%_ of the time, and will cause uncursed wands to fire an additional neutral or positive cursed zap _%2$s%%_ of the time.\n\nThis trinket costs a moderately large amount of energy to upgrade.
反熵%s: 在当前等级下，这件饰物会有_%1$s%%_的概率迫使诅咒法杖效果变得无害或有益，还会有_%2$s%%_的概率使无诅咒的法杖施放一次额外的无害或有益的诅咒法杖效果。\n\n这件饰物升级所消耗的炼金能量较多。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.trinketcatalyst.name
%s of anti-entropy: magical catalyst
反熵%s: 魔能触媒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.trinketcatalyst.window_text
%s of anti-entropy: The water begins to glow as you add the catalyst. There are a few nearby items you could imbue with energy to turn into a magical trinket.
反熵%s: 随着魔能触媒的置入，釜中的水逐渐泛起微光。你可以就近选择一件物品，注入炼金能量并将其炼成一件魔法饰物。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.trinketcatalyst.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ball of magical golden dust glimmers in the darkness of the dungeon. This catalyst can be used at an alchemy pot with a little alchemical energy to produce a unique trinket item.\n\nTrinkets provide various different effects that slightly alter the dungeon or its inhabitants. Trinkets can be upgraded with more energy to make their effect more powerful, or dropped to forego the effect entirely.
反熵%s: 这团泛着微光的金色粉尘在暗无边际的地牢中熠熠生辉。魔能触媒可被置入炼金釜中，结合少许炼金能量制成一件独特饰物。\n\n饰物提供各种小幅改变地牢环境或其住民的效果。通过消耗更多炼金能量升级饰物可以进一步增幅对应效果，丢掉饰物也可以完全摆脱其施加的影响。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.trinketcatalyst$randomtrinket.name
%s of anti-entropy: random trinket
反熵%s: 随机饰物

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.trinketcatalyst$randomtrinket.desc
%s of anti-entropy: One nearby item is stuck inside a pouch that you can't get open.\n\nThe alchemy process will dissolve the pouch away, but you won't know what trinket you'll get until you do it!
反熵%s: 就近的一件物品被塞进了一个你打不开的包裹内。\n\n炼金反应可以将包裹溶解，但是在得到饰物之前你可没法确定它到底是什么。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.trinkets.trinket$placeholder.name
%s of anti-entropy: trinket
反熵%s: 饰物

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.ondeath
%s of anti-entropy: You were killed by your own %s.
反熵%s: 你死于自己的%s。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.nothing
%s of anti-entropy: Nothing happens.
反熵%s: 什么事都没发生。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.mass_invuln
%s of anti-entropy: Brilliant light erupts from your wand!
反熵%s: 明耀的光芒从你的法杖迸射而出！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.petrify
%s of anti-entropy: You suddenly freeze in place!
反熵%s: 你突然被定在了原地！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.grass
%s of anti-entropy: Grass erupts around you!
反熵%s: 草木在你周围疯长而出！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.fire
%s of anti-entropy: You smell burning...
反熵%s: 你闻到了烧烤的味道...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.transmogrify_wand
%s of anti-entropy: Your wand transmogrifies into a different item!
反熵%s: 你的法杖变化成了另一样东西！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.transmogrify_other
%s of anti-entropy: Your item transmogrifies into something different!
反熵%s: 你的道具变化成了另一样东西！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.disguise
%s of anti-entropy: Your appearance changes before your eyes!
反熵%s: 你的外貌在你眼前发生了变化！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.supernova
%s of anti-entropy: A blazing ball of energy starts to grow. You might want to run!
反熵%s: 一颗灼热的能量球开始膨胀。情况不妙，走为上计！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.supernova_positive
%s of anti-entropy: A blazing ball of energy starts to grow, but it feels safe somehow.
反熵%s: 一颗灼热的能量球开始膨胀，但不知何故它似乎很安全。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.sinkhole
%s of anti-entropy: The ground starts to give way around you!
反熵%s: 你周围的地板在迅速崩塌！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.sinkhole_positive
%s of anti-entropy: The ground starts to give way, but feels solid enough beneath you.
反熵%s: 地板在迅速崩塌，但你感觉脚下足够结实。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.gravity
%s of anti-entropy: Gravity suddenly starts to pull in random directions!
反熵%s: 重力突然开始向随机方向牵引！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.gravity_positive
%s of anti-entropy: Gravity suddenly starts to pull in random directions, but this doesn't seem to affect you.
反熵%s: 重力突然开始向随机方向牵引，但这对你没有影响。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.cursedwand.gravity_end
%s of anti-entropy: The gravity chaos ends.
反熵%s: 重力混沌结束了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.damagewand.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Magic Damage
反熵%s: 魔法伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wand.ac_zap
%s of anti-entropy: ZAP
反熵%s: 释放

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wand.fizzles
%s of anti-entropy: Your wand fizzles; it must not have enough charge.
反熵%s: 你的法杖滋滋作响；一定是没能量了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wand.no_magic
%s of anti-entropy: Your wand fizzles; you cannot use wands while magic immune.
反熵%s: 你的法杖滋滋作响；你不能在魔法免疫时使用法杖。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wand.self_target
%s of anti-entropy: You can't target yourself!
反熵%s: 你不能瞄准你自己！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wand.identify
%s of anti-entropy: You are now familiar enough with your wand to identify it.
反熵%s: 你对你的法杖已经足够熟悉并将其完全鉴定。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wand.resin_one
%s of anti-entropy: This wand has gained _1 level_ from arcane resin.
反熵%s: 这根法杖已经从奥术树脂获得了_1_次升级。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wand.resin_many
%s of anti-entropy: This wand has gained _%d levels_ from arcane resin.
反熵%s: 这根法杖已经从奥术树脂获得了_%d_次升级。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wand.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: This wand is cursed, making its magic chaotic and random.
反熵%s: 这根法杖受到了诅咒，导致它的魔法混乱而随机。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wand.not_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: This wand is free of malevolent magic.
反熵%s: 这根法杖没有被诅咒。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wand.curse_discover
%s of anti-entropy: This %s is cursed!
反熵%s: 这根%s是诅咒的！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wand.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Choose a location to zap
反熵%s: 选择要释放魔法的位置

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wand$placeholder.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand
反熵%s: 法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofblastwave.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of blast wave
反熵%s: 冲击波法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofblastwave.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of blast wave
反熵%s: 冲击波魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofblastwave.ondeath
%s of anti-entropy: You killed yourself with your own Wand of Blast Wave...
反熵%s: 你用冲击波法杖炸碎了自己...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofblastwave.knockback_ondeath
%s of anti-entropy: The collision killed you...
反熵%s: 你死于撞击...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofblastwave.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand is made of a sort of marbled stone, with gold trim and a round black gem at the tip. It feels very weighty in your hand.
反熵%s: 这根法杖由一种大理石石材制成，嵌有金饰并在顶部镶着一个浑圆的黑宝石。它在你手中的感觉非常沉重。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofblastwave.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand shoots a bolt which violently detonates at a target location. The force of this blast typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and is strong enough to send most enemies flying.
反熵%s: 这根法杖能射出一股能量，在目标位置引发强烈的爆炸。爆炸的力量会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，并强到足以击飞大多数敌人。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofblastwave.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand shoots a bolt which violently detonates at a target location. The force of this blast deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and is strong enough to send most enemies flying.
反熵%s: 这根法杖能射出一股能量，在目标位置引发强烈的爆炸。爆炸的力量会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并强到足以击飞大多数敌人。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofblastwave.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Knockback
反熵%s: 击退

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofblastwave.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When _the Battlemage_ strikes an enemy with a staff of blast wave, the enemy has a chance to be knocked back, as if the staff had an elastic enchantment.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以冲击波魔杖近战攻击目标时，能像弹性附魔一样有概率将其击退。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofblastwave.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of blast wave deals 67% damage and knocks all enemies outside of the blast area.
反熵%s: 冲击波魔杖的元素风暴造成67%伤害，并将所有目标弹出影响区域。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorrosion.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of corrosion
反熵%s: 酸蚀法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorrosion.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of corrosion
反熵%s: 酸蚀魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorrosion.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand has an ashen body which opens to a brilliant orange gem.
反熵%s: 这根法杖的灰色主干顶端镶嵌着一颗明亮的橙色宝石。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorrosion.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand shoots a bolt which explodes into a cloud of highly corrosive gas at a targeted location. Anything caught inside this cloud will take increasing damage over time, starting at _%d damage._
反熵%s: 这根法杖能射出一颗会在目标位置爆炸成一团腐蚀酸雾的法球。进入酸雾的任何单位都会持续受到起始为_%d点_的持续递增伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorrosion.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Corrosion Damage
反熵%s: 酸蚀伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorrosion.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Gas Volume
反熵%s: 气体总量

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorrosion.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When _the Battlemage_ strikes an enemy with a staff of corrosion, the enemy has a chance to become oozed.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以酸蚀魔杖近战攻击目标时，有概率使其沾染腐蚀淤泥。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorrosion.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of corrosion inflicts enemies with 4 turns of corrosion, starting at 6 damage.
反熵%s: 酸蚀魔杖的元素风暴对所有目标造成起始伤害为6点的4回合酸蚀。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorruption.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of corruption
反熵%s: 腐化法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorruption.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of corruption
反熵%s: 腐化魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorruption.already_corrupted
%s of anti-entropy: That character cannot be influenced further.
