反熵%s: 这个角色已经被你腐化。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorruption.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand radiates chaotic dark energy, if that weren't already obvious from the small decorative skull shaped onto its tip.
反熵%s: 这根法杖能发射混乱的黑暗能量，法杖尖端的那个小头骨装饰很是应景。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorruption.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand will release a blast of corrupting energy which will debuff enemies and eventually bend them to your will. Enemies are able to resist the corruption, but weakened enemies are much easier to corrupt than healthy ones.
反熵%s: 这根法杖会释放腐坏的能量，能削弱敌人并最终将他们扭曲为你的奴仆。敌人能抵抗腐化，但虚弱的敌人明显地更容易被腐化。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorruption.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Corrupting Power
反熵%s: 腐化强度

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorruption.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Debuff Duration
反熵%s: 减益持续时间

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorruption.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When _the Battlemage_ strikes an enemy with a staff of corruption, the enemy has a chance to become amoked.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以腐化魔杖近战攻击目标时，有概率使其陷入狂乱。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofcorruption.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of corruption inflicts enemies with 5 turns of amok.
反熵%s: 腐化魔杖的元素风暴对所有目标造成5回合狂乱。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofdisintegration.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of disintegration
反熵%s: 解离法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofdisintegration.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of disintegration
反熵%s: 解离魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofdisintegration.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand is made from a solid smooth chunk of obsidian, with a deep purple light running up its side, ending at the tip. It glows with destructive energy, waiting to shoot forward.
反熵%s: 这根法杖由一整块光滑的黑曜石制成，深紫色的光自其边缘流向法杖顶端。它闪烁着破坏性能量，准备着向前迸射。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofdisintegration.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand shoots a beam that pierces any obstacle, and will go farther the more it is upgraded. The beam deals _%1$d-%2$d damage,_ and will also deal bonus damage for each enemy and wall it penetrates.
反熵%s: 这根法杖射出的光束能穿透任何障碍物，并将随着法杖等级的提升而射得更远。光束会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，并且会根据穿透的地形和敌人数量造成额外伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofdisintegration.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Max Range
反熵%s: 射程上限

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofdisintegration.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When wielded by _the Battlemage_, a staff of disintegration has increased attack range, as if it had a projecting enchantment.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以解离魔杖作为近战武器时，魔杖会像索敌附魔一样获得额外的攻击距离。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofdisintegration.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of disintegration deals 100% damage and pierces through walls.
反熵%s: 解离魔杖的元素风暴无视墙壁并对所有目标造成100%的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffireblast.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of fireblast
反熵%s: 焰浪法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffireblast.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of fireblast
反熵%s: 焰浪魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffireblast.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand is made from red-lacquered wood with golden leaf used liberally to make it look quite regal. It crackles and hisses at the tip, eager to unleash its powerful magic.
反熵%s: 这根法杖由红漆木制成，饰以金叶，这使它看起来相当庄严。它的顶端噼啪作响嘶嘶而鸣，渴望着释放其强大的魔法。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffireblast.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand blasts out a cone of fire when used. Its next attack will consume _%1$d charges_ and deal _%2$d-%3$d damage._ The more charges the wand uses, the larger and stronger the effect.
反熵%s: 这根法杖在使用时会产生一股强大的焰浪，延伸出一个锥形区域。下一次使用它将消耗_%1$d点充能_并造成_%2$d~%3$d点伤害_。法杖一次消耗的充能数越多，其范围与威力就越大、越强。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffireblast.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: 1 Charge Damage
反熵%s: 1点充能伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffireblast.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: 2 Charge Damage
反熵%s: 2点充能伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffireblast.upgrade_stat_name_3
%s of anti-entropy: 3 Charge Damage
反熵%s: 3点充能伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffireblast.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When _the Battlemage_ strikes an enemy with a staff of fireblast, the enemy has a chance to burst into flames, as if the staff had a blazing enchantment.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以焰浪魔杖近战攻击目标时，能像拥有烈焰附魔一样有概率将其点燃。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffireblast.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of fireblast deals 100% damage, bursts open doors, and sets enemies and terrain on fire.
反熵%s: 焰浪魔杖的元素风暴造成100%伤害，冲开范围内的门，并使目标与地形起火。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffrost.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of frost
反熵%s: 冰霜法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffrost.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of frost
反熵%s: 冰霜魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffrost.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand seems to be made out of some kind of magical ice. It grows brighter towards its rounded tip. It feels very cold when held, but somehow your hand stays warm.
反熵%s: 这根法杖似乎由某种魔法冰块制成。它的圆顶闪着亮光。握起来很冰，但不知为何你的手仍保持着温暖。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffrost.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand shoots blasts of icy energy toward your foes, dealing _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and chilling. The effect seems stronger in water. Enemies that are already chilled or frozen take less damage from this wand.
反熵%s: 这根法杖能向你的敌人射击冰霜能量，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并冻伤目标，在水中的作用似乎更强。冻伤或冻结的敌人将受到更少该法杖的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffrost.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Chill Duration
反熵%s: 冻伤持续时间

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffrost.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When _the Battlemage_ strikes a chilled enemy with a staff of frost, they have a chance to instantly freeze. This chance becomes greater the more chilled they are.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以冰霜魔杖近战攻击目标时，有概率将其直接冻结。目标冻伤越严重，被冻结的概率就越高。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoffrost.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of frost deals 100% damage, freezes enemies, and puts out fires.
反熵%s: 冰霜魔杖的元素风暴造成100%伤害，冻结敌人并熄灭火焰。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflightning.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of lightning
反熵%s: 雷霆法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflightning.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of lightning
反熵%s: 雷霆魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflightning.ondeath
%s of anti-entropy: You killed yourself with your own Wand of Lightning...
反熵%s: 你用雷霆法杖害死了自己...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflightning.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand is made out of solid metal, making it surprisingly heavy. Two prongs curve together at the tip, and electricity arcs between them.
反熵%s: 这根法杖由实心金属制成，这使它惊人地沉重。电弧在顶端两个内弯的叉齿间跳跃。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflightning.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand sends powerful lightning arcing through whatever it is shot at, dealing _%1$d-%2$d damage._ This electricity will arc to nearby characters, and spreads more easily in water. The arcs from this wand can damage you, but won't hurt your allies.
反熵%s: 这根法杖能向任何瞄准的地方射出强大的电弧，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_。这道闪电能在附近多个目标间跳跃，在水里会更强力。要是太接近，同样可能电到你自己，却不会波及到你的同伴。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflightning.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When _the Battlemage_ strikes an enemy with a staff of lightning, the staff has a chance to arc lightning to other nearby enemies, as if it had a shocking enchantment.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以雷霆魔杖近战攻击目标时，能像拥有电击附魔一样有概率释放电弧攻击附近的目标。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflightning.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of lightning deals 100% damage, stuns enemies for 5 turns, and electrifies water.
反熵%s: 雷霆魔杖的元素风暴造成100%伤害，击晕目标5回合并使水带电。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of living earth
反熵%s: 灵壤法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of living earth
反熵%s: 灵壤魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand is made from a curious rock, with bands of glowing yellow energy. The rocks seem to shift slightly as you grip the wand, as if they can feel your hand.
反熵%s: 这根法杖由一种奇妙的石头组成，你能从几道微微发光的黄色条纹中感受到能量波动。握住法杖时石头好像会稍稍转动，仿佛在迎合你的手。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand sends bolts of magical rock at enemies, dealing _%1$d-%2$d damage._ The rocks will then re-form around the user, granting them armor in proportion to the damage dealt. If enough armor is built, it will form into a rock guardian when the wand is next zapped.
反熵%s: 这根法杖能向敌人发射魔法泥石，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_。泥石随后会回归使用者身边，根据造成的伤害重组成灵壤护甲。灵壤护甲积累到一定程度后，下次使用法杖时会成型为一尊灵壤守卫。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Guardian Max HP
反熵%s: 守卫最大生命值

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth.upgrade_stat_name_3
%s of anti-entropy: Guardian Blocking
反熵%s: 守卫防御

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When _the Battlemage_ strikes an enemy with a staff of living earth, some of the damage dealt is returned as rock armor.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以灵壤魔杖近战攻击目标时，能将部分近战伤害转化为灵壤护甲。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of living earth deals 50% damage, and heals an active earthen guardian for each enemy hit.
反熵%s: 灵壤魔杖的元素风暴造成50%伤害，每击中一个目标，治疗已激活的灵壤守卫一次。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth$rockarmor.name
%s of anti-entropy: rock armor
反熵%s: 灵壤护甲

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth$rockarmor.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
Magical rocks are surrounding your body, when you are attacked they will attempt to block for you, and will reduce the damage you take by 50%%. Each damage blocked scrapes away some of the rock however.

Remaining Armor: %1$d.

If enough rock is built around you, the next zap from your wand of living earth will cause the rocks to form up into a guardian which will fight with you.

Armor needed for Guardian: %2$d.
反熵%s:
魔法泥石环绕在你身边，当你被攻击时泥石会尽其所能进行格挡，从而为你抵消50%%所受伤害。不过，抵消伤害会消除一定量的泥石。

剩余护甲量：%1$d

当积攒的泥石达到一定程度时，下一次发动灵壤法杖会使泥石成型为一尊灵壤守卫为你而战。

守卫成型所需护甲量：%2$d

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth$rockarmor.desc_many
%s of anti-entropy: This earthen guardian is also benefitting from Power of Many. Turns Remaining: %d.
反熵%s: 该灵壤守卫已被诸圣神力强化。剩余回合数：%d

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth$earthguardian.name
%s of anti-entropy: earthen guardian
反熵%s: 灵壤守卫

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth$earthguardian.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The rocks from your wand of living earth have formed into a protective earthen guardian! This rocky protector will attack nearby enemies, which will force them to attack the guardian instead of you. When all nearby threats are gone, the guardian will re-form around you, and will return when you next use your wand.
反熵%s: 灵壤法杖发射的魔法泥石组成了一尊灵壤守卫！这个有棱有角的大块头会攻击附近的敌人，迫使他们去攻击守卫。当附近没有危险时，守卫会重组为你身边的灵壤护甲，等待你下次使用法杖召唤它。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoflivingearth$earthguardian.wand_info
%s of anti-entropy: The guardian's defensive power is tied to the level of your wand. It currently blocks _%1$d-%2$d damage._
反熵%s: 守卫的防御力与你的法杖等级相关。它当前能抵挡_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofmagicmissile.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of magic missile
反熵%s: 魔弹法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofmagicmissile.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of magic missile
反熵%s: 魔弹魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofmagicmissile.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This fairly plain wand launches missiles of pure magical energy. While the wand itself lacks any special effects, it has more available charges and can briefly empower other wands when upgraded.
反熵%s: 这根十分普通的法杖能发射由纯魔法能量构成的飞弹。尽管法杖本身没有什么花哨的特效，它有更多的充能数，而且在被升级后能暂时强化其他法杖。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofmagicmissile.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Each bolt from this wand deals _%1$d-%2$d damage,_ and will briefly empower other wands if it is upgraded.
反熵%s: 从法杖中发出的魔法飞弹会对单个目标造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，如果被升级则会暂时强化其他法杖。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofmagicmissile.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When _the Battlemage_ strikes an enemy with a staff of magic missile, all of his wands will gain charge in addition to his staff.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以魔弹魔杖近战攻击目标时，魔杖外的所有的法杖都会恢复一定的充能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofmagicmissile.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of magic missile deals 50% damage, and grants the mage 15 turns of recharging.
反熵%s: 魔弹魔杖的元素风暴造成50%伤害，并使法师获得15回合的法杖充能效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofmagicmissile$magiccharge.name
%s of anti-entropy: magic charge
反熵%s: 魔力强化

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofmagicmissile$magiccharge.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
Your wand of magic missile has fed power back into your wands, boosting the effective level of the next zap they make.

Your wands are boosted to: +%d.

Turns of magic charge remaining: %s.
反熵%s:
你的魔弹法杖向其他法杖回馈了一股能量，提升着下一次施法的有效等级。

其他法杖被强化至：+%d

剩余的魔力强化时长：%s回合

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofprismaticlight.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of prismatic light
反熵%s: 棱光法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofprismaticlight.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of prismatic light
反熵%s: 棱光魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofprismaticlight.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand is made of a solid piece of translucent crystal, like a long chunk of smooth glass. Small bits of colorful light dance around the tip of the wand, eager to burst forth.
反熵%s: 这根法杖由一块实心半透明水晶构成，就像一块厚长光滑的玻璃。一粒粒彩色的光点在法杖顶端跳跃，随时准备迸射而出。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofprismaticlight.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand shoots rays of light which cut through the darkness of the dungeon, revealing hidden areas and traps. The beam can blind enemies, and deals _%1$d-%2$d damage._ Demonic and undead foes will burn in the bright light of the wand, taking bonus damage.
反熵%s: 这根法杖射出的光线能刺破地牢的黑暗，揭露隐藏的区域和陷阱。光线能致盲敌人并造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_。恶魔与亡灵生物会在法杖的强光下被灼烧而受到额外伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofprismaticlight.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Blind Chance
反熵%s: 致盲概率

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofprismaticlight.upgrade_stat_name_3
%s of anti-entropy: Light Duration
反熵%s: 照明持续时间

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofprismaticlight.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When _the Battlemage_ strikes an enemy with a staff of prismatic light, they will be crippled for a duration that scales with staff level.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以棱光魔杖近战攻击目标时，能使目标陷入随魔杖等级提升而延长的残废效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofprismaticlight.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of prismatic light deals 67% damage, reveals all terrain in the blast, and blinds enemies for 5 turns.
反熵%s: 棱光魔杖的元素风暴造成67%伤害，揭示区域内所有地形，致盲所有目标5回合。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of regrowth
反熵%s: 再生法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of regrowth
反熵%s: 再生魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This wand is made from a thin shaft of expertly carved wood. Somehow it is still alive and vibrant, bright green like a young tree's core. "When life ceases new life always begins to grow... The eternal cycle always remains!"
反熵%s: 这根法杖由一根细长木枝巧琢而成。不知为何，它还活着而且生机盎然，像一株树苗的嫩芽般艳绿。“春兰兮秋菊，长无绝兮终古！”

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When used, this wand will blast magical regrowth energy outward in a cone, causing grass, roots, and rare plants to spring to life. Its next zap will consume _%1$d charges_. The more charges the wand uses, the larger and stronger the effect.
反熵%s: 在施放时，这根法杖将向一个扇形区域倾洒出再生的能量。这种魔法会让草、根系甚至稀有的植物重获生命，破土而出。下一次使用它将消耗_%1$d点充能_。法杖消耗的充能越多，再生魔法的范围与效力就越大、越强。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth.degradation
%s of anti-entropy: After another _%d charges_ this wand will start failing to produce plants and fresh grass. This limit is increased by leveling up or upgrading the wand.
反熵%s: 法杖的再生魔力将在释放_%d点充能_后开始消退，那时它将难以再次使植物或高草复生。提升英雄等级或是升级法杖能延后这种限制。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Grass Per Charge
反熵%s: 每充能再生量

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Total Grass Limit
反熵%s: 再生充能限制

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When _the Battlemage_ strikes an enemy with a staff of regrowth, and either are standing on grass, he will gain herbal healing in proportion with the damage dealt.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以再生魔杖近战攻击目标时，如果一方站在草地上，则战斗法师能获取伤害的一定比例的草药疗养。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of regrowth roots enemies and grows grass randomly over the blasts area.
反熵%s: 再生魔杖的元素风暴使所有目标被缠绕，并令范围内随机长出高草。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth$dewcatcher.name
%s of anti-entropy: Dewcatcher
反熵%s: 结露草

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth$dewcatcher.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Dewcatchers are wondrous plants that fill themselves with magical dew. They attempt to camouflage as grass to avoid attention, but their bulges of collected dew give them away.
反熵%s: 结露草是一种蓄满了魔法露水的奇妙植物。它们想将自己伪装成杂草来避开注意，但其鼓胀的集露苞却出卖了它们。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth$seedpod.name
%s of anti-entropy: Seed Pod
反熵%s: 种子荚

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth$seedpod.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Seed Pods are magical plants that produce seeds from other plant types, rather than any seeds of their own. They somehow manage to spread despite having no seed of their own.
反熵%s: 种子荚是一种会结出其他各类植物种子的魔法植物。它们没有自己的种子，却还是以某种方式传播扩散开了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth$lotus.name
%s of anti-entropy: Golden Lotus
反熵%s: 黄金莲

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth$lotus.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The golden lotus is a mystical plant that can only be conjured by a powerful wand of regrowth. Its aura enhances all plants and plant effects, but it burns through its energy and dies after a short time.
反熵%s: 黄金莲是一种只能被强大的再生法杖创造的神秘植物。它的光环会增强所有植物相关效果，但它不一会就会耗尽能量枯萎。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofregrowth$lotus.wand_info
%s of anti-entropy: This lotus was produced by a _+%1$d_ wand of regrowth. All plants in its effect will _instantly trigger_ if they are planted on a character. Plants will also have a _%2$d%% chance_ to drop their seed, and tipped darts will use _%3$d%% less durability_.
反熵%s: 这株黄金莲由一根_+%1$d_的再生法杖产出。在它的作用范围内，播种到对象身上的任何种子都会_瞬间发动_。植物还会有_%2$d%%的概率掉落自身的种子_，涂药飞镖的使用也会_少消耗%3$d%%耐久度_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoftransfusion.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of transfusion
反熵%s: 注魂法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoftransfusion.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of transfusion
反熵%s: 注魂魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoftransfusion.ondeath
%s of anti-entropy: You killed yourself with your own Wand of Transfusion...
反熵%s: 你用注魂法杖耗尽了自己的生命...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoftransfusion.charged
%s of anti-entropy: Your staff is charged with the life energy of your enemy!
反熵%s: 敌人的生命能量流进了你的魔杖！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoftransfusion.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A fairly plainly shaped wand, it stands out due to its magenta hue and pitch black gem at the tip.
反熵%s: 这根法杖形状很普通，是那暗红的色泽和镶在顶端的漆黑宝石让它显眼起来。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoftransfusion.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When used on allies or charmed enemies, this wand will sap _%1$d of the user's health_ to heal or shield the ally for _%2$d health._ When used on enemies, the wand briefly charms them while applying _%3$d shielding_ to the user. Hostile undead will take _%4$d-%5$d damage_ instead of being charmed.
反熵%s: 这根法杖对盟友或被魅惑的敌人释放时会消耗你_%1$d点生命_并赋予目标_%2$d点生命或护盾_；对敌人释放时会短暂魅惑敌人并回馈给你_%3$d点护盾_。敌对亡灵生物会受到_%4$d~%5$d点伤害_而不是被魅惑。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoftransfusion.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Ally Healing
反熵%s: 盟友治疗

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoftransfusion.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Self-Shielding
反熵%s: 自身护盾

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoftransfusion.upgrade_stat_name_3
%s of anti-entropy: Undead Damage
反熵%s: 亡灵伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoftransfusion.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When _the Battlemage_ strikes a charmed enemy with a staff of transfusion, he will gain shielding and his next zap with the staff will not cost any health.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以注魂魔杖近战攻击被魅惑的目标时，能获取一定的护盾且下次释放不消耗生命。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandoftransfusion.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of transfusion charms enemies, heals allies, and deals 100% damage to undead enemies.
反熵%s: 注魂魔杖的元素风暴会在范围内魅惑所有敌人、治疗所有友军，对敌对亡灵生物造成100%伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding.name
%s of anti-entropy: wand of warding
反熵%s: 哨卫法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding.staff_name
%s of anti-entropy: staff of warding
反熵%s: 哨卫魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding.no_more_wards
%s of anti-entropy: Your wand can't sustain any more wards.
反熵%s: 你的法杖无法维持更多的哨卫。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding.bad_location
%s of anti-entropy: You can't place a ward there.
反熵%s: 你不能在那里设置一个哨卫。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This short metal wand has a bright purple gem floating above its tip.
反熵%s: 这根短小的金属法杖尖端上有一颗亮紫色宝石悬空浮动。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Rather than directly damaging an enemy, this wand will summon stationary wards and sentries. Wards can be summoned anywhere, even through walls if you have vision. This wand can sustain _%d energy_ worth of wards at a time.
反熵%s: 这根法杖并不能直接攻击敌人，但可以召唤出哨卫元素与哨卫结晶。你可以在视野中的任何地方召唤哨卫，即使是隔着一堵墙。这根法杖最多能提供_%d点能量_以维持哨卫。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding.upgrade_stat_name_1
%s of anti-entropy: Ward Damage
反熵%s: 哨卫伤害

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding.upgrade_stat_name_2
%s of anti-entropy: Ward Energy
反熵%s: 哨卫能量

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding.bmage_desc
%s of anti-entropy: When _the Battlemage_ strikes an enemy with a staff of warding, all active sentries have a chance to be healed.
反熵%s: 当_战斗法师_以哨卫魔杖近战攻击目标时，有概率为所有哨卫结晶恢复一定生命值。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding.eleblast_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental blast with a staff of warding heals all sentries in the blast area.
反熵%s: 哨卫魔杖的元素风暴会治疗范围内的所有哨卫结晶。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.desc_generic_ward
%s of anti-entropy:
This ward will automatically zap any enemy which comes into its range of vision.

Zapping this ward with your wand of warding will upgrade it.

Wards have a limited number of zaps before dissipating.
反熵%s:
这个哨卫元素会自动攻击进入视野的目标。

使用哨卫法杖向该哨卫施法能使其升级。

哨卫能发动攻击的次数有限，次数耗尽后它们便会消散。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.desc_generic_sentry
%s of anti-entropy:
This sentry has the same firepower as a ward, but has health instead of a set number of charges. It resembles the gem at the tip of your wand of warding.

Zapping this sentry with your wand of warding will upgrade and heal it.

This sentry will spend some health each time it zaps an enemy, but can be healed by using your wand of warding on it.
反熵%s:
这个哨卫结晶攻击力与哨卫元素相同，但以生命值取代了有限的发动次数。它的样子有点像哨卫法杖顶端的宝石。

使用哨卫法杖向该哨卫施法能使其升级并治疗它。

这个哨卫每次发动攻击时会消耗一定的生命值，但你可以用哨卫法杖治疗它。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.name_1
%s of anti-entropy: lesser ward
反熵%s: 小哨卫元素

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.desc_1
%s of anti-entropy:
This basic ward will automatically zap any enemy which comes into its range of vision, dealing _%1$d-%2$d damage._

Zapping this ward with your wand of warding will upgrade it.

This ward will only zap a single time before dissipating.

Your wand of warding is using _%3$d energy_ to sustain this ward.
反熵%s:
这个最基本的哨卫元素会自动攻击进入视野的目标，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害。_

使用哨卫法杖向该哨卫施法能使其升级。

这个哨卫在仅发动1次攻击之后就会消散。

你的哨卫法杖在使用_%3$d点能量_维持这个哨卫。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.name_2
%s of anti-entropy: ward
反熵%s: 哨卫元素

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.desc_2
%s of anti-entropy:
This upgraded ward has a more intricate pattern, and can attack multiple times. Each zap from this ward will deal _%1$d-%2$d damage._

Zapping this ward with your wand of warding will upgrade it.

This ward will zap three times before dissipating.

Your wand of warding is using _%3$d energy_ to sustain this ward.
反熵%s:
这个升级过的哨卫元素结构更精致，而且在攻击数次后才会消散。它每次发动攻击能造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_。

使用哨卫法杖向该哨卫施法能使其升级。

这个哨卫在发动3次攻击之后才会消散。

你的哨卫法杖在使用_%3$d点能量_维持这个哨卫。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.name_3
%s of anti-entropy: greater ward
反熵%s: 大哨卫元素

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.desc_3
%s of anti-entropy:
This fully upgraded ward is able to attack more times than its predecessors. Each zap from this ward will deal _%1$d-%2$d damage._

Zapping this ward with your wand of warding will upgrade it.

This ward will zap five times before dissipating.

Your wand of warding is using _%3$d energy_ to sustain this ward.
反熵%s:
这个满级的哨卫元素能发动更多次攻击，而且攻击速度更快。它每次发动攻击能造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_。

使用哨卫法杖向该哨卫施法能使其进化。

这个哨卫在发动5次攻击之后才会消散。

你的哨卫法杖在使用_%3$d点能量_维持这个哨卫。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.name_4
%s of anti-entropy: lesser sentry
反熵%s: 小哨卫结晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.desc_4
%s of anti-entropy:
This smaller sentry has the same firepower as a greater ward, but has health instead of a set number of charges. It resembles the gem at the tip of your wand of warding. Each zap from this sentry will deal _%1$d-%2$d damage._

Zapping this sentry with your wand of warding will upgrade and heal it.

This sentry will spend some health each time it zaps an enemy, but can be healed by using your wand of warding on it.

Your wand of warding is using _%3$d energy_ to sustain this sentry.
反熵%s:
这个小小的哨卫结晶攻击力与大哨卫元素相同，但以生命值取代了有限的发动次数。它的样子有点像哨卫法杖顶端的宝石。它每次发动攻击能造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_。

使用哨卫法杖向该哨卫施法能使其升级并治疗它。

这个哨卫每次发动攻击时会消耗一定的生命值，但你可以用哨卫法杖治疗它。

你的哨卫法杖在使用_%3$d点能量_维持这个哨卫。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.name_5
%s of anti-entropy: sentry
反熵%s: 哨卫结晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.desc_5
%s of anti-entropy:
This upgraded sentry is larger and more durable than a lesser sentry. Each zap from this sentry will deal _%1$d-%2$d damage._

Zapping this sentry with your wand of warding will upgrade and heal it.

This sentry will spend some health each time it zaps an enemy, but can be healed by using your wand of warding on it.

Your wand of warding is using _%3$d energy_ to sustain this sentry.
反熵%s:
这个升级过的哨卫结晶比小哨卫结晶体积更大，形体也更结实。它每次发动攻击能造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_。

使用哨卫法杖向该哨卫施法能使其升级并治疗它。

这个哨卫每次发动攻击时会消耗一定的生命值，但你可以用哨卫法杖治疗它。

你的哨卫法杖在使用_%3$d点能量_维持这个哨卫。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.name_6
%s of anti-entropy: greater sentry
反熵%s: 大哨卫结晶

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.desc_6
%s of anti-entropy:
This fully upgraded sentry is significantly more durable than its predecessors. Each zap from this sentry will deal _%1$d-%2$d damage._

Zapping this sentry with your wand of warding will heal it.

This sentry will spend some health each time it zaps an enemy, but can be healed by using your wand of warding on it.

Your wand of warding is using _%3$d energy_ to sustain this sentry.
反熵%s:
这个满级的哨卫结晶比之前的坚固了不少。它每次发动攻击能造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_。

使用哨卫法杖向该哨卫施法能治疗它。

这个哨卫每次发动攻击时会消耗一定的生命值，但你可以用哨卫法杖治疗它。

你的哨卫法杖在使用_%3$d点能量_维持这个哨卫。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.dismiss_title
%s of anti-entropy: Dismiss this ward?
反熵%s: 要驱散这个哨卫吗？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.dismiss_body
%s of anti-entropy: You can dispel this ward if you no longer want your wand to maintain it. Doing so immediately destroys the ward.\n\nDismiss this ward?
反熵%s: 不想让法杖继续维持这个哨卫的话，你可以选择驱散它立即将其破坏移除。\n\n要驱散这个哨卫吗？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.dismiss_confirm
%s of anti-entropy: yes
反熵%s: 是

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.wands.wandofwarding$ward.dismiss_cancel
%s of anti-entropy: no
反熵%s: 否

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.name
%s of anti-entropy: annoying %s
反熵%s: 喧闹%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_1
%s of anti-entropy: OOH, ARE WE FIGHTING SOMETHING!?
反熵%s: 嘿，头儿！我们要去打谁！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_2
%s of anti-entropy: YEAH, GET THEM!
反熵%s: 太爽了，击溃他们！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_3
%s of anti-entropy: HEY, LISTEN!
反熵%s: 嘿！听着！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_4
%s of anti-entropy: ARE WE AT THE BOSS YET!?
反熵%s: 现在是打BOSS的时间吗！？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_5
%s of anti-entropy: OUCH, DON'T SWING ME SO HARD!
反熵%s: 我去，别这么用力！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_6
%s of anti-entropy: DIE, INSECT!
反熵%s: 死吧，虫子！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_7
%s of anti-entropy: WHEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!
反熵%s: 无理理理理理理理理理理理理理理理！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_8
%s of anti-entropy: CAN WE TAKE A BREAK!?
反熵%s: 我们能休息一下吗！？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_9
%s of anti-entropy: POW, HAHA!
反熵%s: 嘭，哈哈！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_10
%s of anti-entropy: WELL STRUCK!
反熵%s: 漂亮的一击！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_11
%s of anti-entropy: I didn't want to be a weapon, I wanted to be a lumberjack's axe.
反熵%s: 我曾经不想成为武器，而是想成为伐木工人的斧头。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_12
%s of anti-entropy: Remember, overconfidence is a slow and insidious killer.
反熵%s: 要时刻警醒：骄傲自满是位缓慢却阴险的杀手。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.msg_13
%s of anti-entropy: ALL YOUR BASE ARE BELONG TO US!
反熵%s: 敌羞，吾去脱他衣！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Annoying weapons are capable of speech, but they're a bit too energetic. They will often draw attention to you without meaning to.
反熵%s: 喧闹诅咒的武器真的是想帮你，只不过它的吵闹无比的“帮助”总是会吸引大量敌人。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.annoying.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with an annoying curse has a 20% chance to amok each enemy in range for 6 turns.
反熵%s: 武器拥有喧闹诅咒时，元素打击对范围内的每个敌人都有20%概率造成持续6回合的狂乱。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.dazzling.name
%s of anti-entropy: dazzling %s
反熵%s: 炫目%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.dazzling.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Dazzling weapons will sometimes flash with dazzling light, blinding everything that can see them.
反熵%s: 炫目武器会不时释放刺目的强光，致盲所有视野范围内的单位。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.dazzling.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a dazzling curse has a 50% chance to blind each enemy in range for 6 turns.
反熵%s: 武器拥有炫目诅咒时，元素打击对范围内的每个敌人都有50%概率造成持续6回合的失明。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.displacing.name
%s of anti-entropy: displacing %s
反熵%s: 转移%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.displacing.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Displacing weapons are infused with chaotic teleportation magic, possessing the ability to warp enemies around the floor randomly.
反熵%s: 转移诅咒的武器被灌注了混乱的传送魔法，会将敌人传送到当前层的随机位置。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.displacing.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a displacing curse has a 50% chance to teleport each enemy in range.
反熵%s: 武器拥有转移诅咒时，元素打击对范围内的每个敌人都有50%概率进行传送。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.explosive.name
%s of anti-entropy: explosive %s
反熵%s: 易爆%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.explosive.warm
%s of anti-entropy: Warm...
反熵%s: 温热起来了...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.explosive.hot
%s of anti-entropy: Hot!
反熵%s: 好烫！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.explosive.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Explosive weapons steadily build up power and explode, damaging the wearer and enemy.
反熵%s: 易爆诅咒的武器会缓缓积累能量并最终爆炸，同时对佩戴者与敌人造成伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.explosive.desc_cool
%s of anti-entropy: Your weapon is currently cool to the touch.
反熵%s: 你的武器目前触感冰凉，尚属正常。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.explosive.desc_warm
%s of anti-entropy: Your weapon is building energy and getting warm...
反熵%s: 你的武器正在积累能量，变得温热起来了...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.explosive.desc_hot
%s of anti-entropy: Your weapon is hot! It's about to explode!
反熵%s: 你的武器已灼热烫手！要爆炸了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.explosive.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with an explosive curse has a 50% chance to cause an explosion to appear on a random enemy in range.
反熵%s: 武器拥有易爆诅咒时，元素打击有着50%的概率在范围内随机一个敌人身上产生爆炸。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.friendly.name
%s of anti-entropy: friendly %s
反熵%s: 友善%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.friendly.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Friendly weapons are best suited for pacifists, occasionally triggering magic that makes it impossible to fight.
反熵%s: 友善诅咒的武器会偶尔触发让战斗无法进行的魔法，非常适合和平主义者。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.friendly.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a friendly curse has a 50% chance to charm each enemy in range for 6 turns.
反熵%s: 武器拥有友善诅咒时，元素打击对范围内的每个敌人都有50%概率造成持续6回合的魅惑。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.polarized.name
%s of anti-entropy: polarized %s
反熵%s: 极化%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.polarized.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A polarized weapon is affected by magic that causes its attack to either deal 50% more damage, or no damage at all.
反熵%s: 极化武器受到诅咒魔力的影响，在攻击时只会出现1.5倍伤害或完全没有伤害的情况。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.polarized.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a polarized curse has a 50% chance to deal 24-36 damage to each enemy in range.
反熵%s: 武器拥有极化诅咒时，元素打击对范围内的每个敌人都有50%概率造成24~36点伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.sacrificial.name
%s of anti-entropy: sacrificial %s
反熵%s: 血祭%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.sacrificial.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Sacrificial weapons will demand blood from the wearer in return for attacking foes. The more healthy the wearer is, the more blood the curse will take.
反熵%s: 血祭诅咒会向使用者索求血液作为攻击的回报，你的状态越健康，诅咒索取的也就越多。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.sacrificial.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a sacrificial curse causes the hero and each enemy in range to bleed for 12 HP.
反熵%s: 武器拥有血祭诅咒时，元素打击对英雄自身与范围内的每一个敌人都造成初始值为12点的流血效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.wayward.name
%s of anti-entropy: wayward %s
反熵%s: 妄为%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.wayward.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Wayward weapons will sometimes become extremely inaccurate. This magic lasts for a little while when it activates, but can be dispelled by landing a blow with the wayward weapon.
反熵%s: 妄为诅咒的武器会时常变得极其不精准。触发时这种魔法会持续一小会，但会在成功使用妄为武器造成伤害后立刻消散。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.wayward.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a wayward curse has a 50% chance to hex each enemy in range for 6 turns.
反熵%s: 武器拥有妄为诅咒时，元素打击对范围内的每个敌人都有50%概率造成持续6回合的幻惑。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.wayward$waywardbuff.name
%s of anti-entropy: wayward
反熵%s: 妄为

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.curses.wayward$waywardbuff.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Your wayward weapon's magic has activated, making it extremely inaccurate for a short time. Note that this does not affect attacks which are guaranteed to hit, such as surprise attacks. Successfully attacking with the wayward weapon will clear this effect immediately.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
反熵%s: 你的妄为武器上的魔法已被触发，现在它已变得极度不精准。这个魔法无法影响如伏击等必定命中的攻击行为，且成功使用妄为武器造成伤害会立刻驱散此效果。\n\n效果剩余回合：%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.blazing.name
%s of anti-entropy: blazing %s
反熵%s: 烈焰%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.blazing.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This enchantment causes flames to spit forth from a weapon, igniting enemies and dealing bonus damage to enemies that are already aflame.
反熵%s: 这个附魔会使火焰从武器中喷薄而出，能够点燃敌人并对正在燃烧的敌人造成额外伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.blazing.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a blazing enchantment spreads fire to every tile in range, which lasts 8 turns.
反熵%s: 武器拥有烈焰附魔时，元素打击会将火焰扩散到范围内全部地块，持续8回合。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.blocking.name
%s of anti-entropy: blocking %s
反熵%s: 招架%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.blocking.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Blocking weapons have a chance to briefly shield you after attacking with them.
反熵%s: 招架附魔的武器在攻击后有几率短暂为你提供保护。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.blocking.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a blocking enchantment grants the Duelist an extra 6 shielding for each enemy in range.
反熵%s: 武器拥有招架附魔时，元素打击范围内每有一个敌人，决斗家就会获得6点护盾。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.blocking$blockbuff.name
%s of anti-entropy: blocking
反熵%s: 招架

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.blocking$blockbuff.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
Your weapon's blocking enchantment has granted you a brief boost to your defensive power!

Shielding remaining: %d

Turns remaining: %s.
反熵%s:
你的武器的招架附魔短时间内增强了你的防御能力！

护盾剩余：%d

剩余时间：%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.blooming.name
%s of anti-entropy: blooming %s
反熵%s: 繁茂%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.blooming.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Blooming weapons contain magic which will cause vegetation to sprout on or around those struck by them.
反熵%s: 繁茂武器具有催生植物的魔力，在攻击目标时能使目标或周围的植被发芽生长。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.blooming.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a blooming enchantment spreads grass to up to 8 tiles in range, and roots all enemies in range for 6 turns.
反熵%s: 武器拥有繁茂附魔时，元素打击会在范围内最多8个地块上生成高草，并使范围内所有敌人缠绕6回合。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.chilling.name
%s of anti-entropy: chilling %s
反熵%s: 寒霜%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.chilling.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Enemies struck with this enchantment are chilled, slowing their movement and attacks.
反熵%s: 受该附魔成功影响的敌人会被冻伤，导致移动和攻击速度降低。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.chilling.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a chilling enchantment spreads chilling air to every tile in range, which lasts 8 turns.
反熵%s: 武器拥有寒霜附魔时，元素打击会将寒气扩散到范围的全部地块，持续8个回合。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.kinetic.name
%s of anti-entropy: kinetic %s
反熵%s: 恒动%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.kinetic.desc
%s of anti-entropy: When an enemy is killed with a kinetic weapon, any excess force is stored in the weapon and will be applied to the next successful attack.
反熵%s: 使用恒动附魔的武器击杀敌人时，武器会储存溢出的威力并在下一次成功攻击时释放。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.kinetic.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a kinetic enchantment applies 40% of stored damage to each enemy in range, except the primary target.
反熵%s: 武器拥有恒动附魔时，元素打击会对范围内除主要目标外的每个敌人都造成伤害，数值为储存伤害的40%。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.kinetic$conserveddamage.name
%s of anti-entropy: conserved damage
反熵%s: 伤害储存

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.kinetic$conserveddamage.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Your weapon has stored the excess force from a previous killing blow, and will apply it as bonus damage to your next attack. The energy will slowly fade over time, however.\n\nConserved Damage: %d.
反熵%s: 你的武器储存了上个杀敌一击的过剩能量，用来加强你的下次攻击以造成额外伤害。这份能量会慢慢随时间减弱。\n\n储存伤害：%d

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.corrupting.name
%s of anti-entropy: corrupting %s
反熵%s: 腐化%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.corrupting.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This powerful enchantment possesses the ability to turn enemies to your will. When an enemy is killed with this weapon, there is a chance they will become corrupted instead of dying.
反熵%s: 这种强力的附魔拥有将敌人扭曲为你的奴仆的能力。使用腐化附魔的武器击杀敌人时有概率将其腐化。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.corrupting.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a corrupting enchantment has a 5-25% chance (based on missing HP) to corrupt each enemy in range, except the primary target.
反熵%s: 武器拥有腐化附魔时，元素打击范围内除主要目标外的每个敌人都有5~25%的几率被腐化。(概率基于该敌人已损失的生命值)

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.elastic.name
%s of anti-entropy: elastic %s
反熵%s: 弹性%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.elastic.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Elastic weapons have a chance to send enemies flying back short distances.
反熵%s: 弹性武器在攻击时有几率把敌人击退较短的距离。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.elastic.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with an elastic enchantment knocks all enemies in range back 5 tiles.
反熵%s: 武器拥有弹性附魔时，元素打击会将范围内的所有敌人都击退5格。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.grim.name
%s of anti-entropy: grim %s
反熵%s: 死神%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.grim.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This powerful enchantment possesses the power to instantly execute an enemy. The effect is more likely to occur the weaker the enemy is.
反熵%s: 这个强力的附魔拥有瞬间斩杀敌人的力量。敌人越弱，附魔的触发几率越大。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.grim.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a grim enchantment has a 6-30% chance (based on missing HP) to kill each enemy in range, except the primary target.
反熵%s: 武器拥有死神附魔时，元素打击范围内除主要目标外的每个敌人都有6~30%的几率被秒杀。(概率基于该敌人已损失的生命值)

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.lucky.name
%s of anti-entropy: lucky %s
反熵%s: 幸运%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.lucky.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Enemies which are killed by a lucky weapon have a chance to drop extra loot.
反熵%s: 被幸运附魔武器击杀的敌人有几率掉落额外的宝物。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.lucky.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a lucky enchantment has a 12.5% chance to spawn loot under each enemy in range. This effect can only trigger once per enemy.
反熵%s: 武器拥有幸运附魔时，对于范围内的每个敌人，元素打击都有12.5%概率在其脚下生成物品。每个敌人只能触发这个效果一次。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.projecting.name
%s of anti-entropy: projecting %s
反熵%s: 索敌%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.projecting.desc
%s of anti-entropy: With this enchantment melee weapons will gain extra reach. Ranged weapons will be able to penetrate nearby walls.
反熵%s: 这个附魔会使肉搏武器获得额外的攻击距离。远程武器的攻击则能够穿透邻近墙壁。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.projecting.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a projecting enchantment deals 30% damage to each enemy in range, except the primary target.
反熵%s: 武器拥有索敌附魔时，元素打击对范围内除主要目标外的每个敌人都造成30%的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.shocking.name
%s of anti-entropy: shocking %s
反熵%s: 电击%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.shocking.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Electricity arcs from a shocking weapon, dealing extra damage to all nearby enemies.
反熵%s: 电弧在这个武器上不断地闪烁震荡，能够对邻近所有敌人造成额外伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.shocking.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a shocking enchantment spreads electricity to every tile in range, which lasts 8 turns.
反熵%s: 武器拥有电击附魔时，元素打击会将电火花扩散到范围的全部地块，持续8个回合。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.unstable.name
%s of anti-entropy: unstable %s
反熵%s: 紊乱%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.unstable.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This enchantment radiates chaotic energy, acting as a different enchantment with each hit.
反熵%s: 紊乱附魔的武器散发着混乱能量，每一击都视作具有另一种随机附魔。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.unstable.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with an unstable enchantment applies a random enchantment effect to each enemy in range, except the primary target.
反熵%s: 武器拥有紊乱附魔时，元素打击会对范围内除主要目标以外的其他敌人都造成一种随机附魔效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.vampiric.name
%s of anti-entropy: vampiric %s
反熵%s: 血饮%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.vampiric.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This powerful enchantment leeches life force from enemies with each blow, funneling it back into the wearer. The effect is stronger the lower the wearer's health.
反熵%s: 这个强力的附魔能在攻击敌人时吸取其生命能量并恢复使用者的生命。当使用者生命较少时效果更强。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.enchantments.vampiric.elestrike_desc
%s of anti-entropy: An elemental strike with a vampiric enchantment heals the Duelist for 2.5 HP for each enemy in range.
反熵%s: 武器拥有血饮附魔时，元素打击范围内每有一个敌人，决斗家就会恢复2.5点生命值。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.assassinsblade.name
%s of anti-entropy: assassin's blade
反熵%s: 暗杀之刃

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.assassinsblade.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon is stronger against unaware enemies.
反熵%s: 这件武器对未察觉你的敌人更有效。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.assassinsblade.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: sneak
反熵%s: 潜行

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.assassinsblade.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _sneak_ while wielding an assassin's blade. This ability lets the Duelist instantly blink up to 3 tiles away and typically grants her _%d turns of invisibility._
反熵%s: 决斗家握持暗杀之刃时可以_潜行_。这个武技能够使决斗家立即闪现最多3格远，并一般会给予_%d回合隐形_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.assassinsblade.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _sneak_ while wielding an assassin's blade. This ability lets the Duelist instantly blink up to 3 tiles away and grants her _%d turns of invisibility._
反熵%s: 决斗家握持暗杀之刃时可以_潜行_。这个武技能够使决斗家立即闪现最多3格远，并给予_%d回合隐形_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.assassinsblade.upgrade_ability_stat_name
%s of anti-entropy: Ability Duration
反熵%s: 武技持续时间

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.assassinsblade.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A small wavy blade made of obsidian, difficult to use despite being lightweight, but deadly if it finds the right mark.
反熵%s: 黑曜石制的波浪形短刃，虽轻便但不易用，如果能击中要害足以致命。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.battleaxe.name
%s of anti-entropy: battle axe
反熵%s: 战斧

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.battleaxe.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a rather accurate weapon.
反熵%s: 这是一件比较精准的武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.battleaxe.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: heavy blow
反熵%s: 重击

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.battleaxe.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _heavy blow_ with a battle axe. This concentrated attack typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ if it surprised the enemy, and dazes them for 5 turns which reduces accuracy and evasion by 50%%. Heavy blow always hits but deals regular damage if it does not surprise the enemy.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用战斧使出_重击_。这用尽全力的一击如果是在伏击敌人，则一般会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并施加5回合的恍惚，使其精准与闪避均降低50%%。重击必定命中，但若非伏击则只会造成普通的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.battleaxe.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _heavy blow_ with a battle axe. This concentrated attack deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ if it surprised the enemy, and dazes them for 5 turns which reduces accuracy and evasion by 50%%. Heavy blow always hits but deals regular damage if it does not surprise the enemy.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用战斧使出_重击_。这用尽全力的一击如果是在伏击敌人，则会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并施加5回合的恍惚，使其精准与闪避均降低50%%。重击必定命中，但若非伏击则只会造成普通的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.battleaxe.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The enormous steel head of this battle axe puts considerable heft behind each wide stroke.
反熵%s: 这把有着硕大钢制头部的战斧能将庞大的力量倾注在每次挥舞之中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.crossbow.name
%s of anti-entropy: crossbow
反熵%s: 十字弩

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.crossbow.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon enhances the damage of thrown darts when equipped, and will even grant its enchantment to them.
反熵%s: 这件武器装备时会大幅提升飞镖伤害，甚至能赋予飞镖自身附魔。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.crossbow.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: charged shot
反熵%s: 充能射击

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.crossbow.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _charge_ her crossbow, causing her next regular attack with it to always hit and apply one of three effects: melee attacks will knock enemies away, untipped darts will typically deal _+%1$d damage_, and tipped darts will apply their effect in a 7x7 area and typically last for _%2$d more uses_.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以为十字弩_蓄势_。这个武技能使下一次攻击必定命中，并将视情况触发以下三种效果之一：近战攻击将会击退敌人；未涂药飞镖一般会造成_%1$d点额外伤害_，而涂药飞镖将会在7x7的范围内触发效果，还一般会增加_%2$d次可用次数_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.crossbow.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _charge_ her crossbow, causing her next regular attack with it to always hit and apply one of three effects: melee attacks will knock enemies away, untipped darts will deal _+%1$d damage_, and tipped darts will apply their effect in a 7x7 area and last for _%2$d more uses_.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以为十字弩_蓄势_。这个武技能使下一次攻击必定命中，并将视情况触发以下三种效果之一：近战攻击将会击退敌人；未涂药飞镖将会造成_%1$d点额外伤害_，而涂药飞镖将会在7x7的范围内触发效果，还会增加_%2$d次可用次数_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.crossbow.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A fairly intricate weapon which shoots bolts at exceptional speeds. While it isn't designed for it, this crossbow's heft and sturdy construction make it a decent melee weapon as well.
反熵%s: 这是一件看起来相当精密复杂的装置，能够将飞镖一样的小型箭矢以极高的速度射出。这把十字弩弩掂在手里沉甸甸的，比想象中结实很多，虽然完全违背了设计初衷，不过也能够在肉搏战中起到作用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.crossbow.upgrade_ability_stat_name
%s of anti-entropy: Ability Boost
反熵%s: 武技加成

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.crossbow$chargedshot.name
%s of anti-entropy: charged
反熵%s: 蓄势待发

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.crossbow$chargedshot.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
The Duelist is focusing power into her crossbow. The next attack she makes with it will always hit and apply one of three effects:
- Melee attacks will knock enemies a few tiles away.
- Untipped darts will deal bonus damage.
- Tipped darts will gain extra uses and apply their effect in a 7x7 area. Positive dart effects will only affect allies, and harmful effects will only apply to enemies. The Duelist cannot use this ability to apply positive dart effects to herself.
反熵%s:
决斗家正将能量集中于她的十字弩。这个武技能使她的下一次攻击必定命中，并将视情况触发以下三种效果之一：
-近战攻击将会击退敌人数格。
-未涂药飞镖将会造成额外伤害。
-涂药飞镖将会增加可用次数，在7x7的范围内触发效果。正面效果只对盟友生效，负面效果也只对敌人生效。决斗家不能使用此武技使正面飞镖效果对她自己生效。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.cudgel.name
%s of anti-entropy: cudgel
反熵%s: 权杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.cudgel.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a rather accurate weapon.
反熵%s: 这是一件比较精准的武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.cudgel.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: heavy blow
反熵%s: 重击

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.cudgel.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _heavy blow_ with a cudgel. This concentrated attack typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ if it surprised the enemy, and dazes them for 5 turns which reduces accuracy and evasion by 50%%. Heavy blow always hits but deals regular damage if it does not surprise the enemy.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用权杖使出_重击_。这用尽全力的一击如果是在伏击敌人，则一般会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并施加5回合的恍惚，使其精准与闪避均降低50%%。重击必定命中，但若非伏击则只会造成普通的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.cudgel.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _heavy blow_ with a cudgel. This concentrated attack deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ if it surprised the enemy, and dazes them for 5 turns which reduces accuracy and evasion by 50%%. Heavy blow always hits but deals regular damage if it does not surprise the enemy.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用权杖使出_重击_。这用尽全力的一击如果是在伏击敌人，则会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并施加5回合的恍惚，使其精准与闪避均降低50%%。重击必定命中，但若非伏击则只会造成普通的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.cudgel.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A small brass mace, made more as a self-defense tool for nobles than as an adventuring weapon.
反熵%s: 一把小型黄铜锤，更多的作为贵族们的自卫工具而非冒险用武器使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dagger.name
%s of anti-entropy: dagger
反熵%s: 匕首

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dagger.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon is stronger against unaware enemies.
反熵%s: 这件武器对未察觉你的敌人更有效。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dagger.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: sneak
反熵%s: 潜行

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dagger.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _sneak_ while wielding a dagger. This ability lets the Duelist instantly blink up to 5 tiles away and typically grants her _%d turns of invisibility._
反熵%s: 决斗家握持匕首时可以_潜行_。这个武技能够使决斗家立即闪现最多5格远，并一般给予_%d回合隐形_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dagger.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _sneak_ while wielding a dagger. This ability lets the Duelist instantly blink up to 5 tiles away and grants her _%d turns of invisibility._
反熵%s: 决斗家握持匕首时可以_潜行_。这个武技能够使决斗家立即闪现最多5格远，并给予_%d回合隐形_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dagger.upgrade_ability_stat_name
%s of anti-entropy: Ability Duration
反熵%s: 武技持续时间

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dagger.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A simple iron dagger with a worn wooden handle.
反熵%s: 木柄被磨损的简易铁质匕首。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dirk.name
%s of anti-entropy: dirk
反熵%s: 长匕首

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dirk.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon is stronger against unaware enemies.
反熵%s: 这件武器对未察觉你的敌人更有效。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dirk.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: sneak
反熵%s: 潜行

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dirk.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _sneak_ while wielding a dirk. This ability lets the Duelist instantly blink up to 4 tiles away and typically grants her _%d turns of invisibility._
反熵%s: 决斗家握持长匕首时可以_潜行_。这个武技能够使决斗家立即闪现最多4格远，并一般给予_%d回合隐形_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dirk.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _sneak_ while wielding a dirk. This ability lets the Duelist instantly blink up to 4 tiles away and grants her _%d turns of invisibility._
反熵%s: 决斗家握持长匕首时可以_潜行_。这个武技能够使决斗家立即闪现最多4格远，并给予_%d回合隐形_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dirk.upgrade_ability_stat_name
%s of anti-entropy: Ability Duration
反熵%s: 武技持续时间

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.dirk.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A longer thrusting dagger, gives a bit more steel to plunge into foes.
反熵%s: 一个长一些的刺击型匕首，可以往敌人身体里捅得更深一点。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.flail.name
%s of anti-entropy: flail
反熵%s: 链枷

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.flail.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a rather inaccurate weapon.\nThis weapon cannot surprise attack.
反熵%s: 这是一件不太精准的武器。\n这件武器不能用来伏击。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.flail.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: spin
反熵%s: 甩动

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.flail.spin_warn
%s of anti-entropy: You can't spin the flail any more.
反熵%s: 你不能再继续甩动链枷了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.flail.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _spin_ a flail to build up power for a short time. Each turn the flail is spun it will typically deal _+%d damage_ on its next regular attack, to a max of 3 times. A spinning flail is also guaranteed to hit. Only starting to spin the flail costs a charge.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以_甩动_链枷以在短时间内积蓄力量。每甩动一次，链枷一般就会造成_%d点额外伤害_，最多3次。甩动的链枷必定命中。只有开始甩动链枷消耗1点充能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.flail.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _spin_ a flail to build up power for a short time. Each turn the flail is spun it will deal _+%d damage_ on its next regular attack, to a max of 3 times. A spinning flail is also guaranteed to hit. Only starting to spin the flail costs a charge.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以_甩动_链枷以在短时间内积蓄力量。每甩动一次，链枷就会造成_%d点额外伤害_，最多3次。甩动的链枷必定命中。只有开始甩动链枷消耗1点充能。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.flail.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A spiked ball attached to a handle by a length of chain. Very unwieldy, but devastating if it lands a solid hit.
反熵%s: 铁链上附着的一个带刺的钢球。笨重难用，能命中的话威力极强。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.flail$spinabilitytracker.name
%s of anti-entropy: spinning
反熵%s: 蓄势

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.flail$spinabilitytracker.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
The Duelist is spinning her flail, building damage for her next regular attack with it. Each spin takes one turn but increases damage, to a max of three spins. The flail is also guaranteed to hit while spinning.

Current spins: %1$d%%.
Turns remaining: %2$s.
反熵%s:
决斗家正在甩动链枷，为下一击积蓄力量。每次甩动消耗一回合但会增加伤害，最多甩动三次。只要在甩动中，链枷的攻击就必定命中。

当前甩动次数：%1$d%%。
剩余回合数：%2$s。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.gauntlet.name
%s of anti-entropy: stone gauntlet
反熵%s: 魔岩拳套

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.gauntlet.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a very fast weapon.
反熵%s: 这是一件非常快的武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.gauntlet.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: combo strike
反熵%s: 连击

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.gauntlet.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _combo strike_ with a stone gauntlet. This attack is guaranteed to hit and typically deals _+%d damage_ for each time the Duelist has hit with a regular melee or thrown weapon attack in the last 5 turns.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以使用魔岩拳套进行_连击_。这次攻击必定命中，并且决斗家在最近5回合当中每使用近战或者投掷武器成功命中一次，这次攻击的伤害一般就_增加%d点_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.gauntlet.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _combo strike_ with a stone gauntlet. This attack is guaranteed to hit and deals _+%d damage_ for each time the Duelist has hit with a regular melee or thrown weapon attack in the last 5 turns.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以使用魔岩拳套进行_连击_。这次攻击必定命中，并且决斗家在最近5回合当中每使用近战或者投掷武器成功命中一次，这次攻击的伤害就_增加%d点_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.gauntlet.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This massive gauntlet is made of crimson fabric with heavy magical stone layered on top. The fabric tightens around you, making the thick stone plates almost like a second skin. Swinging such a heavy weapon requires strength, but adds tremendous force to your blows.
反熵%s: 这个巨大的拳套由一匹红布和层层覆盖在布上的魔法岩石交织而成。戴上后，布料紧紧裹住你的整个前臂，让厚重的岩板变得像一层坚硬的皮肤。要有足够的力量才能将如此沉重的武器自如挥舞，但正是这种力量和重量的结合让这件武器发挥出可怕的威力。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.glaive.name
%s of anti-entropy: glaive
反熵%s: 关刀

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.glaive.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a rather slow weapon.\nThis weapon has extra reach.
反熵%s: 这是一件相当慢的武器。\n这件武器有额外的攻击距离。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.glaive.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: spike
反熵%s: 刺退

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.glaive.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can use the tip of a glaive to _spike_ an enemy that is in range but not adjacent. This typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_, knocks the enemy back, and is guaranteed to hit.
反熵%s: 决斗家用关刀刀尖_刺退_在射程内但不与决斗家相邻的敌人，一般造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，将敌人击退且必定命中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.glaive.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can use the tip of a glaive to _spike_ an enemy that is in range but not adjacent. This deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_, knocks the enemy back, and is guaranteed to hit.
反熵%s: 决斗家用关刀刀尖_刺退_在射程内但不与决斗家相邻的敌人，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，将敌人击退且必定命中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.glaive.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A massive polearm consisting of a sword blade on the end of a pole.
反熵%s: 一支在末端装有剑刃的重型长柄武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.gloves.name
%s of anti-entropy: studded gloves
反熵%s: 镶钉手套

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.gloves.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a very fast weapon.
反熵%s: 这是一件非常快的武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.gloves.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: combo strike
反熵%s: 连击

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.gloves.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _combo strike_ with studded gloves. This attack is guaranteed to hit and typically deals _+%d damage_ for each time the Duelist has hit with a regular melee or thrown weapon attack in the last 5 turns.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以使用镶钉手套进行_连击_。这次攻击必定命中，并且决斗家在最近5回合当中每使用近战或者投掷武器成功命中一次，这次攻击的伤害一般就_增加%d点_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.gloves.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _combo strike_ with studded gloves. This attack is guaranteed to hit and deals _+%d damage_ for each time the Duelist has hit with a regular melee or thrown weapon attack in the last 5 turns.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以使用镶钉手套进行_连击_。这次攻击必定命中，并且决斗家在最近5回合当中每使用近战或者投掷武器成功命中一次，这次攻击的伤害就_增加%d点_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.gloves.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These studded gloves don't provide any real protection, but they act as a serviceable weapon while keeping the hands free.
反熵%s: 这双镶钉手套没有多少防护作用，但能在勉强当作武器使用的同时腾出双手。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greataxe.name
%s of anti-entropy: greataxe
反熵%s: 巨斧

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greataxe.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon is incredibly heavy.
反熵%s: 这件武器非常沉重。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greataxe.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: retribution
反熵%s: 报复

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greataxe.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _retribution_ attack with a greataxe if she is below 50%% health. This devastating attack typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage,_ is guaranteed to hit, and is instantaneous if it kills an enemy.
反熵%s: 决斗家在血量低于50%%时可以使用巨斧进行_报复_攻击。这种毁灭性的攻击必定命中，且一般造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，若是击杀了一名敌人，这一击将不消耗时间。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greataxe.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _retribution_ attack with a greataxe if she is below 50%% health. This devastating attack deals _%1$d-%2$d damage,_ is guaranteed to hit, and is instantaneous if it kills an enemy.
反熵%s: 决斗家在血量低于50%%时可以使用巨斧进行_报复_攻击。这种毁灭性的攻击必定命中，且造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，若是击杀了一名敌人，这一击将不消耗时间。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greataxe.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Meant to be wielded over the shoulder, this titanic axe is as powerful as it is heavy.
反熵%s: 这个巨型的战斧无坚不摧，重如泰山，举过肩才有空间挥舞。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatshield.name
%s of anti-entropy: greatshield
反熵%s: 巨型方盾

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatshield.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this weapon blocks 0-%d damage. This blocking scales with upgrades.
反熵%s: 这件武器通常能格挡0~%d点伤害。格挡量随升级而增长。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatshield.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon blocks 0-%d damage. This blocking scales with upgrades.
反熵%s: 这件武器能格挡0~%d点伤害。格挡量随升级而增长。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatshield.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: guard
反熵%s: 护卫

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatshield.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _guard_ herself with a greatshield, completely negating all physical or magical attacks made against her typically for _%d turns_. Once the Duelist has blocked an attack, attacking back or using magic will end guarding.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用巨型方盾_护卫_自己，一般会在_%d回合_内完全抵挡针对自己的物理或魔法攻击。一旦决斗家抵挡过攻击，再行反击或施法，护卫都会终止。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatshield.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _guard_ herself with a greatshield, completely negating all physical or magical attacks made against her for _%d turns_. Once the Duelist has blocked an attack, attacking back or using magic will end guarding.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用巨型方盾_护卫_自己，在_%d回合_内完全抵挡针对自己的物理或魔法攻击。一旦决斗家抵挡过攻击，再行还击或施法，护卫都会终止。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatshield.upgrade_ability_stat_name
%s of anti-entropy: Ability Duration
反熵%s: 武技持续时间

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatshield.desc
%s of anti-entropy: More like a mobile wall than a shield, this gigantic mass of metal aids defense, but doesn't leave much room for attacking.
反熵%s: 与其说它是一面盾，不如说它是一堵能移动的墙。这一大块金属对于防御十分有效，但没有在攻击方面留下多少余地。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatsword.name
%s of anti-entropy: greatsword
反熵%s: 巨剑

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatsword.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: cleave
反熵%s: 顺劈

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatsword.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _cleave_ an enemy with a greatsword. This typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and is guaranteed to hit. If cleave kills an enemy it is instantaneous and the Duelist can use cleave again within 5 turns for free.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用巨剑_顺劈_敌人。这一般会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_且必定命中。如果顺劈击杀了一名敌人，这一击将不消耗时间，并且决斗家可在5回合内额外使用一次不消耗充能数的顺劈。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatsword.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _cleave_ an enemy with a greatsword. This deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and is guaranteed to hit. If cleave kills an enemy it is instantaneous and the Duelist can use cleave again within 5 turns for free.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用巨剑_顺劈_敌人，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_且必定命中。如果顺劈击杀了一名敌人，这一击将不消耗时间，并且决斗家可在5回合内额外使用一次不消耗充能数的顺劈。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.greatsword.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This towering blade inflicts heavy damage by investing its heft into every swing.
反熵%s: 这把大剑进行的每次沉重挥舞都能造成大量伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.handaxe.name
%s of anti-entropy: hand axe
反熵%s: 手斧

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.handaxe.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a rather accurate weapon.
反熵%s: 这是一件比较精准的武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.handaxe.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: heavy blow
反熵%s: 重击

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.handaxe.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _heavy blow_ with a hand axe. This concentrated attack typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ if it surprised the enemy, and dazes them for 5 turns which reduces accuracy and evasion by 50%%. Heavy blow always hits but deals regular damage if it does not surprise the enemy.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用手斧使出_重击_。这用尽全力的一击如果是在伏击敌人，则一般会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并施加5回合的恍惚，使其精准与闪避均降低50%%。重击必定命中，但若非伏击则只会造成普通的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.handaxe.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _heavy blow_ with a hand axe. This concentrated attack deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ if it surprised the enemy, and dazes them for 5 turns which reduces accuracy and evasion by 50%%. Heavy blow always hits but deals regular damage if it does not surprise the enemy.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用手斧使出_重击_。这用尽全力的一击如果是在伏击敌人，则会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并施加5回合的恍惚，使其精准与闪避均降低50%%。重击必定命中，但若非伏击则只会造成普通的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.handaxe.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A light axe, most commonly used for felling trees. The wide blade works well against foes as well.
反熵%s: 一把轻斧头，通常用来砍树。当然，它的宽刃对敌人来说同样有效。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.katana.name
%s of anti-entropy: katana
反熵%s: 武士刀

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.katana.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon blocks 0-3 damage.
反熵%s: 这件武器可以格挡0~3点伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.katana.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: lunge
反熵%s: 弓步刺

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.katana.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _lunge_ with a katana at an enemy 1 tile away. This moves toward the enemy, typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_, and is guaranteed to hit.
反熵%s: 决斗家可用武士刀对相距1格的敌人使出_弓步刺_。这一击会向敌人突进，一般造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，且必定命中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.katana.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _lunge_ with a katana at an enemy 1 tile away. This moves toward the enemy, deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_, and is guaranteed to hit.
反熵%s: 决斗家可用武士刀对相距1格的敌人使出_弓步刺_。这一击会向敌人突进，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，且必定命中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.katana.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A slender sword with a large metal guard above the handle.
反熵%s: 一把在握柄上方带有巨大金属护手的修长刀刃。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.longsword.name
%s of anti-entropy: longsword
反熵%s: 长剑

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.longsword.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: cleave
反熵%s: 顺劈

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.longsword.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _cleave_ an enemy with a longsword. This typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and is guaranteed to hit. If cleave kills an enemy it is instantaneous and the Duelist can use cleave again within 5 turns for free.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用长剑_顺劈_敌人。这一般会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_且必定命中。如果顺劈击杀了一名敌人，这一击将不消耗时间，并且决斗家可在5回合内额外使用一次不消耗充能数的顺劈。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.longsword.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _cleave_ an enemy with a longsword. This deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and is guaranteed to hit. If cleave kills an enemy it is instantaneous and the Duelist can use cleave again within 5 turns for free.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用巨剑_顺劈_敌人。造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_且必定命中。如果顺劈击杀了一名敌人，这一击将不消耗时间，并且决斗家可在5回合内额外使用一次不消耗充能数的顺劈。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.longsword.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This sword's long razor-sharp steel blade shines reassuringly, though its size does make it quite heavy.
反熵%s: 这柄剑的厚长利刃闪烁着令人宽心的寒光，不过这长度也确实让它非常沉重。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.mace.name
%s of anti-entropy: mace
反熵%s: 硬头锤

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.mace.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a rather accurate weapon.
反熵%s: 这是一件比较精准的武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.mace.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: heavy blow
反熵%s: 重击

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.mace.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _heavy blow_ with a mace. This concentrated attack typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ if it surprised the enemy, and dazes them for 5 turns which reduces accuracy and evasion by 50%%. Heavy blow always hits but deals regular damage if it does not surprise the enemy.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用硬头锤使出_重击_。这用尽全力的一击如果是在伏击敌人，则一般会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并施加5回合的恍惚，使其精准与闪避均降低50%%。重击必定命中，但若非伏击则只会造成普通的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.mace.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _heavy blow_ with a mace. This concentrated attack deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ if it surprised the enemy, and dazes them for 5 turns which reduces accuracy and evasion by 50%%. Heavy blow always hits but deals regular damage if it does not surprise the enemy.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用硬头锤使出_重击_。这用尽全力的一击如果是在伏击敌人，则会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并施加5回合的恍惚，使其精准与闪避均降低50%%。重击必定命中，但若非伏击则只会造成普通的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.mace.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The large iron head of this weapon inflicts substantial damage.
反熵%s: 这把武器前端的大型铁头能够造成可观的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.name
%s of anti-entropy: mage's staff
反熵%s: 法师魔杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.ac_imbue
%s of anti-entropy: IMBUE
反熵%s: 灌注

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.ac_zap
%s of anti-entropy: ZAP
反熵%s: 释放

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select a wand
反熵%s: 选择一根要吸收的法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.imbue
%s of anti-entropy: You imbue your staff with the %s.
反熵%s: 你将%s注入魔杖。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.preserved
%s of anti-entropy: The previous wand was preserved!
反熵%s: 你保留了之前灌注的法杖！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.conflict
%s of anti-entropy: The conflicting magics erase the enchantment on your staff.
反熵%s: 相互冲突的魔法抹去了你魔杖上的附魔。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.id_first
%s of anti-entropy: You'll need to identify this wand first.
反熵%s: 你需要先鉴定这根法杖。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: You can't use a cursed wand.
反熵%s: 你不能注入一根被诅咒的法杖。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.imbue_desc
%s of anti-entropy:
Are you sure you want to imbue your staff with this wand?

If the wand being imbued is the same or higher level than the staff, the staff will inherit the level of that wand plus a single one of its own upgrades.

This imbue will result in a _level %d_ staff.
反熵%s:
你确定要将这根法杖注入魔杖？

如果被吸收法杖的等级大于等于魔杖的等级，魔杖会在继承这根法杖的等级后再加上自身的一级。

在这次灌注后，魔杖会变为_%d_级。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.imbue_lost
%s of anti-entropy: The wand currently imbued in your staff _will be lost_.
反熵%s: 当前魔杖内被灌注的法杖_将会消失_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.imbue_talent
%s of anti-entropy: The wand currently imbued in your staff _will be returned at +0_.
反熵%s: 当前魔杖内被灌注的法杖_将被回收为0级法杖_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.yes
%s of anti-entropy: Yes, I'm sure
反熵%s: 是的，我确定

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.no
%s of anti-entropy: No, I changed my mind
反熵%s: 不，我改主意了

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Crafted by the Mage himself, this staff is a unique magical weapon which can be imbued with a wand.
反熵%s: 这根魔杖是件独一无二的魔法武器，由法师亲自雕琢而成，能注入其它法杖的魔力以获取新的力量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.no_wand
%s of anti-entropy: The staff currently has no magic in it, it must be _imbued with a wand's power_ before it can be used to cast spells.
反熵%s: 这根魔杖并没有任何魔力，它必须先被_注入进另一根法杖的魔力_才能用于施放法术。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.has_wand
%s of anti-entropy: The staff is currently imbued with a _%s._
反熵%s: 魔杖目前被灌注了_%s_的力量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.magesstaff.cursed_wand
%s of anti-entropy: The staff is cursed, making its magic chaotic and random.
反熵%s: 这根魔杖受到了诅咒，导致它的魔法混乱而随机。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.ac_ability
%s of anti-entropy: ABILITY
反熵%s: 武技

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.stats_known
%s of anti-entropy: This _tier-%1$d_ melee weapon deals _%2$d-%3$d damage_ and requires _%4$d strength_ to use properly.
反熵%s: 这件_%1$d阶_近战武器可以造成_%2$d~%3$d点伤害_，并且需要_%4$d点力量_来正常使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.stats_unknown
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this _tier-%1$d_ melee weapon deals _%2$d-%3$d damage_ and requires _%4$d strength_ to use properly.
反熵%s: 一般情况下这件_%1$d阶_近战武器可以造成_%2$d~%3$d点伤害_，并且需要_%4$d点力量_来正常使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.probably_too_heavy
%s of anti-entropy: Probably this weapon is too heavy for you.
反熵%s: 这件武器对你来说或许太重了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.ability_need_equip
%s of anti-entropy: You must equip that weapon to use its ability.
反熵%s: 你必须装备那把武器才能使用它的武技。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.ability_low_str
%s of anti-entropy: You aren't strong enough to use this weapon's ability.
反熵%s: 你的力量不足以使用这把武器的武技。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.ability_no_charge
%s of anti-entropy: You don't have enough energy to use that ability.
反熵%s: 你没有足够的能量来发动那个武技。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.ability_cant_use
%s of anti-entropy: You can't use that ability right now.
反熵%s: 你现在不能使用那个武技。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.ability_no_target
%s of anti-entropy: There is no target there.
反熵%s: 那里没有任何目标。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.ability_target_range
%s of anti-entropy: That target isn't in range.
反熵%s: 那个目标不在范围内。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.ability_occupied
%s of anti-entropy: That location is occupied.
反熵%s: 那个位置已被占据。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.upgrade_ability_stat_name
%s of anti-entropy: Ability Damage
反熵%s: 武技伤害
