items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select a Target
反熵%s: 选择一个目标

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.swap
%s of anti-entropy: Swap Weapons
反熵%s: 切换武器

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.meleeweapon.swap_full
%s of anti-entropy: You can't do that with a full inventory.
反熵%s: 你无法在背包已满的情况下这么做。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.shortsword.name
%s of anti-entropy: shortsword
反熵%s: 短剑

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.shortsword.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: cleave
反熵%s: 顺劈

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.shortsword.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _cleave_ an enemy with a shortsword. This typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and is guaranteed to hit. If cleave kills an enemy it is instantaneous and the Duelist can use cleave again within 5 turns for free.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用短剑_顺劈_敌人。这一般会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_且必定命中。如果顺劈击杀了一名敌人，这一击将不消耗时间，并且决斗家可在5回合内额外使用一次不消耗充能数的顺劈。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.shortsword.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _cleave_ an enemy with a shortsword. This deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and is guaranteed to hit. If cleave kills an enemy it is instantaneous and the Duelist can use cleave again within 5 turns for free.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用短剑_顺劈_敌人，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_且必定命中。如果顺劈击杀了一名敌人，这一击将不消耗时间，并且决斗家可在5回合内额外使用一次不消耗充能数的顺劈。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.shortsword.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A quite short sword, only a few inches longer than a dagger.
反熵%s: 它确实相当短，只比一把匕首长出几厘米。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.quarterstaff.name
%s of anti-entropy: quarterstaff
反熵%s: 铁头棍

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.quarterstaff.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon blocks 0-2 damage.
反熵%s: 这件武器可以格挡0~2点伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.quarterstaff.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: defensive stance
反熵%s: 防御架势

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.quarterstaff.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can assume a _defensive stance_ with a quarterstaff. This stance takes no time to activate and triples her evasion typically for _%d turns._
反熵%s: 决斗家可通过铁头棍进入_防御架势_。进入这一架势不消耗时间，且一般将在_%d回合_内使她的闪避变为3倍。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.quarterstaff.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can assume a _defensive stance_ with a quarterstaff. This stance takes no time to activate and triples her evasion for _%d turns._
反熵%s: 决斗家可通过铁头棍进入_防御架势_。进入这一架势不消耗时间，且将在_%d回合_内使她的闪避变为3倍。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.quarterstaff.upgrade_ability_stat_name
%s of anti-entropy: Ability Duration
反熵%s: 武技持续时间

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.quarterstaff.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A staff of hardwood, its ends are shod with iron.
反熵%s: 这是两端以铁包覆的硬木棍。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.quarterstaff$defensivestance.name
%s of anti-entropy: defensive stance
反熵%s: 防御架势

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.quarterstaff$defensivestance.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist is using her quarterstaff to deflect incoming blows and projectiles. As long as she is in this stance, her evasion against all attacks is tripled.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
反熵%s: 决斗家正在使用她的铁头棍偏斜来袭的攻击和投射物。只要她还处于这个架势下，她对一切攻击的闪避能力都会变为3倍。\n\n剩余回合数：%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.rapier.name
%s of anti-entropy: rapier
反熵%s: 刺剑

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.rapier.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon blocks 0-1 damage.
反熵%s: 这件武器可以格挡0~1点伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.rapier.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: lunge
反熵%s: 弓步刺

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.rapier.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _lunge_ with a rapier at an enemy 1 tile away. This moves toward the enemy, typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_, and is guaranteed to hit.
反熵%s: 决斗家可用刺剑对相距1格的敌人使出_弓步刺_。这一击会向敌人突进，一般造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，且必定命中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.rapier.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _lunge_ with a rapier at an enemy 1 tile away. This moves toward the enemy, deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_, and is guaranteed to hit.
反熵%s: 决斗家可用刺剑对相距1格的敌人使出_弓步刺_。这一击会向敌人突进，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，且必定命中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.rapier.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A slim straight sword that offers some protection in exchange for less slashing power.
反熵%s: 一柄修长而笔直的利器，牺牲了部分劈砍能力而获得一定的保护效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.roundshield.name
%s of anti-entropy: round shield
反熵%s: 圆盾

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.roundshield.typical_stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Typically this weapon blocks 0-%d damage. This blocking scales with upgrades.
反熵%s: 这件武器通常能格挡0~%d点伤害。格挡量会随着武器的升级而提升。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.roundshield.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon blocks 0-%d damage. This blocking scales with upgrades.
反熵%s: 这件武器能格挡0~%d点伤害。通过升级可以使格挡量增长。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.roundshield.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: guard
反熵%s: 护卫

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.roundshield.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _guard_ herself with a round shield, completely negating all physical or magical attacks made against her typically for _%d turns_. Once the Duelist has blocked an attack, attacking back or using magic will end guarding.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用圆盾_护卫_自己，一般会在_%d回合_内完全抵挡针对自己的物理或魔法攻击。一旦决斗家抵挡过攻击，再行还击或施法，护卫都会终止。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.roundshield.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _guard_ herself with a round shield, completely negating all physical or magical attacks made against her for _%d turns_. Once the Duelist has blocked an attack, attacking back or using magic will end guarding.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用圆盾_护卫_自己，在_%d回合_内完全抵挡针对自己的所有物理或魔法攻击。一旦决斗家抵挡过攻击，再行还击或施法，护卫都会终止。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.roundshield.upgrade_ability_stat_name
%s of anti-entropy: Ability Duration
反熵%s: 武技持续时间

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.roundshield.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This large shield effectively blocks attacks and makes a decent weapon in a pinch.
反熵%s: 这个大盾可以有效格挡攻击，在危机时刻也可以作为不错的武器使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.roundshield$guardtracker.name
%s of anti-entropy: guarding
反熵%s: 护卫中

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.roundshield$guardtracker.guarded
%s of anti-entropy: guarded
反熵%s: 被护卫

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.roundshield$guardtracker.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist has readied her shield in anticipation of incoming attacks. Physical or magical attacks made against her will be completely negated.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
反熵%s: 决斗家已经准备好她的盾牌以应对即将到来的攻击。针对她的物理或魔法攻击将被完全抵挡。\n\n剩余回合数：%s。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.runicblade.name
%s of anti-entropy: runic blade
反熵%s: 符文之刃

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.runicblade.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon benefits more from upgrades.
反熵%s: 这件武器从升级中获得更多伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.runicblade.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: runic slash
反熵%s: 符文挥砍

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.runicblade.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _runic slash_ with a runic blade. This attack is guaranteed to hit and typically has _+%d%% enchantment power._
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用符文之刃使出_符文挥砍_。这一击必定命中且通常附带_%d%%的附魔强化_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.runicblade.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _runic slash_ with a runic blade. This attack is guaranteed to hit and has _+%d%% enchantment power._
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用符文之刃使出_符文挥砍_。这一击必定命中且有_%d%%的附魔强化_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.runicblade.upgrade_ability_stat_name
%s of anti-entropy: Ability Power
反熵%s: 武技强化

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.runicblade.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A mysterious weapon from a distant land, with a bright blue blade.
反熵%s: 来自失落之地的神秘武器，有着明亮的蓝色刀刃。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sai.name
%s of anti-entropy: sai
反熵%s: 双钗

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sai.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a very fast weapon.
反熵%s: 这是一件非常快的武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sai.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: combo strike
反熵%s: 连击

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sai.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _combo strike_ with sai. This attack is guaranteed to hit and typically deals _+%d damage_ for each time the Duelist has hit with a regular melee or thrown weapon attack in the last 5 turns.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以使用双钗进行_连击_。这次攻击必定命中，并且决斗家在最近5回合当中每使用近战或者投掷武器成功命中一次，这次攻击的伤害一般就_增加%d点_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sai.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _combo strike_ with sai. This attack is guaranteed to hit and deals _+%d damage_ for each time the Duelist has hit with a regular melee or thrown weapon attack in the last 5 turns.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以使用双钗进行_连击_。这次攻击必定命中，并且决斗家在最近5回合当中每使用近战或者投掷武器成功命中一次，这次攻击的伤害就_增加%d点_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sai.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Two thin blades meant to be wielded in one hand each. Excellent for tearing down enemies with a flurry of cuts.
反熵%s: 一对轻薄的铁刃，刚好一手一把。在快速斩击方面十分出色。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sai$combostriketracker.name
%s of anti-entropy: combo strike
反熵%s: 连击

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sai$combostriketracker.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
The Duelist is building combo that can be used to increase the damage of the combo strike ability. Each sucessful attack made with a melee or thrown weapon will count, but not successfully attacking for 5 turns resets this combo.

Recent hits: %1$d.

Turns until hits are lost: %2$s.
反熵%s:
决斗家正在积累连击数以增加连击武技的伤害。每次用近战或投掷武器成功攻击都会记入连击，但连续5回合未成功攻击会重置连击数。

当前连击数：%1$d

重置连击剩余回合数：%2$s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.scimitar.name
%s of anti-entropy: scimitar
反熵%s: 弯刀

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.scimitar.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a rather fast weapon.
反熵%s: 这是一件比较快的武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.scimitar.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: sword dance
反熵%s: 剑舞

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.scimitar.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _sword dance_ with a scimitar. This stance takes no time to activate and grants the Duelist +60%% attack speed and +50%% accuracy typically for _%d turns._
反熵%s: 决斗家可用弯刀进入_剑舞_。进入这个姿态不消耗时间，并使决斗家一般在_%d回合_内攻击速度+60%%且精准+50%%。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.scimitar.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _sword dance_ with a scimitar. This stance takes no time to activate and grants the Duelist +60%% attack speed and +50%% accuracy for _%d turns._
反熵%s: 决斗家可用弯刀进入_剑舞_。进入这个姿态不消耗时间，并使决斗家在 _%d回合_内攻击速度+60%%且精准+50%%。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.scimitar.upgrade_ability_stat_name
%s of anti-entropy: Ability Duration
反熵%s: 武技持续时间

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.scimitar.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A thick curved blade. Its shape allows for faster, yet less powerful attacks.
反熵%s: 一把厚重的弯刀。它的形状能让它进行更快但不甚强力的攻击。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.scimitar$sworddance.name
%s of anti-entropy: sword dance
反熵%s: 剑舞

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.scimitar$sworddance.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist is making quick momentum based strikes in a sort of dance. While this stance is active, she attacks 60%% faster (enough to attack exactly twice a turn with a scimitar) and has +50%% accuracy.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
反熵%s: 决斗家正以一种舞蹈的形式展开疾风骤雨般的攻击。当这个架势激活时，她的攻击速度增加60%%(在使用弯刀的情况下刚好足以一回合攻击两次)，且具有+50%%的精准。\n\n剩余回合数：%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sickle.name
%s of anti-entropy: sickle
反熵%s: 短柄镰

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sickle.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a rather inaccurate weapon.
反熵%s: 这是一件不太精准的武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sickle.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: harvest
反熵%s: 收割

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sickle.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _harvest_ an enemy with a sickle. This devastating attack is guaranteed to hit and typically deals _%d damage_. This damage is applied as bleeding if the target isn't immune.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用短柄镰来_收割_敌人，这破坏性的一击必定命中，一般会造成_%d点伤害_。若敌人不免疫流血，则造成的伤害会转化为等值流血效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sickle.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _harvest_ an enemy with a sickle. This devastating attack is guaranteed to hit and deals _%d damage_. This damage is applied as bleeding if the target isn't immune.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用短柄镰来_收割_敌人，这破坏性的一击必定命中，并会造成_%d点伤害_。若敌人不免疫流血，则造成的伤害会转化为等值流血效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sickle.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A handheld farming tool that can double as a strong but unwieldy weapon.
反熵%s: 一种手持农具，也可被用作一把强大但笨重的武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.spear.name
%s of anti-entropy: spear
反熵%s: 长矛

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.spear.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a rather slow weapon.\nThis weapon has extra reach.
反熵%s: 这是一件相当慢的武器。\n这件武器有额外的攻击距离。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.spear.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: spike
反熵%s: 刺退

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.spear.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can use the tip of a spear to _spike_ an enemy that is in range but not adjacent. This typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_, knocks the enemy back, and is guaranteed to hit.
反熵%s: 决斗家用矛尖_刺退_在射程内但不与决斗家相邻的敌人，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，将敌人击退且必定命中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.spear.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can use the tip of a spear to _spike_ an enemy that is in range but not adjacent. This deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_, knocks the enemy back, and is guaranteed to hit.
反熵%s: 决斗家用矛尖_刺退_在射程内但不与决斗家相邻的敌人，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，将敌人击退且必定命中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.spear.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A slender wooden rod tipped with sharpened iron.
反熵%s: 这是一根装着锋锐铁刺的细长木杆。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sword.name
%s of anti-entropy: sword
反熵%s: 单手剑

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sword.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: cleave
反熵%s: 顺劈

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sword.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _cleave_ an enemy with a sword. This typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and is guaranteed to hit. If cleave kills an enemy it is instantaneous and the Duelist can use cleave again within 5 turns for free.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用单手剑_顺劈_敌人。这一般会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_且必定命中。如果顺劈击杀了一名敌人，这一击将不消耗时间，并且决斗家可在5回合内额外使用一次不消耗充能数的顺劈。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sword.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _cleave_ an enemy with a sword. This deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and is guaranteed to hit. If cleave kills an enemy it is instantaneous and the Duelist can use cleave again within 5 turns for free.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用单手剑_顺劈_敌人，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_且必定命中。如果顺劈击杀了一名敌人，这一击将不消耗时间，并且决斗家可在5回合内额外使用一次不消耗充能数的顺劈。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sword.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A nicely balanced sword. Not too large, but still notably longer than a shortsword.
反熵%s: 平衡性良好的剑。不算太大，但是依然比短剑长上不少。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sword$cleavetracker.name
%s of anti-entropy: cleave
反熵%s: 顺劈

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.sword$cleavetracker.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist is ready to follow up on her previous cleave. The next use of cleave will not cost any weapon ability charge.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
反熵%s: 决斗家已经准备好进行连续的顺劈。这一次顺劈将不会消耗武技充能。\n\n剩余回合数：%s。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.warhammer.name
%s of anti-entropy: war hammer
反熵%s: 战锤

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.warhammer.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a rather accurate weapon.
反熵%s: 这是一件比较精准的武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.warhammer.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: heavy blow
反熵%s: 重击

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.warhammer.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _heavy blow_ with a war hammer. This concentrated attack typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ if it surprised the enemy, and dazes them for 5 turns which reduces accuracy and evasion by 50%%. Heavy blow always hits but deals regular damage if it does not surprise the enemy.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用战锤使出_重击_。这用尽全力的一击如果是在伏击敌人，则一般会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并施加5回合的恍惚，使其精准与闪避均降低50%%。重击必定命中，但若非伏击则只会造成普通的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.warhammer.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can perform a _heavy blow_ with a war hammer. This concentrated attack deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ if it surprised the enemy, and dazes them for 5 turns which reduces accuracy and evasion by 50%%. Heavy blow always hits but deals regular damage if it does not surprise the enemy.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用战锤使出_重击_。这用尽全力的一击如果是在伏击敌人，则会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并施加5回合的恍惚，使其精准与闪避均降低50%%。重击必定命中，但若非伏击则只会造成普通的伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.warhammer.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Few creatures can withstand the crushing blow of this towering mass of lead and steel, but it takes great strength to use effectively.
反熵%s: 很少有生物能抵挡这铅铁巨块的辗压，但也只有最强壮的冒险家才能有效使用它。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.warscythe.name
%s of anti-entropy: war scythe
反熵%s: 战镰

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.warscythe.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is a rather inaccurate weapon.
反熵%s: 这是一件不太精准的武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.warscythe.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: harvest
反熵%s: 收割

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.warscythe.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _harvest_ an enemy with a war scythe. This devastating attack is guaranteed to hit and typically deals _%d damage_. This damage is applied as bleeding if the target isn't immune.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用战镰来_收割_敌人，这破坏性的一击必定命中，一般会造成_%d点伤害_。若敌人不免疫流血，则造成的伤害会转化为等值流血效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.warscythe.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _harvest_ an enemy with a war scythe. This devastating attack is guaranteed to hit and deals _%d damage_. This damage is applied as bleeding if the target isn't immune.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用战镰来_收割_敌人，这破坏性的一击必定命中，并会造成_%d点伤害_。若敌人不免疫流血，则造成的伤害会转化为等值流血效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.warscythe.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This large and unwieldy tool has been reinforced to make it better at cutting foes than crops.
反熵%s: 这件巨大又笨重的农具被加固了。现在比起收割庄稼，它更适宜于收割敌人。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.whip.name
%s of anti-entropy: whip
反熵%s: 长鞭

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.whip.stats_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon has tremendous reach.
反熵%s: 这件武器有惊人的攻击距离。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.whip.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: lash
反熵%s: 狠抽

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.whip.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _lash_ all enemies around her with a whip. This ability typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_, attacks all enemies within attack range, and is guaranteed to hit.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用长鞭_狠抽_她周围的所有敌人。这一武技一般会对当前每个处于攻击距离内的敌人都造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，并且必定命中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.whip.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _lash_ all enemies around her with a whip. This ability deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_, attacks all enemies within attack range, and is guaranteed to hit.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用长鞭_狠抽_她周围的所有敌人。这一武技对当前每个处于攻击距离内的敌人都造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，并且必定命中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.whip.desc
%s of anti-entropy: While the barbed length of rope at the end of this weapon deals poor damage, its reach cannot be matched.
反熵%s: 虽然这把武器另一端带倒刺的绳子伤害不高，但它的攻击范围是数一数二的。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.wornshortsword.name
%s of anti-entropy: worn shortsword
反熵%s: 破旧的短剑

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.wornshortsword.ability_name
%s of anti-entropy: cleave
反熵%s: 顺劈

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.wornshortsword.typical_ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _cleave_ an enemy with a worn shortsword. This typically deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and is guaranteed to hit. If cleave kills an enemy it is instantaneous and the Duelist can use cleave again within 5 turns for free.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用破旧的短剑_顺劈_敌人。这一般会造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并且必定命中。如果顺劈击杀了一名敌人，决斗家可在5回合内额外使用一次无消耗顺劈。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.wornshortsword.ability_desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Duelist can _cleave_ an enemy with a worn shortsword. This deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and is guaranteed to hit. If cleave kills an enemy it is instantaneous and the Duelist can use cleave again within 5 turns for free.
反熵%s: 决斗家可以用破旧的短剑_顺劈_敌人。造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并且必定命中。如果顺劈击杀了一名敌人，决斗家可在5回合内额外使用一次无消耗顺劈。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.melee.wornshortsword.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A quite short sword, worn down through heavy use. It is both weaker and a bit lighter than a shortsword in better condition.
反熵%s: 一把十分短的剑，在大量使用后有一定的磨损。它比正常情况的短剑更轻，也更弱。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.adrenalinedart.name
%s of anti-entropy: adrenaline dart
反熵%s: 激素飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.adrenalinedart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These darts are tipped with a swiftthistle-based compound which will boost the movement and attack speed of allies, or briefly lower the movement speed of enemies. The dart itself is still harmful to enemies, but will not harm allies.
反熵%s: 这些飞镖上涂着一种由速行蓟制成的药物。当目标为友方时，其移动速度和攻击速度都会有所提升，若为敌方则会短暂降低其移动速度。这只飞镖仍能对敌人造成伤害，但不会伤及盟友。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.blindingdart.name
%s of anti-entropy: blinding dart
反熵%s: 致盲飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.blindingdart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These darts are tipped with a blindweed-based compound which will blind their target for a short time. They do not disorient however, so an enemy will still know where they last saw you.
反熵%s: 这些飞镖上涂着一种由致盲草制成的药物，能让目标失明一小段时间。药效比新鲜的致盲草弱，不会让目标迷失方向，所以目标会记住你之前在的位置。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.chillingdart.name
%s of anti-entropy: chilling dart
反熵%s: 寒霜飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.chillingdart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These darts are tipped with an icecap-based compound which will significantly chill their target.
反熵%s: 这些飞镖上涂着一种由冰冠花制成的药物，能显著地冻伤目标。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.cleansingdart.name
%s of anti-entropy: cleansing dart
反熵%s: 净化飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.cleansingdart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These darts are tipped with a mageroyal-based compound which will temporarily make allies immune to all negative effects, or will cleanse positive effects from enemies. Enemies may even briefly forget that they are attacking or fleeing from you. The dart itself is still harmful to enemies, but will not harm allies.
反熵%s: 这些飞镖上涂着一种由魔皇花制成的药物，能使友军暂时对所有负面效果免疫，也可以清除敌人身上的增益效果。敌人甚至会暂时忘记它正在攻击或逃离你。这只飞镖仍能对敌人造成伤害，但不会伤及盟友。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.dart.name
%s of anti-entropy: dart
反熵%s: 飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.dart.ac_tip
%s of anti-entropy: TIP
反熵%s: 涂药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.dart.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select a seed
反熵%s: 选择一粒种子

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.dart.tip_title
%s of anti-entropy: Tip Darts
反熵%s: 为飞镖涂药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.dart.tip_desc
%s of anti-entropy: A seed can be combined with one or two darts to tip them. Each type of seed produces its own type of tipped dart, with a unique single-use effect.\n\nTipping a dart with these seeds will produce a _%s._
反熵%s: 一粒种子可以为1~2枚飞镖涂药。每种种子都能产生对应的，具有独特效果的一次性涂药飞镖。\n\n将这些种子涂抹在飞镖上能得到_%s_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.dart.tip_all
%s of anti-entropy: tip %1$d darts with %2$d seeds
反熵%s: 用%2$d粒种子为%1$d枚飞镖涂药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.dart.tip_two
%s of anti-entropy: tip 2 darts with 1 seed
反熵%s: 用1粒种子为2枚飞镖涂药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.dart.tip_one
%s of anti-entropy: tip 1 dart with 1 seed
反熵%s: 用1粒种子为1枚飞镖涂药

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.dart.tip_cancel
%s of anti-entropy: cancel
反熵%s: 取消

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.dart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These simple shafts of spike-tipped wood are weighted to fly true and sting their prey with a flick of the wrist. They can be tipped with seeds to gain bonus effects when thrown.
反熵%s: 由短木杆和金属尖头简易制成，手腕轻抖就会精准地飞向目标。使用种子可以为飞镖涂药，使其对目标造成额外效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.dart.unlimited_uses
%s of anti-entropy: However, due to their simple construction darts will effectively last forever.
反熵%s: 然而，由于飞镖极其简易的构造，飞镖本身可以永久使用而不损坏。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.displacingdart.name
%s of anti-entropy: displacing dart
反熵%s: 传送飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.displacingdart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These darts are tipped with a fadeleaf-based compound which will teleport their target a short distance away.
反熵%s: 这些飞镖上涂着一种由消逝草制成的药物，能把目标传送走一小段距离。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.healingdart.name
%s of anti-entropy: healing dart
反熵%s: 治疗飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.healingdart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These darts are tipped with a sungrass-based compound which grants a burst of healing to their target. The dart itself is still harmful to enemies, but will not harm allies.
反熵%s: 这些飞镖上涂着一种由阳春草制成的药物，能强效治疗目标的伤势。这只飞镖仍能对敌人造成伤害，但不会伤及盟友 。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.holydart.name
%s of anti-entropy: holy dart
反熵%s: 神圣飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.holydart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These darts are tipped with a starflower-based compound which infuses holy energy into their target. Allies and regular enemies will become blessed, but undead or demonic enemies will take heavy damage. The dart itself is still harmful to enemies, but will not harm allies.
反熵%s: 这些飞镖上涂着一种由星陨花制成的药物，能向目标体内注入神圣能量。友方或常规敌人将因此进入赐福状态，而亡灵或恶魔类敌人则会受到大量伤害。这只飞镖仍能对敌人造成伤害，但不会伤及盟友。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.incendiarydart.name
%s of anti-entropy: incendiary dart
反熵%s: 燃烧飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.incendiarydart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These darts are tipped with a firebloom-based compound which will burst into brilliant flames on impact.
反熵%s: 这些飞镖上涂着一种由烈焰花制成的药物，命中后会燃起烈焰。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.paralyticdart.name
%s of anti-entropy: paralytic dart
反熵%s: 麻痹飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.paralyticdart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These darts are tipped with an earthroot-based compound which will paralyze their target for a short time.
反熵%s: 这些飞镖上涂着一种由地缚根制成的药物，能让目标无助地麻痹一小段时间。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.poisondart.name
%s of anti-entropy: poison dart
反熵%s: 毒液飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.poisondart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These darts are tipped with a sorrowmoss-based compound which will poison their target.
反熵%s: 这些飞镖上涂着一种由断肠苔制成的药物，能使目标中毒。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.rotdart.name
%s of anti-entropy: rot dart
反熵%s: 腐莓飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.rotdart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These wicked darts are tipped with an acidic rotberry-based compound, which will aggressively eat through anything the dart comes into contact with. Powerful foes will resist most of the effect, but the corrosion is strong enough to easily kill most standard enemies. These last longer than other tipped darts, but their durability cannot be boosted.
反熵%s: 这种恶毒的飞镖上涂着一种由腐莓制成的酸蚀毒膏，能够蚀穿飞镖触及的任何事物。其上的蚀毒异常强大，寻常敌人触之即死，但强敌可消去其大半功效。相较于其他涂药飞镖，这类飞镖上的涂药药效更加耐用，但其耐用度无法被外力进一步提升。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.shockingdart.name
%s of anti-entropy: shocking dart
反熵%s: 电击飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.shockingdart.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These darts are tipped with a stormvine-based compound which will deliver a nasty shock to their target.
反熵%s: 这些飞镖上涂着一种由风暴藤制成的药物，能让目标受到强烈的电击。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.tippeddart.ac_clean
%s of anti-entropy: CLEAN
反熵%s: 清洗

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.tippeddart.clean_title
%s of anti-entropy: Clean Darts
反熵%s: 清洗飞镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.tippeddart.clean_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This action will remove the seed tipping on your darts, reverting them back to regular darts.
反熵%s: 这项操作会去除飞镖上的涂药，将其变回普通飞镖。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.tippeddart.clean_all
%s of anti-entropy: clean all
反熵%s: 清洗全部

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.tippeddart.clean_one
%s of anti-entropy: clean one
反熵%s: 清洗一枚

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.tippeddart.cancel
%s of anti-entropy: cancel
反熵%s: 取消

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.tippeddart.durability
%s of anti-entropy: Tipped darts will lose their tips and become regular darts when used.
反熵%s: 涂药飞镖在使用一定次数后会失去药效变为普通飞镖。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.tippeddart.uses_left
%s of anti-entropy: This stack of darts has _%d/%d_ uses left before one tip wears off.
反熵%s: 这些涂药飞镖再使用_%d/%d_次就会有一个失去药效。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.tippeddart.unlimited_uses
%s of anti-entropy: _But these are of such high quality that they will effectively last forever._
反熵%s: _但精良的做工令其经久耐用，不会因为使用过度而损坏。_

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.tippeddart.about_to_break
%s of anti-entropy: Your dart's tip is about to expire.
反熵%s: 你飞镖上的涂药快要失效了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.darts.tippeddart.has_broken
%s of anti-entropy: Your dart's tip has expired.
反熵%s: 你飞镖上的涂药已经失效了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.bolas.name
%s of anti-entropy: bolas
反熵%s: 流星索

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.bolas.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These unusual ranged weapons aren't very damaging, but they do an excellent job of slowing their targets.
反熵%s: 这种造型特殊的远程武器造成的伤害不高，但其能够有效迟滞目标的移动。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.boomerang.name
%s of anti-entropy: boomerang
反熵%s: 回旋镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.boomerang.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Thrown to the enemy this flat curved wooden missile will return to the hands of its thrower.
反熵%s: 被投向敌人后，这把扁平的曲状木制投掷武器能够自动回到投掷者手中。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.boomerang.durability
%s of anti-entropy: Due to its solid construction, this boomerang will not break from use.
反熵%s: 这个回旋镖造得非常结实，使用后不会产生损耗。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.fishingspear.name
%s of anti-entropy: fishing spear
反熵%s: 捕鱼矛

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.fishingspear.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Tiny throwing spears designed for fishing. They work well as an improvised weapon too.
反熵%s: 小巧的投掷用短矛，本来是用来捕鱼的，不过也能当个武器用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.forcecube.name
%s of anti-entropy: force cube
反熵%s: 震爆方石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.forcecube.ondeath
%s of anti-entropy: You killed yourself with your own Force Cube...
反熵%s: 你用震爆方石害死了自己...

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.forcecube.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This oddly-shaped weapon is small enough to hold in your hand, but is incredibly heavy. When thrown, it will spread the force of its impact over a small area, damaging everything in the blast.
反熵%s: 这种奇形怪状的武器小到可以握在掌心，但极其沉重。命中目的地后，这种武器会把冲击力发散到一个小范围内，对波及区域内的所有单位造成伤害。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.heavyboomerang.name
%s of anti-entropy: heavy boomerang
反熵%s: 重型回旋镖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.heavyboomerang.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This large boomerang is difficult to wield effectively, but will deal considerable damage. After a few turns, it will fly back to the location it was thrown from.
反熵%s: 这把大号回旋镖笨重难用，但能造成可观的伤害。扔出后，它会在几回合内飞回到扔出的地点。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.javelin.name
%s of anti-entropy: javelin
反熵%s: 标枪

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.javelin.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These larger throwing spears are weighted to keep the spike at their tip foremost as they sail through the air.
反熵%s: 这些大号投掷用长枪上的配重保证它们会以尖端为首飞向目标。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.kunai.name
%s of anti-entropy: kunai
反熵%s: 苦无

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.kunai.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These small knives are very powerful in the hands of a skilled user. They are most effective against unaware enemies.
反熵%s: 技巧高深者能用这种小刀造成可观的伤害。这种武器对未察觉你的敌人更有效。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.missileweapon.stats
%s of anti-entropy: This _tier-%1$d_ thrown weapon deals _%2$d-%3$d damage_ and requires _%4$d strength_ to use properly.
反熵%s: 这件_%1$d阶_投掷武器能造成_%2$d~%3$d点伤害_并需要_%4$d点力量_来正常使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.missileweapon.distance
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon is designed to be used at a distance, it is more accurate against distant enemies, but also much less accurate at melee range.
反熵%s: 这种武器被专门设计用于远程攻击，在远程攻击目标时获得额外的命中加成，当然近战范围使用它时精准会大幅降低。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.missileweapon.durability
%s of anti-entropy: Thrown weapons will wear out and break as they are used.
反熵%s: 投掷武器在使用过程中会磨损并最终损坏。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.missileweapon.uses_left
%s of anti-entropy: This stack of weapons has _%d/%d_ uses left before one breaks.
反熵%s: 这一组武器再用_%d/%d_次就会有一件被损耗掉。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.missileweapon.unlimited_uses
%s of anti-entropy: _But these are of such high quality that they will effectively last forever._
反熵%s: _但是因为它们极高的品质，可以永久使用而不损坏。_

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.missileweapon.about_to_break
%s of anti-entropy: Your thrown weapon is about to break.
反熵%s: 你的投掷武器快要损坏了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.missileweapon.has_broken
%s of anti-entropy: One of your thrown weapons has broken.
反熵%s: 你的一件投掷武器已经损坏了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.missileweapon$placeholder.name
%s of anti-entropy: thrown weapon
反熵%s: 投掷武器

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.shuriken.name
%s of anti-entropy: shuriken
反熵%s: 手里剑

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.shuriken.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Star-shaped pieces of metal with razor-sharp blades. They are lightweight and easy to use on the move. A single shuriken can be thrown instantly after moving.
反熵%s: 锋利的星形金属刃片，非常轻便。在移动后即可瞬间投出。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.throwingclub.name
%s of anti-entropy: throwing club
反熵%s: 飞槌

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.throwingclub.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A fairly simple thrown weapon, essentially a large rock fastened to a stick. While they are a bit lacking in damage, their solid stone head means they are quite durable, and won't stick to enemies.
反熵%s: 简单粗暴的投掷武器，说白了就是一块绑着根木棍的大石头。伤害稍低，但结实的石槌头让它们非常耐用，而且不会留在敌人身上。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.throwinghammer.name
%s of anti-entropy: throwing hammer
反熵%s: 投掷锤

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.throwinghammer.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These hefty hammers are designed to be thrown at an enemy. While they are a bit lacking in damage, their smooth all-metal construction means they are quite durable, and won't stick to enemies.
反熵%s: 这些沉甸甸的锤子是用来扔向敌人的。伤害稍低，但平滑的纯金属的制作工艺让它们非常结实，而且不会留在敌人身上。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.throwingknife.name
%s of anti-entropy: throwing knife
反熵%s: 飞刀

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.throwingknife.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These lightweight knives are balanced to arc through the air right into their target. They are most effective against unaware enemies.
反熵%s: 这些轻便的小刀不同于普通的匕首，平衡的配重使其能在飞行后准确地刺穿目标。这种武器对未察觉你的敌人更有效。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.throwingspear.name
%s of anti-entropy: throwing spear
反熵%s: 投矛

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.throwingspear.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These lightweight spears have thin frames which are clearly designed to be thrown, and not thrusted.
反熵%s: 这些轻便短矛的木杆非常纤细，很明显是一种投掷武器，不适合用来近战。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.throwingspike.name
%s of anti-entropy: throwing spike
反熵%s: 飞刺

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.throwingspike.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These pointed shafts of metal are meant to be thrown into distant enemies. While they aren't very strong, their simple all-metal construction makes them reasonably durable.
反熵%s: 这些尖尖的金属箭是用来扔向远处的敌人的。虽然不是很坚固，但简单的纯金属结构使它们相当耐用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.throwingstone.name
%s of anti-entropy: throwing stone
反熵%s: 投石

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.throwingstone.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These stones are sanded down to make them able to be thrown with more power than a regular stone. Despite the craftsmanship they still aren't a very reliable weapon, but at least they won't stick to enemies.
反熵%s: 这些石头被人用砂纸打磨成趁手的形状，比普通石头更适合大力投向目标。尽管工艺精湛，作为武器还是不太可靠，但起码它们不会留在敌人身上。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.tomahawk.name
%s of anti-entropy: tomahawk
反熵%s: 飞斧

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.tomahawk.desc
%s of anti-entropy: These throwing axes have a serrated edge that makes them a bit tricky to use. However, a solid blow with this weapon will cause an enemy to bleed.
反熵%s: 这种有锯齿形斧刃的投掷斧用起来有点困难，但是正中目标造成的伤口会让敌人流血。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.trident.name
%s of anti-entropy: trident
反熵%s: 三叉戟

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.missiles.trident.desc
%s of anti-entropy: Massive throwing spears with three deadly prongs on the end. They are powerful, but quite heavy.
反熵%s: 一把尖端有着三根致命尖叉的特大号投掷用长枪。威力极大，但也很重。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.spiritbow.name
%s of anti-entropy: spirit bow
反熵%s: 灵能弓

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.spiritbow.ac_shoot
%s of anti-entropy: SHOOT
反熵%s: 射击

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.spiritbow.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Choose a target
反熵%s: 选择一个目标

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.spiritbow.stats
%s of anti-entropy: The bow cannot be directly upgraded, but will instead steadily grow stronger as you level up. At your current level, arrows shot from the bow will deal _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and require _%3$d strength_ to use properly.
反熵%s: 这把弓不能直接升级，但是会随着你等级提升而逐渐增强。以你目前的等级，这把弓射出的每支箭可以造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_并且需要_%3$d点力量_来正常使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.spiritbow.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A bow made out of ancient magical wood. The bow's string and etchings glow with a pale blue light. When the string is pulled this bow will conjure a magical arrow which can be fired at an enemy.
反熵%s: 一把由远古灵木制成的弓，弓弦和弓身的刻纹散发着苍蓝色的幽光。拉开弓弦时，一发魔法箭矢会生成在弓身一侧向目标飞去。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.identify
%s of anti-entropy: You are now familiar enough with your weapon to identify it.
反熵%s: 你对手中的武器已经足够熟悉并将其完全鉴定。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.too_heavy
%s of anti-entropy: Because of your inadequate strength this weapon will hinder your attack speed, accuracy, and ability to surprise attack.
反熵%s: 因为你的力量不足，该武器会降低你的攻速和精准，并让你无法偷袭。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.excess_str
%s of anti-entropy: Because of your excess strength, you will deal up to _%d bonus damage_ with this weapon.
反熵%s: 你的额外力量让你在使用这件武器时最多能够造成_%d点额外伤害_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.hardening_gone
%s of anti-entropy: The hardening on this weapon has worn off!
反熵%s: 你武器上的硬化效果被损耗掉了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.incompatible
%s of anti-entropy: Interaction of different types of magic has negated the enchantment on this weapon!
反熵%s: 不同属性的魔法相冲突，消除了武器上的附魔！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.cursed_worn
%s of anti-entropy: Because this weapon is cursed, you are powerless to remove it.
反熵%s: 由于这件武器被诅咒，你无法将其放下。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: You can feel a malevolent magic lurking within this weapon.
反熵%s: 你能感觉到这件武器里潜伏着一股充满恶意的魔力。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.weak_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: Despite the curse, you are able to unequip this weapon.
反熵%s: 虽然这件武器有诅咒，但是你可以脱下它。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.not_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon is free of malevolent magic.
反熵%s: 这件武器没有被诅咒。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.faster
%s of anti-entropy: It is augmented to enhance _speed._
反熵%s: 这件武器强化了_攻速_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.stronger
%s of anti-entropy: It is augmented to enhance _damage._
反熵%s: 这件武器强化了_伤害_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.enchanted
%s of anti-entropy: it has a _%s._
反熵%s: 这件武器附有_%s_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.enchant_hardened
%s of anti-entropy: It has been _hardened._
反熵%s: 它被_硬化_了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon.hardened_no_enchant
%s of anti-entropy: This weapon has been _hardened,_ but is not currently enchanted.
反熵%s: 这件武器已被_硬化_，但目前没有携带附魔。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon$enchantment.enchant
%s of anti-entropy: enchantment
反熵%s: 附魔

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.weapon.weapon$enchantment.rankings_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Killed by an enchantment
反熵%s: 死于附魔

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.amulet.name
%s of anti-entropy: amulet of yendor
反熵%s: Yendor护符

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.amulet.ac_end
%s of anti-entropy: END THE GAME
反熵%s: 结束游戏

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.amulet.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The Amulet of Yendor is the most powerful artifact known to human or dwarf kind. Its shimmering crystals contain incredible and wondrous power.
反熵%s: Yendor护符是人类与矮人所知的最强大的神器。其上镶嵌的晶石奇光辉映、气象非常，蕴含着不可思议的神奇力量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.amulet.desc_origins
%s of anti-entropy: The origins of the amulet are unknown. History says that the King of Dwarves boasted that he had discovered the artifact shortly before the Dwarven civilization cut off all contact. How did he find it? How did Yog-Dzewa take it from him? Questions for another time perhaps, all that matters now is the amulet is yours!
反熵%s: 护符的起源与种种过去无人知晓。据历史记载，矮人国王曾夸口说他在矮人文明与外界切断一切联系之前不久就发现了这件神器。那么，他是如何找到的？古神又是怎样从他那里夺走了护符？也许这些问题不需要现在解答，真正重要的是：护符正属于你！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.amulet.desc_ascent
%s of anti-entropy: The origins of the amulet are unknown, but clearly it has been heavily influenced by Yog-Dzewa's power. The dungeon seems to be bending to Yog's will as you move through it, making enemies much more plentiful and powerful! You're also no longer able to activate or discard the amulet, almost as if it is cursed.
反熵%s: 护符的起源与种种过去无人知晓，但显然它已在古神的力量下受到了极大的侵蚀。你在地牢中踏经的每一寸土地似乎都已在古神意志的掌控之下，面前的敌人也变得众多强势、更甚以往！你也无力使用或抛下护符了——此时它与被诅咒已几无差别。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.amulet.ascent_title
%s of anti-entropy: Ascension
反熵%s: 踏返登临

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.amulet.ascent_desc
%s of anti-entropy:
You begin to feel Yog-Dzewa's great and terrible power radiating from the amulet. Ascending back through the dungeon as a mortal might be more difficult than you thought!

If you continue ascending with the amulet the dungeon will become more dangerous, teleports between floors will be disabled, and you will only be able to win the game by defeating enemies as you ascend through the dungeon!

You can leave the amulet here for now if you want to ascend without starting this challenge, or activate the amulet before ascending to end the game normally.
反熵%s:
你开始感受到古神强大可怖的力量自护符中泛溢而出。凭凡人的区区肉身自这地牢之底向上攀登至地面将远比你想象中的更难！

如果你继续在持有护符的情况下向上返回，地牢将会变得更加险恶重重。跨层传送将会被抑制，而击杀沿途敌人返回地面则将成为你赢得这局游戏的唯一方式！

如果你想要在不开始护符挑战的情况下返回上层，你可以把护符暂时留在这里，也可以选择在这里直接用护符以正常结束游戏。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.amulet.ascent_yes
%s of anti-entropy: Continue!
反熵%s: 继续前进！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.amulet.ascent_no
%s of anti-entropy: Stop for Now
反熵%s: 稍等片刻

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.ankh.name
%s of anti-entropy: ankh
反熵%s: 重生十字架

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.ankh.ac_bless
%s of anti-entropy: BLESS
反熵%s: 祝福

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.ankh.bless
%s of anti-entropy: You bless the ankh with magical water.
反熵%s: 你用散发着治愈魔力的清水祝福了这枚重生十字架。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.ankh.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ancient symbol of immortality grants the ability to return to life after death. Most items will be dropped where you died, but can be reclaimed if you return to it. Using a full waterskin, the ankh can be blessed with extra strength.
反熵%s: 这枚象征不朽的古老饰物能使人起死回生。不过大部分物品将会被遗落在死亡的地点，等待你去拾回。装满的水袋可用于对重生十字架进行赐福，赋予它更强的力量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.ankh.desc_blessed
%s of anti-entropy: This ancient symbol of immortality grants the ability to return to life after death. The ankh has been blessed and is now much stronger. The Ankh will sacrifice itself to save you in a moment of deadly peril.
反熵%s: 这枚象征不朽的古老饰品能够让人起死回生。这枚十字架已被祝福而变得更加强大。它会在危急关头牺牲自己来救你一命。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.arcaneresin.name
%s of anti-entropy: arcane resin
反熵%s: 奥术树脂

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.arcaneresin.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select a wand
反熵%s: 选择一根要强化的法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.arcaneresin.ac_apply
%s of anti-entropy: APPLY
反熵%s: 强化

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.arcaneresin.level_too_high
%s of anti-entropy: That wand is too powerful for resin to improve.
反熵%s: 这根法杖过于强大，树脂已经不足以对其进行进一步强化了。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.arcaneresin.not_enough
%s of anti-entropy: You don't have enough resin for that!
反熵%s: 你的树脂不够了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.arcaneresin.apply
%s of anti-entropy: You coat your wand with resin, increasing its power!
反熵%s: 你将树脂包被于法杖的表面。法杖的能量愈发凝练了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.arcaneresin.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
This fine powder shimmers between shades of purple and white. It can act as an amplifier to magical energies, increasing the level of wands when it is applied to them!

Upgrading a wand costs 1, 2, or 3 resin depending on the wand's initial level. Resin can upgrade wands to a maximum of +3.

Resin upgrades are _overridden by other upgrade sources_ however (such as scrolls of upgrade), and do not apply when imbuing a wand into the Mage's staff.
反熵%s:
这团细腻的粉末闪烁着紫与白的微光。奥术树脂可用于增强法杖魔能，提升法杖等级！

基于法杖初始等级，升级一根法杖分别需要消耗1、2、3个树脂。树脂最多可以升级法杖至+3。

然而，树脂的升级效果不但会_被其他升级来源覆盖_(例如升级卷轴)，而且无法通过灌注法杖转移到法师的魔杖。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.brokenseal.name
%s of anti-entropy: broken seal
反熵%s: 破损纹章

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.brokenseal.ac_affix
%s of anti-entropy: AFFIX
反熵%s: 贴附

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.brokenseal.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select an armor
反熵%s: 选择一件护甲。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.brokenseal.unknown_armor
%s of anti-entropy: You must identify that armor first.
反熵%s: 你需要先鉴定那件护甲。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.brokenseal.cursed_armor
%s of anti-entropy: The seal won't apply to cursed armor.
反熵%s: 纹章不能贴附于被诅咒的盔甲。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.brokenseal.affix
%s of anti-entropy: You affix the seal to your armor!
反熵%s: 你将纹章佩挂在了护甲上！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.brokenseal.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
A wax seal, affixed to armor as a symbol of valor. All the markings on the seal have worn off with age and it is broken in half down the middle.

A memento from his home, the seal helps the warrior persevere. While wearing the seal the warrior will slowly generate shielding on top of his health based on the quality of his armor.

The seal can be _affixed to armor,_ and moved between armors. It can carry a single upgrade with it, so long as that upgrade was applied to the armor while the seal was attached to it.
反熵%s:
一枚蜡制纹章，被贴在护甲上作为勇气的象征。纹章上的印记已被岁月磨损殆尽，还从中裂成两瓣。

这是一件来自家乡的纪念物，在纹章的支持下战士会变得不屈不挠。佩戴纹章时战士能缓慢获得基于护甲品质的额外生命护盾。

纹章可以被_贴附在护甲上_并能在护甲间转移。它能够携带一次升级，前提是升级时纹章需已贴附在护甲上。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.brokenseal.inscribed
%s of anti-entropy: The seal is inscribed with a _%s._
反熵%s: 纹章携带着_%s_。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.brokenseal.choose_title
%s of anti-entropy: Choose a Glyph
反熵%s: 选择一个刻印

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.brokenseal.choose_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Both this armor and the broken seal are carrying a glyph. Pick which glyph should be kept.\n\nNote that if you pick the glyph that is currently on the armor, the seal will not be able to transfer it later.
反熵%s: 这件护甲与破损纹章都携带着一个刻印。请选择一个想保留的刻印。\n\n注意：如果选择保留护甲的刻印，纹章将无法转移此刻印。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.dewdrop.name
%s of anti-entropy: dewdrop
反熵%s: 露珠

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.dewdrop.already_full
%s of anti-entropy: You already have full health.
反熵%s: 你的生命值已满。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.dewdrop.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A crystal clear dewdrop.\n\nDue to the magic of this place, pure water has minor restorative properties.
反熵%s: 一颗晶莹剔透的露珠。\n\n受这片区域的魔力影响，净水有着少量的治疗效果。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.equipableitem.curse_detected
%s of anti-entropy: You sense that the item is cursed just before you equip it!
反熵%s: 在你装备上这件物品前，你感知到了物品的诅咒！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.equipableitem.unequip_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: You can't remove a cursed item!
反熵%s: 你无法移除一件被诅咒的物品！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.equipableitem.ac_equip
%s of anti-entropy: EQUIP
反熵%s: 装备

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.equipableitem.ac_unequip
%s of anti-entropy: UNEQUIP
反熵%s: 取下

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.energycrystal.name
%s of anti-entropy: energy crystal
反熵%s: 能量晶体

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.energycrystal.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A collection of small magical crystals, filled with alchemical energy.\n\nThese crystals are the most common ingredient in alchemy recipes and can be produced at an alchemy pot by scrapping consumable items.
反熵%s: 一些小巧玲珑的能量晶体，充盈着炼金能量。\n\n这些晶体是炼金配方中最常见的原料，可借助炼金釜从消耗品中提炼获得。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.gold.name
%s of anti-entropy: gold
反熵%s: 金币

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.gold.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A pile of gold coins. Collect gold coins to spend them later in a shop.
反熵%s: 一堆金币。收集金币以在随后的商店中消费。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.chest
%s of anti-entropy: Chest
反熵%s: 宝箱

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.chest_desc
%s of anti-entropy: You won't know what's inside until you open it!
反熵%s: 打开前你是看不见里面有什么的！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.locked_chest
%s of anti-entropy: Locked chest
反熵%s: 上锁的宝箱

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.locked_chest_desc
%s of anti-entropy: You won't know what's inside until you open it! But to open it you need a golden key.
反熵%s: 打开前你是看不见里面有什么的！你需要一枚金钥匙才能打开它。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.crystal_chest
%s of anti-entropy: Crystal chest
反熵%s: 水晶宝箱

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.crystal_chest_desc
%s of anti-entropy: You can see _%s_ inside, but to open the chest you need a crystal key.
反熵%s: 你看得见里面的_%s_，但你需要一枚水晶钥匙才能打开它。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.artifact
%s of anti-entropy: an artifact
反熵%s: 一件神器

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.wand
%s of anti-entropy: a wand
反熵%s: 一根法杖

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.ring
%s of anti-entropy: a ring
反熵%s: 一枚戒指

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.tomb
%s of anti-entropy: Tomb
反熵%s: 坟墓

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.tomb_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This ancient tomb may contain something useful, but its owner will most certainly object to checking.
反熵%s: 这个坟墓里或许埋葬着一些有用的东西，但墓主肯定是不会让你拿走的。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.skeleton
%s of anti-entropy: Skeletal remains
反熵%s: 遗骸

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.skeleton_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is all that's left of some unfortunate adventurer. Maybe it's worth checking for any valuables.
反熵%s: 某个不幸的冒险家存在过的唯一证明。或许可以找找里面有什么值钱的东西。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.remains
%s of anti-entropy: Hero's remains
反熵%s: 英雄遗骸

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.heap.remains_desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is all that's left from one of your predecessors. Maybe it's worth checking for any valuables.
反熵%s: 你的某个先辈存在过的唯一证明。或许能找到点什么值钱的东西。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.honeypot.name
%s of anti-entropy: honeypot
反熵%s: 蜂蜜罐

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.honeypot.ac_shatter
%s of anti-entropy: SHATTER
反熵%s: 击碎

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.honeypot.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This large honeypot is only really lined with honey, instead it houses a giant bee! These sorts of massive bees usually stay in their hives, perhaps the pot is some sort of specialized trapper's cage? The bee seems pretty content inside the pot with its honey, and buzzes at you warily when you look at it.
反熵%s: 这个巨型蜜罐只是薄薄地涂了一圈蜂蜜，作为替代里头住着一只巨型蜜蜂！这种大型蜜蜂一般只待在蜂巢里，也许罐子本身就是某种特殊陷阱屋？蜜蜂看起来对罐子很满意，当你看向它时它非常警惕地对你回以嗡鸣。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.honeypot$shatteredpot.name
%s of anti-entropy: shattered honeypot
反熵%s: 破碎蜂蜜罐

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.honeypot$shatteredpot.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The pot has been shattered, only the sticky honey that lines its walls is holding it together, and it is slowly coming apart.\n\nDespite its broken state, the bee still seems to want to protect the pot.
反熵%s: 这个罐子已经被打碎，仅靠罐沿的粘稠蜂蜜勉强维持形状，而且正在缓缓解体。\n\n尽管蜜罐碎了，看来蜜蜂依然想捍卫它的住所。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.item.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Choose direction of throw
反熵%s: 选择丢出的方位

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.item.ac_drop
%s of anti-entropy: DROP
反熵%s: 放下

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.item.ac_throw
%s of anti-entropy: THROW
反熵%s: 扔出

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.item.rankings_desc
%s of anti-entropy: Killed by: %s
反熵%s: 死于：%s

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.item.curse
%s of anti-entropy: curse
反熵%s: 诅咒

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.item.custom_note
%s of anti-entropy: This item has a custom note: "_%s_"
反熵%s: 你为这件物品写下了一页记录：“_%s_”

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kindofmisc.unequip_title
%s of anti-entropy: Unequip one item
反熵%s: 卸下一件装备

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kindofmisc.unequip_message
%s of anti-entropy: You must unequip one of these items first. Select an item to swap with.
反熵%s: 你必须先取下一件装备。请选择要替换的物品。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kindofweapon.swift_equip
%s of anti-entropy: You swiftly equip your weapon.
反熵%s: 你迅速地装备上了武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kindofweapon.equip_cursed
%s of anti-entropy: Your grip involuntarily tightens around the weapon.
反熵%s: 你的手不受控制地握紧了这件武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kindofweapon.which_equip_msg
%s of anti-entropy:
Which weapon slot would you like to equip this item to?

The Champion directly attacks with her primary weapon, but can use the ability of either weapon. Both weapons share the same charge count.

The Champion can also swap her primary and secondary weapon instantly.
反熵%s:
你想将这把武器装备至哪个武器栏位？

勇士仅会使用主武器进行攻击，但主、副武器都能发动武技，且共用同一个充能数。

勇士还能瞬间切换主、副武器。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kindofweapon.which_equip_primary
%s of anti-entropy: Primary (%s)
反熵%s: 主手(%s)

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kindofweapon.which_equip_secondary
%s of anti-entropy: Secondary (%s)
反熵%s: 副手(%s)

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kindofweapon.empty
%s of anti-entropy: empty
反熵%s: 空栏位

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kingscrown.name
%s of anti-entropy: Dwarf King's crown
反熵%s: 矮人国王的皇冠

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kingscrown.ac_wear
%s of anti-entropy: WEAR
反熵%s: 加冕

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kingscrown.naked
%s of anti-entropy: Unfortunately, the crown cannot transform your underwear.
反熵%s: 非常遗憾，皇冠的魔力无法强化你的内衣。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kingscrown.upgraded
%s of anti-entropy: The crown glows brightly and then disintegrates as your armor transforms!
反熵%s: 皇冠熔为曜日般的金光，而你的护甲在照耀下开始逐渐变形！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kingscrown.ratgraded
%s of anti-entropy: Rat King's paws glow brightly as your armor transforms!
反熵%s: 鼠王挥爪便召出了万丈光芒，而你的护甲在照耀下开始逐渐变形！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.kingscrown.desc
%s of anti-entropy: The crown of the last dwarven king, it glows with tremendous magical energy.\n\nWhen worn, the crown's magic will flow into the armor you're currently wearing, transforming it into a _unique epic armor with special abilities._ The new armor will keep all the properties of the original armor.
反熵%s: 末代矮人国王的皇冠，至强的魔法能量以光芒的形式从中辐射而出。\n\n如果你有决心将其戴上，皇冠的魔力会涌入你正在装备的护甲，将其改造为_拥有特殊技能的独特英雄护甲_。新的护甲会保留原护甲的所有属性与刻印。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.liquidmetal.name
%s of anti-entropy: liquid metal
反熵%s: 液金

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.liquidmetal.ac_apply
%s of anti-entropy: APPLY
反熵%s: 修复

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.liquidmetal.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select a thrown weapon
反熵%s: 选择一个投掷武器

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.liquidmetal.already_fixed
%s of anti-entropy: That thrown weapon is already in perfect condition!
反熵%s: 这件投掷武器已经完好无损了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.liquidmetal.apply
%s of anti-entropy: You use %d liquid metal to repair your thrown weapon.
反熵%s: 你为修复该投掷武器消耗了%d滴液金。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.liquidmetal.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
When poured over a thrown weapon, this magical liquid will fill into the cracks and tears from use, restoring the thrown weapon to perfect condition!

A tier 1 weapon requires 10 liquid metal to be fully repaired, a tier 5 weapon requires 30. Each upgrade also doubles the amount of metal needed.

Liquid metal cannot be used to repair the tips on tipped darts.
反熵%s:
涂抹在一件投掷武器的表面时，这如同带有魔力般神奇的液体就会渗入其磨损之处，覆盖每一处刮擦，填平每一处沟壑，使之焕然一新！

完全修复一件1阶投掷武器需要消耗10滴液金，修复一件5阶投掷武器则消耗30滴液金。被修复的投掷武器每有一层升级则多消耗一倍的液金。

液金无法用于修复涂药飞镖上药液的耐久。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.lostbackpack.name
%s of anti-entropy: lost backpack
反熵%s: 遗物

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.lostbackpack.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This is your lost inventory. Collect it to reclaim all the items you lost!
反熵%s: 你的遗物，包含你遗留在此的所有物品。快快重新拥有它们吧！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.merchantsbeacon.name
%s of anti-entropy: merchant's beacon
反熵%s: 商人信标

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.merchantsbeacon.ac_use
%s of anti-entropy: USE
反熵%s: 使用

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.merchantsbeacon.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
This odd piece of dwarven technology allows you to communicate from great distances.

After being activated, this beacon will let you sell items to Pixel Mart from anywhere in the dungeon.

However, the magic within the beacon will only last for one session, so use it wisely.
反熵%s:
这件矮人科技的奇特产物能够让你和遥远的地方通讯。

激活时，这枚信标可以让你从地牢的任意角落向像素商店出售物品。

不过信标内的魔法只够支撑一次会话，请酌情使用。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stylus.name
%s of anti-entropy: arcane stylus
反熵%s: 奥术刻笔

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stylus.ac_inscribe
%s of anti-entropy: INSCRIBE
反熵%s: 蚀刻

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stylus.prompt
%s of anti-entropy: Select an armor
反熵%s: 选择一件护甲

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stylus.identify
%s of anti-entropy: You must identify whether that armor is cursed first.
反熵%s: 你需要先鉴定那件护甲有无诅咒。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stylus.cursed
%s of anti-entropy: The stylus's magic will not work on cursed armor.
反熵%s: 奥术刻笔的力量无法作用在被诅咒的护甲上。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stylus.inscribed
%s of anti-entropy: You inscribed your armor with the stylus.
反熵%s: 你用刻笔雕刻了盔甲。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.stylus.desc
%s of anti-entropy: This arcane stylus is made of some dark, very hard stone. Using it you can inscribe a magical glyph on your armor, but you have no power over choosing what glyph it will be, the stylus will decide it for you.
反熵%s: 这支奥术刻笔由一种暗黑色的坚硬石料制成。你能用它在护甲上刻下魔法刻印，不过你无法自主选择，刻笔会替你做出决定。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.tengusmask.name
%s of anti-entropy: Tengu's mask
反熵%s: 天狗的面具

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.tengusmask.ac_wear
%s of anti-entropy: WEAR
反熵%s: 佩戴

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.tengusmask.used
%s of anti-entropy: The mask disintegrates as its power flows into you!
反熵%s: 面具瓦解了，它所蕴含的能量涌入了你的身体。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.tengusmask.desc
%s of anti-entropy:
This mask fell off Tengu's face as he died, you can feel great magical power emanating from it. Was the mask Tengu's source of strength?

When worn, the tremendous power of the mask will be transferred into you, enabling you to _choose a subclass for your hero._

Which subclass will you choose?
反熵%s:
天狗死时，这幅面具像褪皮般从他的脸上失落地滑下。你能感受它在波动着一股神妙的魔力，仿佛在极力劝你成为它的新主人。难道天狗戴上它时也是被其力量吸引？

如果你有勇气将其戴上，面具的庞大力量会转嫁到你体内，供你为英雄_选择一种职业专精_。

你会选择哪条道路？

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.torch.name
%s of anti-entropy: torch
反熵%s: 火把

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.torch.ac_light
%s of anti-entropy: LIGHT
反熵%s: 点燃

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.torch.desc
%s of anti-entropy: An adventuring staple, when a dungeon goes dark, a torch can help lead the way.
反熵%s: 冒险必备物品，每当地牢陷入黑暗之时，火把能让你走上正确的道路。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.waterskin.name
%s of anti-entropy: waterskin
反熵%s: 水袋

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.waterskin.ac_drink
%s of anti-entropy: DRINK
反熵%s: 饮用

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.waterskin.collected
%s of anti-entropy: You collect the dewdrop into your waterskin.
反熵%s: 你将一滴露珠收集到了水袋里。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.waterskin.full
%s of anti-entropy: Your waterskin is full!
反熵%s: 你的水袋装满了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.waterskin.empty
%s of anti-entropy: Your waterskin is empty!
反熵%s: 你的水袋一滴也不剩了！

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.waterskin.desc
%s of anti-entropy: A container for liquid, made from leather and string, sealed with a cork stopper.
反熵%s: 牛皮缝制的液体容器，被软木塞牢牢密封着。在激烈的搏斗中也不会漏出一滴内容。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.waterskin.desc_water
%s of anti-entropy: Right now the waterskin just contains some plain drinking water. Surely there is something in the dungeon that the waterskin could store instead.
反熵%s: 你的水袋里只有普普通通的饮用水，地牢中肯定会有更值得装的东西。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.waterskin.desc_heal
%s of anti-entropy: The waterskin is currently being used to store healing water. The more full the waterskin is, the more you will be instantly healed when drinking from it. You will only drink as much as you need.
反熵%s: 水袋里现在装着有治愈魔力的露水。水袋越满，你在饮用时瞬间恢复的生命也会越多。你每次使用都只会喝掉你需要的量。

items.armor.curses.antientropy.name: items.waterskin.desc_full
%s of anti-entropy: The full waterskin seems to radiate energy, perhaps it can be used to bless another survival item?
反熵%s: 装满了的水袋散发着一股能量，也许能够用来祝福其他的生存道具？
